106struct ScrollingTreeState {

111
112struct RenderLayerCompositor::OverlapExtent {
113 LayoutRect bounds;
114 bool extentComputed { false };
115 bool hasTransformAnimation { false };
116 bool animationCausesExtentUncertainty { false };
117
118 bool knownToBeHaveExtentUncertainty() const { return extentComputed && animationCausesExtentUncertainty; }
119};
120
121struct RenderLayerCompositor::CompositingState {
122 CompositingState(RenderLayer* compAncestor, bool testOverlap = true)
123 : compositingAncestor(compAncestor)
124 , testingOverlap(testOverlap)
125 {
126 }
127
128 CompositingState stateForPaintOrderChildren(RenderLayer& layer) const
129 {
130 UNUSED_PARAM(layer);
131 CompositingState childState(compositingAncestor);
132 if (layer.isStackingContext())
133 childState.stackingContextAncestor = &layer;
134 else
135 childState.stackingContextAncestor = stackingContextAncestor;
136
137 childState.backingSharingAncestor = backingSharingAncestor;
138 childState.subtreeIsCompositing = false;
139 childState.testingOverlap = testingOverlap;
140 childState.fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired = fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired;
141 childState.descendantsRequireCompositingUpdate = descendantsRequireCompositingUpdate;
142 childState.ancestorHasTransformAnimation = ancestorHasTransformAnimation;
143 childState.hasCompositedNonContainedDescendants = false;
144#if ENABLE(CSS_COMPOSITING)
145 childState.hasNotIsolatedCompositedBlendingDescendants = false; // FIXME: should this only be reset for stacking contexts?
146#endif
147#if !LOG_DISABLED
148 childState.depth = depth + 1;
149#endif
150 return childState;
151 }
152
153 void updateWithDescendantStateAndLayer(const CompositingState& childState, const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* ancestorLayer, const OverlapExtent& layerExtent, bool isUnchangedSubtree = false)
154 {
155 // Subsequent layers in the parent stacking context also need to composite.
156 subtreeIsCompositing |= childState.subtreeIsCompositing | layer.isComposited();
157 if (!isUnchangedSubtree)
158 fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired |= childState.fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired;
159
160 // Turn overlap testing off for later layers if it's already off, or if we have an animating transform.
161 // Note that if the layer clips its descendants, there's no reason to propagate the child animation to the parent layers. That's because
162 // we know for sure the animation is contained inside the clipping rectangle, which is already added to the overlap map.
163 auto canReenableOverlapTesting = [&layer] {
164 return layer.isComposited() && RenderLayerCompositor::clipsCompositingDescendants(layer);
165 };
166 if ((!childState.testingOverlap && !canReenableOverlapTesting()) || layerExtent.knownToBeHaveExtentUncertainty())
167 testingOverlap = false;
168
169 auto computeHasCompositedNonContainedDescendants = [&] {
170 if (hasCompositedNonContainedDescendants)
171 return true;
172 if (!ancestorLayer)
173 return false;
174 if (!layer.isComposited())
175 return false;
176 if (!layer.renderer().isOutOfFlowPositioned())
177 return false;
178 if (layer.ancestorLayerIsInContainingBlockChain(*ancestorLayer))
179 return false;
180 return true;
181 };
182
183 hasCompositedNonContainedDescendants = computeHasCompositedNonContainedDescendants();
184
185#if ENABLE(CSS_COMPOSITING)
186 if ((layer.isComposited() && layer.hasBlendMode()) || (layer.hasNotIsolatedCompositedBlendingDescendants() && !layer.isolatesCompositedBlending()))
187 hasNotIsolatedCompositedBlendingDescendants = true;
188#endif
189 }
190
191 bool hasNonRootCompositedAncestor() const
192 {
193 return compositingAncestor && !compositingAncestor->isRenderViewLayer();
194 }
195
196 RenderLayer* compositingAncestor;
197 RenderLayer* backingSharingAncestor { nullptr };
198 RenderLayer* stackingContextAncestor { nullptr };
199 bool subtreeIsCompositing { false };
200 bool testingOverlap { true };
201 bool fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired { false };
202 bool descendantsRequireCompositingUpdate { false };
203 bool ancestorHasTransformAnimation { false };
204 bool hasCompositedNonContainedDescendants { false };
205#if ENABLE(CSS_COMPOSITING)
206 bool hasNotIsolatedCompositedBlendingDescendants { false };
207#endif
208#if !LOG_DISABLED
209 unsigned depth { 0 };
210#endif
211};
212
213struct RenderLayerCompositor::UpdateBackingTraversalState {
214 UpdateBackingTraversalState(RenderLayer* compAncestor = nullptr, Vector<RenderLayer*>* clippedLayers = nullptr, Vector<RenderLayer*>* overflowScrollers = nullptr)
215 : compositingAncestor(compAncestor)
216 , layersClippedByScrollers(clippedLayers)
217 , overflowScrollLayers(overflowScrollers)
218 {
219 }
220
221 UpdateBackingTraversalState stateForDescendants() const
222 {
223 UpdateBackingTraversalState state(compositingAncestor, layersClippedByScrollers, overflowScrollLayers);
224#if !LOG_DISABLED
225 state.depth = depth + 1;
226#endif
227 return state;
228 }
229
230 RenderLayer* compositingAncestor;
231
232 // List of layers in the current stacking context that are clipped by ancestor scrollers.
233 Vector<RenderLayer*>* layersClippedByScrollers;
234 // List of layers with composited overflow:scroll.
235 Vector<RenderLayer*>* overflowScrollLayers;
236
237#if !LOG_DISABLED
238 unsigned depth { 0 };
239#endif
240};
241
242class RenderLayerCompositor::BackingSharingState {
243 WTF_MAKE_NONCOPYABLE(BackingSharingState);
244public:
245 BackingSharingState() = default;
246
247 RenderLayer* backingProviderCandidate() const { return m_backingProviderCandidate; };
248
249 void appendSharingLayer(RenderLayer& layer)
250 {
251 ASSERT(m_backingProviderCandidate);
252 m_backingSharingLayers.append(makeWeakPtr(layer));
253 }
254
255 void updateBeforeDescendantTraversal(RenderLayer&, bool willBeComposited);
256 void updateAfterDescendantTraversal(RenderLayer&, RenderLayer* stackingContextAncestor);
257
258 bool isPotentialBackingSharingLayer(const RenderLayer& layer) const
259 {
260 return m_backingSharingLayers.contains(&layer);
261 }
262
263 // Add a layer that would repaint into a layer in m_backingSharingLayers.
264 // That repaint has to wait until we've set the provider's backing-sharing layers.
265 void addLayerNeedingRepaint(RenderLayer& layer)
266 {
267 m_layersPendingRepaint.add(layer);
268 }
269
270private:
271 void layerWillBeComposited(RenderLayer&);
272
273 void startBackingSharingSequence(RenderLayer& candidateLayer, RenderLayer* candidateStackingContext);
274 void endBackingSharingSequence();
275 void issuePendingRepaints();
276
277 RenderLayer* m_backingProviderCandidate { nullptr };
278 RenderLayer* m_backingProviderStackingContext { nullptr };
279 Vector<WeakPtr<RenderLayer>> m_backingSharingLayers;
280 WeakHashSet<RenderLayer> m_layersPendingRepaint;
281};
282
283void RenderLayerCompositor::BackingSharingState::startBackingSharingSequence(RenderLayer& candidateLayer, RenderLayer* candidateStackingContext)
284{
285 ASSERT(!m_backingProviderCandidate);
286 ASSERT(m_backingSharingLayers.isEmpty());
287
288 m_backingProviderCandidate = &candidateLayer;
289 m_backingProviderStackingContext = candidateStackingContext;
290}
291
292void RenderLayerCompositor::BackingSharingState::endBackingSharingSequence()
293{
294 if (m_backingProviderCandidate) {
295 m_backingProviderCandidate->backing()->setBackingSharingLayers(WTFMove(m_backingSharingLayers));
296 m_backingSharingLayers.clear();
297 issuePendingRepaints();
298 }
299
300 m_backingProviderCandidate = nullptr;
301}
302
303void RenderLayerCompositor::BackingSharingState::updateBeforeDescendantTraversal(RenderLayer& layer, bool willBeComposited)
304{
305 layer.setBackingProviderLayer(nullptr);
306
307 // A layer that composites resets backing-sharing, since subsequent layers need to composite to overlap it.
308 if (willBeComposited) {
309 m_backingSharingLayers.removeAll(&layer);
310 endBackingSharingSequence();
311 }
312}
313
314void RenderLayerCompositor::BackingSharingState::updateAfterDescendantTraversal(RenderLayer& layer, RenderLayer* stackingContextAncestor)
315{
316 if (layer.isComposited()) {
317 // If this layer is being composited, clean up sharing-related state.
318 layer.disconnectFromBackingProviderLayer();
319 m_backingSharingLayers.removeAll(&layer);
320 }
321
322 if (m_backingProviderCandidate && &layer == m_backingProviderStackingContext) {
323 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "End of stacking context for backing provider " << m_backingProviderCandidate << ", ending sharing sequence with " << m_backingSharingLayers.size() << " sharing layers");
324 endBackingSharingSequence();
325 } else if (!m_backingProviderCandidate && layer.isComposited()) {
326 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "Post-descendant compositing of " << &layer << ", ending sharing sequence for " << m_backingProviderCandidate << " with " << m_backingSharingLayers.size() << " sharing layers");
327 endBackingSharingSequence();
328 startBackingSharingSequence(layer, stackingContextAncestor);
329 }
330
331 if (&layer != m_backingProviderCandidate && layer.isComposited())
332 layer.backing()->clearBackingSharingLayers();
333}
334
335void RenderLayerCompositor::BackingSharingState::issuePendingRepaints()
336{
337 for (auto& layer : m_layersPendingRepaint) {
338 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "Issuing postponed repaint of layer " << &layer);
339 layer.compositor().repaintOnCompositingChange(layer);
340 }
341
342 m_layersPendingRepaint.clear();
343}

346static inline bool compositingLogEnabled()
347{
348 return LogCompositing.state == WTFLogChannelState::On;

351static inline bool layersLogEnabled()
352{
353 return LogLayers.state == WTFLogChannelState::On;
354}
355#endif

357RenderLayerCompositor::RenderLayerCompositor(RenderView& renderView)
358 : m_renderView(renderView)
359 , m_updateCompositingLayersTimer(*this, &RenderLayerCompositor::updateCompositingLayersTimerFired)
360{
361#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
362 if (m_renderView.frameView().platformWidget())
363 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator = makeUnique<LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator>(page().chrome().client(), isMainFrameCompositor());
364#endif
365}
366
367RenderLayerCompositor::~RenderLayerCompositor()
368{
369 // Take care that the owned GraphicsLayers are deleted first as their destructors may call back here.
370 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_rootContentsLayer);
371
372 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_clipLayer);
373 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_scrollContainerLayer);
374 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_scrolledContentsLayer);
375
376 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_overflowControlsHostLayer);
377
378 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar);
379 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForVerticalScrollbar);
380 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForScrollCorner);
381
382#if ENABLE(RUBBER_BANDING)
383 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForOverhangAreas);
384 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_contentShadowLayer);
385 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForTopOverhangArea);
386 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForBottomOverhangArea);
387 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForHeader);
388 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForFooter);
389#endif
390
391 ASSERT(m_rootLayerAttachment == RootLayerUnattached);
392}
393
394void RenderLayerCompositor::enableCompositingMode(bool enable /* = true */)
395{
396 if (enable != m_compositing) {
397 m_compositing = enable;
398
399 if (m_compositing) {
400 ensureRootLayer();
401 notifyIFramesOfCompositingChange();
402 } else
403 destroyRootLayer();
404
405
406 m_renderView.layer()->setNeedsPostLayoutCompositingUpdate();
407 }
408}
409
410void RenderLayerCompositor::cacheAcceleratedCompositingFlags()
411{
412 auto& settings = m_renderView.settings();
413 bool hasAcceleratedCompositing = settings.acceleratedCompositingEnabled();
414
415 // We allow the chrome to override the settings, in case the page is rendered
416 // on a chrome that doesn't allow accelerated compositing.
417 if (hasAcceleratedCompositing) {
418 m_compositingTriggers = page().chrome().client().allowedCompositingTriggers();
419 hasAcceleratedCompositing = m_compositingTriggers;
420 }
421
422 bool showDebugBorders = settings.showDebugBorders();
423 bool showRepaintCounter = settings.showRepaintCounter();
424 bool acceleratedDrawingEnabled = settings.acceleratedDrawingEnabled();
425 bool displayListDrawingEnabled = settings.displayListDrawingEnabled();
426
427 // forceCompositingMode for subframes can only be computed after layout.
428 bool forceCompositingMode = m_forceCompositingMode;
429 if (isMainFrameCompositor())
430 forceCompositingMode = m_renderView.settings().forceCompositingMode() && hasAcceleratedCompositing;
431
432 if (hasAcceleratedCompositing != m_hasAcceleratedCompositing || showDebugBorders != m_showDebugBorders || showRepaintCounter != m_showRepaintCounter || forceCompositingMode != m_forceCompositingMode) {
433 if (auto* rootLayer = m_renderView.layer()) {
434 rootLayer->setNeedsCompositingConfigurationUpdate();
435 rootLayer->setDescendantsNeedUpdateBackingAndHierarchyTraversal();
436 }
437 }
438
439 bool debugBordersChanged = m_showDebugBorders != showDebugBorders;
440 m_hasAcceleratedCompositing = hasAcceleratedCompositing;
441 m_forceCompositingMode = forceCompositingMode;
442 m_showDebugBorders = showDebugBorders;
443 m_showRepaintCounter = showRepaintCounter;
444 m_acceleratedDrawingEnabled = acceleratedDrawingEnabled;
445 m_displayListDrawingEnabled = displayListDrawingEnabled;
446
447 if (debugBordersChanged) {
448 if (m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar)
449 m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar->setShowDebugBorder(m_showDebugBorders);
450
451 if (m_layerForVerticalScrollbar)
452 m_layerForVerticalScrollbar->setShowDebugBorder(m_showDebugBorders);
453
454 if (m_layerForScrollCorner)
455 m_layerForScrollCorner->setShowDebugBorder(m_showDebugBorders);
456 }
457
458 if (updateCompositingPolicy())
459 rootRenderLayer().setDescendantsNeedCompositingRequirementsTraversal();
460}
461
462void RenderLayerCompositor::cacheAcceleratedCompositingFlagsAfterLayout()
463{
464 cacheAcceleratedCompositingFlags();
465
466 if (isMainFrameCompositor())
467 return;
468
469 RequiresCompositingData queryData;
470 bool forceCompositingMode = m_hasAcceleratedCompositing && m_renderView.settings().forceCompositingMode() && requiresCompositingForScrollableFrame(queryData);
471 if (forceCompositingMode != m_forceCompositingMode) {
472 m_forceCompositingMode = forceCompositingMode;
473 rootRenderLayer().setDescendantsNeedCompositingRequirementsTraversal();
474 }
475}
476
477bool RenderLayerCompositor::updateCompositingPolicy()
478{
479 if (!usesCompositing())
480 return false;
481
482 auto currentPolicy = m_compositingPolicy;
483 if (page().compositingPolicyOverride()) {
484 m_compositingPolicy = page().compositingPolicyOverride().value();
485 return m_compositingPolicy != currentPolicy;
486 }
487
488 static auto cachedMemoryPolicy = WTF::MemoryUsagePolicy::Unrestricted;
489 static MonotonicTime cachedMemoryPolicyTime;
490 static constexpr auto memoryPolicyCachingDuration = 2_s;
491 auto now = MonotonicTime::now();
492 if (now - cachedMemoryPolicyTime > memoryPolicyCachingDuration) {
493 cachedMemoryPolicy = MemoryPressureHandler::currentMemoryUsagePolicy();
494 cachedMemoryPolicyTime = now;
495 }
496
497 m_compositingPolicy = cachedMemoryPolicy == WTF::MemoryUsagePolicy::Unrestricted ? CompositingPolicy::Normal : CompositingPolicy::Conservative;
498 return m_compositingPolicy != currentPolicy;
499}
500
501bool RenderLayerCompositor::canRender3DTransforms() const
502{
503 return hasAcceleratedCompositing() && (m_compositingTriggers & ChromeClient::ThreeDTransformTrigger);
504}
505
506void RenderLayerCompositor::willRecalcStyle()
507{
508 cacheAcceleratedCompositingFlags();
509}
510
511bool RenderLayerCompositor::didRecalcStyleWithNoPendingLayout()
512{
513 return updateCompositingLayers(CompositingUpdateType::AfterStyleChange);
514}
515
516void RenderLayerCompositor::customPositionForVisibleRectComputation(const GraphicsLayer* graphicsLayer, FloatPoint& position) const
517{
518 if (graphicsLayer != m_scrolledContentsLayer.get())
519 return;
520
521 FloatPoint scrollPosition = -position;
522
523 if (m_renderView.frameView().scrollBehaviorForFixedElements() == StickToDocumentBounds)
524 scrollPosition = m_renderView.frameView().constrainScrollPositionForOverhang(roundedIntPoint(scrollPosition));
525
526 position = -scrollPosition;
527}
528
529void RenderLayerCompositor::notifyFlushRequired(const GraphicsLayer*)
530{
531 scheduleRenderingUpdate();
532}
533
534void RenderLayerCompositor::scheduleRenderingUpdate()
535{
536 ASSERT(!m_flushingLayers);
537
538 page().scheduleRenderingUpdate(RenderingUpdateStep::LayerFlush);
539}
540
541FloatRect RenderLayerCompositor::visibleRectForLayerFlushing() const
542{
543 const FrameView& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
544#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
545 return frameView.exposedContentRect();
546#else
547 // Having a m_scrolledContentsLayer indicates that we're doing scrolling via GraphicsLayers.
548 FloatRect visibleRect = m_scrolledContentsLayer ? FloatRect({ }, frameView.sizeForVisibleContent()) : frameView.visibleContentRect();
549
550 if (auto exposedRect = frameView.viewExposedRect())
551 visibleRect.intersect(*exposedRect);
552
553 return visibleRect;
554#endif
555}
556
557void RenderLayerCompositor::flushPendingLayerChanges(bool isFlushRoot)
558{
559 // FrameView::flushCompositingStateIncludingSubframes() flushes each subframe,
560 // but GraphicsLayer::flushCompositingState() will cross frame boundaries
561 // if the GraphicsLayers are connected (the RootLayerAttachedViaEnclosingFrame case).
562 // As long as we're not the root of the flush, we can bail.
563 if (!isFlushRoot && rootLayerAttachment() == RootLayerAttachedViaEnclosingFrame)
564 return;
565
566 if (rootLayerAttachment() == RootLayerUnattached) {
567 m_shouldFlushOnReattach = true;
568 return;
569 }
570
571 ASSERT(!m_flushingLayers);
572 {
573 SetForScope<bool> flushingLayersScope(m_flushingLayers, true);
574
575 if (auto* rootLayer = rootGraphicsLayer()) {
576#if ENABLE(SCROLLING_THREAD)
577 LayerTreeHitTestLocker layerLocker(scrollingCoordinator());
578#endif
579 FloatRect visibleRect = visibleRectForLayerFlushing();
580 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "\nRenderLayerCompositor " << this << " flushPendingLayerChanges (is root " << isFlushRoot << ") visible rect " << visibleRect);
581 rootLayer->flushCompositingState(visibleRect);
582 }
583
584 ASSERT(m_flushingLayers);
585
586#if ENABLE(TREE_DEBUGGING)
587 if (layersLogEnabled()) {
588 LOG(Layers, "RenderLayerCompositor::flushPendingLayerChanges");
589 showGraphicsLayerTree(rootGraphicsLayer());
590 }
591#endif
592 }
593
594#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
595 updateScrollCoordinatedLayersAfterFlushIncludingSubframes();
596
597 if (isFlushRoot)
598 page().chrome().client().didFlushCompositingLayers();
599#endif
600
601 ++m_layerFlushCount;
602}
603
604#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
605void RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollCoordinatedLayersAfterFlushIncludingSubframes()
606{
607 updateScrollCoordinatedLayersAfterFlush();
608
609 auto& frame = m_renderView.frameView().frame();
610 for (Frame* subframe = frame.tree().firstChild(); subframe; subframe = subframe->tree().traverseNext(&frame)) {
611 auto* view = subframe->contentRenderer();
612 if (!view)
613 continue;
614
615 view->compositor().updateScrollCoordinatedLayersAfterFlush();
616 }
617}
618
619void RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollCoordinatedLayersAfterFlush()
620{
621 if (m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator) {
622 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->registerAllViewportConstrainedLayers(*this);
623 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->registerAllScrollingLayers();
624 }
625}
626#endif
627
628void RenderLayerCompositor::didChangePlatformLayerForLayer(RenderLayer& layer, const GraphicsLayer*)
629{
630 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
631 if (!scrollingCoordinator)
632 return;
633
634 auto* backing = layer.backing();
635 if (auto nodeID = backing->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling))
636 updateScrollingNodeLayers(nodeID, layer, *scrollingCoordinator);
637
638 if (auto* clippingStack = layer.backing()->ancestorClippingStack())
639 clippingStack->updateScrollingNodeLayers(*scrollingCoordinator);
640
641 if (auto nodeID = backing->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::ViewportConstrained))
642 scrollingCoordinator->setNodeLayers(nodeID, { backing->graphicsLayer() });
643
644 if (auto nodeID = backing->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting))
645 scrollingCoordinator->setNodeLayers(nodeID, { backing->graphicsLayer() });
646
647 if (auto nodeID = backing->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::Positioning))
648 scrollingCoordinator->setNodeLayers(nodeID, { backing->graphicsLayer() });
649}
650
651void RenderLayerCompositor::didPaintBacking(RenderLayerBacking*)
652{
653 auto& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
654 frameView.setLastPaintTime(MonotonicTime::now());
655 if (frameView.milestonesPendingPaint())
656 frameView.firePaintRelatedMilestonesIfNeeded();
657}
658
659void RenderLayerCompositor::didChangeVisibleRect()
660{
661 auto* rootLayer = rootGraphicsLayer();
662 if (!rootLayer)
663 return;
664
665 FloatRect visibleRect = visibleRectForLayerFlushing();
666 bool requiresFlush = rootLayer->visibleRectChangeRequiresFlush(visibleRect);
667 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor::didChangeVisibleRect " << visibleRect << " requiresFlush " << requiresFlush);
668 if (requiresFlush)
669 scheduleRenderingUpdate();
670}
671
672void RenderLayerCompositor::notifyFlushBeforeDisplayRefresh(const GraphicsLayer*)
673{
674 if (!m_layerUpdater) {
675 PlatformDisplayID displayID = page().chrome().displayID();
676 m_layerUpdater = makeUnique<GraphicsLayerUpdater>(*this, displayID);
677 }
678
679 m_layerUpdater->scheduleUpdate();
680}
681
682void RenderLayerCompositor::flushLayersSoon(GraphicsLayerUpdater&)
683{
684 scheduleRenderingUpdate();
685}
686
687DisplayRefreshMonitorFactory* RenderLayerCompositor::displayRefreshMonitorFactory()
688{
689 return page().chrome().client().displayRefreshMonitorFactory();
690}
691
692void RenderLayerCompositor::layerTiledBackingUsageChanged(const GraphicsLayer* graphicsLayer, bool usingTiledBacking)
693{
694 if (usingTiledBacking) {
695 ++m_layersWithTiledBackingCount;
696 graphicsLayer->tiledBacking()->setIsInWindow(page().isInWindow());
697 } else {
698 ASSERT(m_layersWithTiledBackingCount > 0);
699 --m_layersWithTiledBackingCount;
700 }
701}
702
703void RenderLayerCompositor::scheduleCompositingLayerUpdate()
704{
705 if (!m_updateCompositingLayersTimer.isActive())
706 m_updateCompositingLayersTimer.startOneShot(0_s);
707}
708
709void RenderLayerCompositor::updateCompositingLayersTimerFired()
710{
711 updateCompositingLayers(CompositingUpdateType::AfterLayout);
712}
713
714void RenderLayerCompositor::cancelCompositingLayerUpdate()
715{
716 m_updateCompositingLayersTimer.stop();
717}
718
719template<typename ApplyFunctionType>
720void RenderLayerCompositor::applyToCompositedLayerIncludingDescendants(RenderLayer& layer, const ApplyFunctionType& function)
721{
722 if (layer.isComposited())
723 function(layer);
724 for (auto* childLayer = layer.firstChild(); childLayer; childLayer = childLayer->nextSibling())
725 applyToCompositedLayerIncludingDescendants(*childLayer, function);
726}
727
728void RenderLayerCompositor::updateEventRegions()
729{
730#if ENABLE(ASYNC_SCROLLING)
731 applyToCompositedLayerIncludingDescendants(*m_renderView.layer(), [](auto& layer) {
732 layer.backing()->updateEventRegion();
733 });
734#endif
735}
736
737static std::optional<ScrollingNodeID> frameHostingNodeForFrame(Frame& frame)
738{
739 if (!frame.document() || !frame.view())
740 return { };
741
742 // Find the frame's enclosing layer in our render tree.
743 auto* ownerElement = frame.document()->ownerElement();
744 if (!ownerElement)
745 return { };
746
747 auto* frameRenderer = ownerElement->renderer();
748 if (!frameRenderer || !is<RenderWidget>(frameRenderer))
749 return { };
750
751 auto& widgetRenderer = downcast<RenderWidget>(*frameRenderer);
752 if (!widgetRenderer.hasLayer() || !widgetRenderer.layer()->isComposited()) {
753 LOG(Scrolling, "frameHostingNodeForFrame: frame renderer has no layer or is not composited.");
754 return { };
755 }
756
757 if (auto frameHostingNodeID = widgetRenderer.layer()->backing()->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting))
758 return frameHostingNodeID;
759
760 return { };
761}
762
763// Returns true on a successful update.
764bool RenderLayerCompositor::updateCompositingLayers(CompositingUpdateType updateType, RenderLayer* updateRoot)
765{
766 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor " << this << " [" << m_renderView.frameView() << "] updateCompositingLayers " << updateType << " contentLayersCount " << m_contentLayersCount);
767
768 TraceScope tracingScope(CompositingUpdateStart, CompositingUpdateEnd);
769
770#if ENABLE(TREE_DEBUGGING)
771 if (compositingLogEnabled())
772 showPaintOrderTree(m_renderView.layer());
773#endif
774
775 if (updateType == CompositingUpdateType::AfterStyleChange || updateType == CompositingUpdateType::AfterLayout)
776 cacheAcceleratedCompositingFlagsAfterLayout(); // Some flags (e.g. forceCompositingMode) depend on layout.
777
778 m_updateCompositingLayersTimer.stop();
779
780 ASSERT(m_renderView.document().backForwardCacheState() == Document::NotInBackForwardCache
781 || m_renderView.document().backForwardCacheState() == Document::AboutToEnterBackForwardCache);
782
783 // Compositing layers will be updated in Document::setVisualUpdatesAllowed(bool) if suppressed here.
784 if (!m_renderView.document().visualUpdatesAllowed())
785 return false;
786
787 // Avoid updating the layers with old values. Compositing layers will be updated after the layout is finished.
788 // This happens when m_updateCompositingLayersTimer fires before layout is updated.
789 if (m_renderView.needsLayout()) {
790 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor " << this << " updateCompositingLayers " << updateType << " - m_renderView.needsLayout, bailing ");
791 return false;
792 }
793
794 if (!m_compositing && (m_forceCompositingMode || (isMainFrameCompositor() && page().pageOverlayController().overlayCount())))
795 enableCompositingMode(true);
796
797 bool isPageScroll = !updateRoot || updateRoot == &rootRenderLayer();
798 updateRoot = &rootRenderLayer();
799
800 if (updateType == CompositingUpdateType::OnScroll || updateType == CompositingUpdateType::OnCompositedScroll) {
801 // We only get here if we didn't scroll on the scrolling thread, so this update needs to re-position viewport-constrained layers.
802 if (m_renderView.settings().acceleratedCompositingForFixedPositionEnabled() && isPageScroll) {
803 if (auto* viewportConstrainedObjects = m_renderView.frameView().viewportConstrainedObjects()) {
804 for (auto& renderer : *viewportConstrainedObjects) {
805 if (auto* layer = renderer.layer())
806 layer->setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
807 }
808 }
809 }
810
811 // Scrolling can affect overlap. FIXME: avoid for page scrolling.
812 updateRoot->setDescendantsNeedCompositingRequirementsTraversal();
813 }
814
815 if (updateType == CompositingUpdateType::AfterLayout) {
816 // Ensure that post-layout updates push new scroll position and viewport rects onto the root node.
817 rootRenderLayer().setNeedsScrollingTreeUpdate();
818 }
819
820 if (!updateRoot->hasDescendantNeedingCompositingRequirementsTraversal() && !m_compositing) {
821 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << " no compositing work to do");
822 return true;
823 }
824
825 if (!updateRoot->needsAnyCompositingTraversal()) {
826 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << " updateRoot has no dirty child and doesn't need update");
827 return true;
828 }
829
830 ++m_compositingUpdateCount;
831
832 SetForScope<bool> postLayoutChange(m_inPostLayoutUpdate, true);
833
834#if !LOG_DISABLED
835 MonotonicTime startTime;
836 if (compositingLogEnabled()) {
837 ++m_rootLayerUpdateCount;
838 startTime = MonotonicTime::now();
839 }
840
841 if (compositingLogEnabled()) {
842 m_obligateCompositedLayerCount = 0;
843 m_secondaryCompositedLayerCount = 0;
844 m_obligatoryBackingStoreBytes = 0;
845 m_secondaryBackingStoreBytes = 0;
846
847 auto& frame = m_renderView.frameView().frame();
848 bool isMainFrame = isMainFrameCompositor();
849 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "\nUpdate " << m_rootLayerUpdateCount << " of " << (isMainFrame ? "main frame" : frame.tree().uniqueName().string().utf8().data()) << " - compositing policy is " << m_compositingPolicy);
850 }
851#endif
852
853 // FIXME: optimize root-only update.
854 if (updateRoot->hasDescendantNeedingCompositingRequirementsTraversal() || updateRoot->needsCompositingRequirementsTraversal()) {
855 auto& rootLayer = rootRenderLayer();
856 CompositingState compositingState(updateRoot);
857 BackingSharingState backingSharingState;
858 LayerOverlapMap overlapMap(rootLayer);
859
860 bool descendantHas3DTransform = false;
861 computeCompositingRequirements(nullptr, rootLayer, overlapMap, compositingState, backingSharingState, descendantHas3DTransform);
862 }
863
864 LOG(Compositing, "\nRenderLayerCompositor::updateCompositingLayers - mid");
865#if ENABLE(TREE_DEBUGGING)
866 if (compositingLogEnabled())
867 showPaintOrderTree(m_renderView.layer());
868#endif
869
870 if (updateRoot->hasDescendantNeedingUpdateBackingOrHierarchyTraversal() || updateRoot->needsUpdateBackingOrHierarchyTraversal()) {
871 ScrollingTreeState scrollingTreeState = { 0, 0 };
872 if (!m_renderView.frame().isMainFrame())
873 scrollingTreeState.parentNodeID = frameHostingNodeForFrame(m_renderView.frame());
874
875 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
876 bool hadSubscrollers = scrollingCoordinator ? scrollingCoordinator->hasSubscrollers() : false;
877
878 UpdateBackingTraversalState traversalState;
879 Vector<Ref<GraphicsLayer>> childList;
880 updateBackingAndHierarchy(*updateRoot, childList, traversalState, scrollingTreeState);
881
882 if (scrollingTreeState.needSynchronousScrollingReasonsUpdate)
883 updateSynchronousScrollingNodes();
884
885 // Host the document layer in the RenderView's root layer.
886 appendDocumentOverlayLayers(childList);
887 // Even when childList is empty, don't drop out of compositing mode if there are
888 // composited layers that we didn't hit in our traversal (e.g. because of visibility:hidden).
889 if (childList.isEmpty() && !needsCompositingForContentOrOverlays())
890 destroyRootLayer();
891 else if (m_rootContentsLayer)
892 m_rootContentsLayer->setChildren(WTFMove(childList));
893
894 if (scrollingCoordinator && scrollingCoordinator->hasSubscrollers() != hadSubscrollers)
895 invalidateEventRegionForAllFrames();
896 }
897
898#if !LOG_DISABLED
899 if (compositingLogEnabled()) {
900 MonotonicTime endTime = MonotonicTime::now();
901 LOG(Compositing, "Total layers primary secondary obligatory backing (KB) secondary backing(KB) total backing (KB) update time (ms)\n");
902
903 LOG(Compositing, "%8d %11d %9d %20.2f %22.2f %22.2f %18.2f\n",
904 m_obligateCompositedLayerCount + m_secondaryCompositedLayerCount, m_obligateCompositedLayerCount,
905 m_secondaryCompositedLayerCount, m_obligatoryBackingStoreBytes / 1024, m_secondaryBackingStoreBytes / 1024, (m_obligatoryBackingStoreBytes + m_secondaryBackingStoreBytes) / 1024, (endTime - startTime).milliseconds());
906 }
907#endif
908
909 // FIXME: Only do if dirty.
910 updateRootLayerPosition();
911
912#if ENABLE(TREE_DEBUGGING)
913 if (compositingLogEnabled()) {
914 LOG(Compositing, "RenderLayerCompositor::updateCompositingLayers - post");
915 showPaintOrderTree(m_renderView.layer());
916 }
917#endif
918
919 InspectorInstrumentation::layerTreeDidChange(&page());
920
921 if (m_renderView.needsRepaintHackAfterCompositingLayerUpdateForDebugOverlaysOnly()) {
922 m_renderView.repaintRootContents();
923 m_renderView.setNeedsRepaintHackAfterCompositingLayerUpdateForDebugOverlaysOnly(false);
924 }
925
926 return true;
927}
928
929static bool backingProviderLayerCanIncludeLayer(const RenderLayer& sharedLayer, const RenderLayer& layer)
930{
931 // Disable sharing when painting shared layers doesn't work correctly.
932 if (layer.hasReflection())
933 return false;
934
935 return layer.ancestorLayerIsInContainingBlockChain(sharedLayer);
936}
937
938void RenderLayerCompositor::computeCompositingRequirements(RenderLayer* ancestorLayer, RenderLayer& layer, LayerOverlapMap& overlapMap, CompositingState& compositingState, BackingSharingState& backingSharingState, bool& descendantHas3DTransform)
939{
940 layer.updateDescendantDependentFlags();
941 layer.updateLayerListsIfNeeded();
942
943 if (!layer.hasDescendantNeedingCompositingRequirementsTraversal()
944 && !layer.needsCompositingRequirementsTraversal()
945 && !compositingState.fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired
946 && !compositingState.descendantsRequireCompositingUpdate) {
947 traverseUnchangedSubtree(ancestorLayer, layer, overlapMap, compositingState, backingSharingState, descendantHas3DTransform);
948 return;
949 }
950
951 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << TextStream::Repeat(compositingState.depth * 2, ' ') << &layer << (layer.isNormalFlowOnly() ? " n" : " s") << " computeCompositingRequirements (backing provider candidate " << backingSharingState.backingProviderCandidate() << ")");
952
953 // FIXME: maybe we can avoid updating all remaining layers in paint order.
954 compositingState.fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired |= layer.needsCompositingRequirementsTraversal();
955 compositingState.descendantsRequireCompositingUpdate |= layer.descendantsNeedCompositingRequirementsTraversal();
956
957 layer.setHasCompositingDescendant(false);
958
959 // We updated compositing for direct reasons in layerStyleChanged(). Here, check for compositing that can only be evaluated after layout.
960 RequiresCompositingData queryData;
961 bool willBeComposited = layer.isComposited();
962 bool becameCompositedAfterDescendantTraversal = false;
963 IndirectCompositingReason compositingReason = compositingState.subtreeIsCompositing ? IndirectCompositingReason::Stacking : IndirectCompositingReason::None;
964
965 if (layer.needsPostLayoutCompositingUpdate() || compositingState.fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired || compositingState.descendantsRequireCompositingUpdate) {
966 layer.setIndirectCompositingReason(IndirectCompositingReason::None);
967 willBeComposited = needsToBeComposited(layer, queryData);
968 }
969
970 bool layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking = false;
971 if (!willBeComposited && compositingState.subtreeIsCompositing && backingSharingState.backingProviderCandidate() && canBeComposited(layer) && backingProviderLayerCanIncludeLayer(*backingSharingState.backingProviderCandidate(), layer)) {
972 backingSharingState.appendSharingLayer(layer);
973 LOG(Compositing, " layer %p can share with %p", &layer, backingSharingState.backingProviderCandidate());
974 compositingReason = IndirectCompositingReason::None;
975 layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking = true;
976 }
977
978 compositingState.fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired |= layer.subsequentLayersNeedCompositingRequirementsTraversal();
979
980 OverlapExtent layerExtent;
981 // Use the fact that we're composited as a hint to check for an animating transform.
982 // FIXME: Maybe needsToBeComposited() should return a bitmask of reasons, to avoid the need to recompute things.
983 if (willBeComposited && !layer.isRenderViewLayer())
984 layerExtent.hasTransformAnimation = isRunningTransformAnimation(layer.renderer());
985
986 bool respectTransforms = !layerExtent.hasTransformAnimation;
987 overlapMap.geometryMap().pushMappingsToAncestor(&layer, ancestorLayer, respectTransforms);
988
989 // If we know for sure the layer is going to be composited, don't bother looking it up in the overlap map
990 if (!willBeComposited && !layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking && !overlapMap.isEmpty() && compositingState.testingOverlap) {
991 // If we're testing for overlap, we only need to composite if we overlap something that is already composited.
992 if (layerOverlaps(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent))
993 compositingReason = IndirectCompositingReason::Overlap;
994 else
995 compositingReason = IndirectCompositingReason::None;
996 }
997
998#if ENABLE(VIDEO)
999 // Video is special. It's the only RenderLayer type that can both have
1000 // RenderLayer children and whose children can't use its backing to render
1001 // into. These children (the controls) always need to be promoted into their
1002 // own layers to draw on top of the accelerated video.
1003 if (compositingState.compositingAncestor && compositingState.compositingAncestor->renderer().isVideo())
1004 compositingReason = IndirectCompositingReason::Overlap;
1005#endif
1006
1007 if (compositingReason != IndirectCompositingReason::None)
1008 layer.setIndirectCompositingReason(compositingReason);
1009
1010 // Check if the computed indirect reason will force the layer to become composited.
1011 if (!willBeComposited && layer.mustCompositeForIndirectReasons() && canBeComposited(layer)) {
1012 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "layer " << &layer << " compositing for indirect reason " << layer.indirectCompositingReason() << " (was sharing: " << layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking << ")");
1013 willBeComposited = true;
1014 layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking = false;
1015 }
1016
1017 // The children of this layer don't need to composite, unless there is
1018 // a compositing layer among them, so start by inheriting the compositing
1019 // ancestor with subtreeIsCompositing set to false.
1020 CompositingState currentState = compositingState.stateForPaintOrderChildren(layer);
1021 bool didPushOverlapContainer = false;
1022
1023 auto layerWillComposite = [&] {
1024 // This layer is going to be composited, so children can safely ignore the fact that there's an
1025 // animation running behind this layer, meaning they can rely on the overlap map testing again.
1026 currentState.testingOverlap = true;
1027 // This layer now acts as the ancestor for kids.
1028 currentState.compositingAncestor = &layer;
1029 // Compositing turns off backing sharing.
1030 currentState.backingSharingAncestor = nullptr;
1031
1032 if (layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking) {
1033 layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking = false;
1034 // layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking was only true for layers that would otherwise composite because of overlap. If we can
1035 // no longer share, put this this indirect reason back on the layer so that requiresOwnBackingStore() sees it.
1036 layer.setIndirectCompositingReason(IndirectCompositingReason::Overlap);
1037 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "layer " << &layer << " was sharing now will composite");
1038 } else {
1039 overlapMap.pushCompositingContainer();
1040 didPushOverlapContainer = true;
1041 LOG_WITH_STREAM(CompositingOverlap, stream << "layer " << &layer << " will composite, pushed container " << overlapMap);
1042 }
1043
1044 willBeComposited = true;
1045 };
1046
1047 auto layerWillCompositePostDescendants = [&] {
1048 layerWillComposite();
1049 currentState.subtreeIsCompositing = true;
1050 becameCompositedAfterDescendantTraversal = true;
1051 };
1052
1053 if (willBeComposited) {
1054 layerWillComposite();
1055
1056 computeExtent(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent);
1057 currentState.ancestorHasTransformAnimation |= layerExtent.hasTransformAnimation;
1058 // Too hard to compute animated bounds if both us and some ancestor is animating transform.
1059 layerExtent.animationCausesExtentUncertainty |= layerExtent.hasTransformAnimation && compositingState.ancestorHasTransformAnimation;
1060 } else if (layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking) {
1061 currentState.backingSharingAncestor = &layer;
1062 overlapMap.pushCompositingContainer();
1063 didPushOverlapContainer = true;
1064 LOG_WITH_STREAM(CompositingOverlap, stream << "layer " << &layer << " will share, pushed container " << overlapMap);
1065 }
1066
1067 backingSharingState.updateBeforeDescendantTraversal(layer, willBeComposited);
1068
1069#if ASSERT_ENABLED
1070 LayerListMutationDetector mutationChecker(layer);
1071#endif
1072
1073 bool anyDescendantHas3DTransform = false;
1074 bool descendantsAddedToOverlap = currentState.hasNonRootCompositedAncestor();
1075
1076 for (auto* childLayer : layer.negativeZOrderLayers()) {
1077 computeCompositingRequirements(&layer, *childLayer, overlapMap, currentState, backingSharingState, anyDescendantHas3DTransform);
1078
1079 // If we have to make a layer for this child, make one now so we can have a contents layer
1080 // (since we need to ensure that the -ve z-order child renders underneath our contents).
1081 if (!willBeComposited && currentState.subtreeIsCompositing) {
1082 layer.setIndirectCompositingReason(IndirectCompositingReason::BackgroundLayer);
1083 layerWillComposite();
1084 }
1085 }
1086
1087 for (auto* childLayer : layer.normalFlowLayers())
1088 computeCompositingRequirements(&layer, *childLayer, overlapMap, currentState, backingSharingState, anyDescendantHas3DTransform);
1089
1090 for (auto* childLayer : layer.positiveZOrderLayers())
1091 computeCompositingRequirements(&layer, *childLayer, overlapMap, currentState, backingSharingState, anyDescendantHas3DTransform);
1092
1093 // Set the flag to say that this layer has compositing children.
1094 layer.setHasCompositingDescendant(currentState.subtreeIsCompositing);
1095 layer.setHasCompositedNonContainedDescendants(currentState.hasCompositedNonContainedDescendants);
1096
1097 // If we just entered compositing mode, the root will have become composited (as long as accelerated compositing is enabled).
1098 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer()) {
1099 if (usesCompositing() && m_hasAcceleratedCompositing)
1100 willBeComposited = true;
1101 }
1102
1103#if ENABLE(CSS_COMPOSITING)
1104 bool isolatedCompositedBlending = layer.isolatesCompositedBlending();
1105 layer.setHasNotIsolatedCompositedBlendingDescendants(currentState.hasNotIsolatedCompositedBlendingDescendants);
1106 if (layer.isolatesCompositedBlending() != isolatedCompositedBlending) {
1107 // isolatedCompositedBlending affects the result of clippedByAncestor().
1108 layer.setChildrenNeedCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1109 }
1110
1111 ASSERT(!layer.hasNotIsolatedCompositedBlendingDescendants() || layer.hasNotIsolatedBlendingDescendants());
1112#endif
1113 // Now check for reasons to become composited that depend on the state of descendant layers.
1114 if (!willBeComposited && canBeComposited(layer)) {
1115 auto indirectReason = computeIndirectCompositingReason(layer, currentState.subtreeIsCompositing, anyDescendantHas3DTransform, layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking);
1116 if (indirectReason != IndirectCompositingReason::None) {
1117 layer.setIndirectCompositingReason(indirectReason);
1118 layerWillCompositePostDescendants();
1119 }
1120 }
1121
1122 if (layer.reflectionLayer()) {
1123 // FIXME: Shouldn't we call computeCompositingRequirements to handle a reflection overlapping with another renderer?
1124 layer.reflectionLayer()->setIndirectCompositingReason(willBeComposited ? IndirectCompositingReason::Stacking : IndirectCompositingReason::None);
1125 }
1126
1127 // If we're back at the root, and no other layers need to be composited, and the root layer itself doesn't need
1128 // to be composited, then we can drop out of compositing mode altogether. However, don't drop out of compositing mode
1129 // if there are composited layers that we didn't hit in our traversal (e.g. because of visibility:hidden).
1130 RequiresCompositingData rootLayerQueryData;
1131 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer() && !currentState.subtreeIsCompositing && !requiresCompositingLayer(layer, rootLayerQueryData) && !m_forceCompositingMode && !needsCompositingForContentOrOverlays()) {
1132 // Don't drop out of compositing on iOS, because we may flash. See <rdar://problem/8348337>.
1133#if !PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
1134 enableCompositingMode(false);
1135 willBeComposited = false;
1136#endif
1137 }
1138
1139 ASSERT(willBeComposited == needsToBeComposited(layer, queryData));
1140
1141 // Create or destroy backing here. However, we can't update geometry because layers above us may become composited
1142 // during post-order traversal (e.g. for clipping).
1143 if (updateBacking(layer, queryData, &backingSharingState, willBeComposited ? BackingRequired::Yes : BackingRequired::No)) {
1144 layer.setNeedsCompositingLayerConnection();
1145 // Child layers need to get a geometry update to recompute their position.
1146 layer.setChildrenNeedCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1147 // The composited bounds of enclosing layers depends on which descendants are composited, so they need a geometry update.
1148 layer.setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdateOnAncestors();
1149 }
1150
1151 // Update layer state bits.
1152 if (layer.reflectionLayer() && updateLayerCompositingState(*layer.reflectionLayer(), &layer, queryData, backingSharingState))
1153 layer.setNeedsCompositingLayerConnection();
1154
1155 // FIXME: clarify needsCompositingPaintOrderChildrenUpdate. If a composited layer gets a new ancestor, it needs geometry computations.
1156 if (layer.needsCompositingPaintOrderChildrenUpdate()) {
1157 layer.setChildrenNeedCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1158 layer.setNeedsCompositingLayerConnection();
1159 }
1160
1161 layer.clearCompositingRequirementsTraversalState();
1162
1163 // Compute state passed to the caller.
1164 descendantHas3DTransform |= anyDescendantHas3DTransform || layer.has3DTransform();
1165 compositingState.updateWithDescendantStateAndLayer(currentState, layer, ancestorLayer, layerExtent);
1166 backingSharingState.updateAfterDescendantTraversal(layer, compositingState.stackingContextAncestor);
1167
1168 bool layerContributesToOverlap = (currentState.compositingAncestor && !currentState.compositingAncestor->isRenderViewLayer()) || currentState.backingSharingAncestor;
1169 updateOverlapMap(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent, didPushOverlapContainer, layerContributesToOverlap, becameCompositedAfterDescendantTraversal && !descendantsAddedToOverlap);
1170
1171 if (layer.isComposited())
1172 layer.backing()->updateAllowsBackingStoreDetaching(layerExtent.bounds);
1173
1174 overlapMap.geometryMap().popMappingsToAncestor(ancestorLayer);
1175
1176 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << TextStream::Repeat(compositingState.depth * 2, ' ') << &layer << " computeCompositingRequirements - willBeComposited " << willBeComposited << " (backing provider candidate " << backingSharingState.backingProviderCandidate() << ")");
1177}
1178
1179// We have to traverse unchanged layers to fill in the overlap map.
1180void RenderLayerCompositor::traverseUnchangedSubtree(RenderLayer* ancestorLayer, RenderLayer& layer, LayerOverlapMap& overlapMap, CompositingState& compositingState, BackingSharingState& backingSharingState, bool& descendantHas3DTransform)
1181{
1182 layer.updateDescendantDependentFlags();
1183 layer.updateLayerListsIfNeeded();
1184
1185 ASSERT(!compositingState.fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired);
1186 ASSERT(!layer.hasDescendantNeedingCompositingRequirementsTraversal());
1187 ASSERT(!layer.needsCompositingRequirementsTraversal());
1188
1189 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << TextStream::Repeat(compositingState.depth * 2, ' ') << &layer << (layer.isNormalFlowOnly() ? " n" : " s") << " traverseUnchangedSubtree");
1190
1191 bool layerIsComposited = layer.isComposited();
1192 bool layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking = false;
1193 bool didPushOverlapContainer = false;
1194
1195 OverlapExtent layerExtent;
1196 if (layerIsComposited && !layer.isRenderViewLayer())
1197 layerExtent.hasTransformAnimation = isRunningTransformAnimation(layer.renderer());
1198
1199 bool respectTransforms = !layerExtent.hasTransformAnimation;
1200 overlapMap.geometryMap().pushMappingsToAncestor(&layer, ancestorLayer, respectTransforms);
1201
1202 // If we know for sure the layer is going to be composited, don't bother looking it up in the overlap map
1203 if (!layerIsComposited && !overlapMap.isEmpty() && compositingState.testingOverlap)
1204 computeExtent(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent);
1205
1206 if (layer.paintsIntoProvidedBacking()) {
1207 ASSERT(backingSharingState.backingProviderCandidate());
1208 ASSERT(backingProviderLayerCanIncludeLayer(*backingSharingState.backingProviderCandidate(), layer));
1209 backingSharingState.appendSharingLayer(layer);
1210 layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking = true;
1211 }
1212
1213 CompositingState currentState = compositingState.stateForPaintOrderChildren(layer);
1214
1215 if (layerIsComposited) {
1216 // This layer is going to be composited, so children can safely ignore the fact that there's an
1217 // animation running behind this layer, meaning they can rely on the overlap map testing again.
1218 currentState.testingOverlap = true;
1219 // This layer now acts as the ancestor for kids.
1220 currentState.compositingAncestor = &layer;
1221 currentState.backingSharingAncestor = nullptr;
1222 overlapMap.pushCompositingContainer();
1223 didPushOverlapContainer = true;
1224 LOG_WITH_STREAM(CompositingOverlap, stream << "unchangedSubtree: layer " << &layer << " will composite, pushed container " << overlapMap);
1225
1226 computeExtent(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent);
1227 currentState.ancestorHasTransformAnimation |= layerExtent.hasTransformAnimation;
1228 // Too hard to compute animated bounds if both us and some ancestor is animating transform.
1229 layerExtent.animationCausesExtentUncertainty |= layerExtent.hasTransformAnimation && compositingState.ancestorHasTransformAnimation;
1230 } else if (layerPaintsIntoProvidedBacking) {
1231 overlapMap.pushCompositingContainer();
1232 currentState.backingSharingAncestor = &layer;
1233 didPushOverlapContainer = true;
1234 LOG_WITH_STREAM(CompositingOverlap, stream << "unchangedSubtree: layer " << &layer << " will share, pushed container " << overlapMap);
1235 }
1236
1237 backingSharingState.updateBeforeDescendantTraversal(layer, layerIsComposited);
1238
1239#if ASSERT_ENABLED
1240 LayerListMutationDetector mutationChecker(layer);
1241#endif
1242
1243 bool anyDescendantHas3DTransform = false;
1244
1245 for (auto* childLayer : layer.negativeZOrderLayers()) {
1246 traverseUnchangedSubtree(&layer, *childLayer, overlapMap, currentState, backingSharingState, anyDescendantHas3DTransform);
1247 if (currentState.subtreeIsCompositing)
1248 ASSERT(layerIsComposited);
1249 }
1250
1251 for (auto* childLayer : layer.normalFlowLayers())
1252 traverseUnchangedSubtree(&layer, *childLayer, overlapMap, currentState, backingSharingState, anyDescendantHas3DTransform);
1253
1254 for (auto* childLayer : layer.positiveZOrderLayers())
1255 traverseUnchangedSubtree(&layer, *childLayer, overlapMap, currentState, backingSharingState, anyDescendantHas3DTransform);
1256
1257 // Set the flag to say that this layer has compositing children.
1258 ASSERT(layer.hasCompositingDescendant() == currentState.subtreeIsCompositing);
1259 ASSERT_IMPLIES(canBeComposited(layer) && clipsCompositingDescendants(layer), layerIsComposited);
1260
1261 descendantHas3DTransform |= anyDescendantHas3DTransform || layer.has3DTransform();
1262
1263 ASSERT(!currentState.fullPaintOrderTraversalRequired);
1264 compositingState.updateWithDescendantStateAndLayer(currentState, layer, ancestorLayer, layerExtent, true);
1265 backingSharingState.updateAfterDescendantTraversal(layer, compositingState.stackingContextAncestor);
1266
1267 bool layerContributesToOverlap = (currentState.compositingAncestor && !currentState.compositingAncestor->isRenderViewLayer()) || currentState.backingSharingAncestor;
1268 updateOverlapMap(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent, didPushOverlapContainer, layerContributesToOverlap);
1269
1270 overlapMap.geometryMap().popMappingsToAncestor(ancestorLayer);
1271
1272 ASSERT(!layer.needsCompositingRequirementsTraversal());
1273}
1274
1275void RenderLayerCompositor::updateBackingAndHierarchy(RenderLayer& layer, Vector<Ref<GraphicsLayer>>& childLayersOfEnclosingLayer, UpdateBackingTraversalState& traversalState, ScrollingTreeState& scrollingTreeState, OptionSet<UpdateLevel> updateLevel)
1276{
1277 layer.updateDescendantDependentFlags();
1278 layer.updateLayerListsIfNeeded();
1279
1280 bool layerNeedsUpdate = !updateLevel.isEmpty();
1281 if (layer.descendantsNeedUpdateBackingAndHierarchyTraversal())
1282 updateLevel.add(UpdateLevel::AllDescendants);
1283
1284 ScrollingTreeState scrollingStateForDescendants = scrollingTreeState;
1285 UpdateBackingTraversalState traversalStateForDescendants = traversalState.stateForDescendants();
1286 Vector<RenderLayer*> layersClippedByScrollers;
1287 Vector<RenderLayer*> compositedOverflowScrollLayers;
1288
1289 if (layer.needsScrollingTreeUpdate())
1290 scrollingTreeState.needSynchronousScrollingReasonsUpdate = true;
1291
1292 auto* layerBacking = layer.backing();
1293 if (layerBacking) {
1294 updateLevel.remove(UpdateLevel::CompositedChildren);
1295
1296 // We updated the composited bounds in RenderLayerBacking::updateAfterLayout(), but it may have changed
1297 // based on which descendants are now composited.
1298 if (layerBacking->updateCompositedBounds()) {
1299 layer.setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1300 // Our geometry can affect descendants.
1301 updateLevel.add(UpdateLevel::CompositedChildren);
1302 }
1303
1304 if (layerNeedsUpdate || layer.needsCompositingConfigurationUpdate()) {
1305 if (layerBacking->updateConfiguration(traversalState.compositingAncestor)) {
1306 layerNeedsUpdate = true; // We also need to update geometry.
1307 layer.setNeedsCompositingLayerConnection();
1308 }
1309
1310 layerBacking->updateDebugIndicators(m_showDebugBorders, m_showRepaintCounter);
1311 }
1312
1313 OptionSet<ScrollingNodeChangeFlags> scrollingNodeChanges = { ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::Layer };
1314 if (layerNeedsUpdate || layer.needsCompositingGeometryUpdate()) {
1315 layerBacking->updateGeometry(traversalState.compositingAncestor);
1316 scrollingNodeChanges.add(ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::LayerGeometry);
1317 } else if (layer.needsScrollingTreeUpdate())
1318 scrollingNodeChanges.add(ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::LayerGeometry);
1319
1320 if (auto* reflection = layer.reflectionLayer()) {
1321 if (auto* reflectionBacking = reflection->backing()) {
1322 reflectionBacking->updateCompositedBounds();
1323 reflectionBacking->updateGeometry(&layer);
1324 reflectionBacking->updateAfterDescendants();
1325 }
1326 }
1327
1328 if (!layer.parent())
1329 updateRootLayerPosition();
1330
1331 // FIXME: do based on dirty flags. Need to do this for changes of geometry, configuration and hierarchy.
1332 // Need to be careful to do the right thing when a scroll-coordinated layer loses a scroll-coordinated ancestor.
1333 scrollingStateForDescendants.parentNodeID = updateScrollCoordinationForLayer(layer, traversalState.compositingAncestor, scrollingTreeState, scrollingNodeChanges);
1334 scrollingStateForDescendants.nextChildIndex = 0;
1335
1336 traversalStateForDescendants.compositingAncestor = &layer;
1337 traversalStateForDescendants.layersClippedByScrollers = &layersClippedByScrollers;
1338 traversalStateForDescendants.overflowScrollLayers = &compositedOverflowScrollLayers;
1339
1340#if !LOG_DISABLED
1341 logLayerInfo(layer, "updateBackingAndHierarchy", traversalState.depth);
1342#endif
1343 }
1344
1345 if (layer.childrenNeedCompositingGeometryUpdate())
1346 updateLevel.add(UpdateLevel::CompositedChildren);
1347
1348 // If this layer has backing, then we are collecting its children, otherwise appending
1349 // to the compositing child list of an enclosing layer.
1350 Vector<Ref<GraphicsLayer>> layerChildren;
1351 auto& childList = layerBacking ? layerChildren : childLayersOfEnclosingLayer;
1352
1353 bool requireDescendantTraversal = layer.hasDescendantNeedingUpdateBackingOrHierarchyTraversal()
1354 || (layer.hasCompositingDescendant() && (!layerBacking || layer.needsCompositingLayerConnection() || !updateLevel.isEmpty()));
1355
1356 bool requiresChildRebuild = layerBacking && layer.needsCompositingLayerConnection() && !layer.hasCompositingDescendant();
1357
1358#if ASSERT_ENABLED
1359 LayerListMutationDetector mutationChecker(layer);
1360#endif
1361
1362 auto appendForegroundLayerIfNecessary = [&] {
1363 // If a negative z-order child is compositing, we get a foreground layer which needs to get parented.
1364 if (layer.negativeZOrderLayers().size()) {
1365 if (layerBacking && layerBacking->foregroundLayer())
1366 childList.append(*layerBacking->foregroundLayer());
1367 }
1368 };
1369
1370 if (requireDescendantTraversal) {
1371 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.negativeZOrderLayers())
1372 updateBackingAndHierarchy(*renderLayer, childList, traversalStateForDescendants, scrollingStateForDescendants, updateLevel);
1373
1374 appendForegroundLayerIfNecessary();
1375
1376 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.normalFlowLayers())
1377 updateBackingAndHierarchy(*renderLayer, childList, traversalStateForDescendants, scrollingStateForDescendants, updateLevel);
1378
1379 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.positiveZOrderLayers())
1380 updateBackingAndHierarchy(*renderLayer, childList, traversalStateForDescendants, scrollingStateForDescendants, updateLevel);
1381
1382 // Pass needSynchronousScrollingReasonsUpdate back up.
1383 scrollingTreeState.needSynchronousScrollingReasonsUpdate |= scrollingStateForDescendants.needSynchronousScrollingReasonsUpdate;
1384 if (scrollingTreeState.parentNodeID == scrollingStateForDescendants.parentNodeID)
1385 scrollingTreeState.nextChildIndex = scrollingStateForDescendants.nextChildIndex;
1386
1387 } else if (requiresChildRebuild)
1388 appendForegroundLayerIfNecessary();
1389
1390 if (layerBacking) {
1391 if (requireDescendantTraversal || requiresChildRebuild) {
1392 bool parented = false;
1393 if (is<RenderWidget>(layer.renderer()))
1394 parented = parentFrameContentLayers(downcast<RenderWidget>(layer.renderer()));
1395
1396 if (!parented) {
1397 // If the layer has a clipping layer the overflow controls layers will be siblings of the clipping layer.
1398 // Otherwise, the overflow control layers are normal children.
1399 if (!layerBacking->hasClippingLayer() && !layerBacking->hasScrollingLayer()) {
1400 if (auto* overflowControlLayer = layerBacking->overflowControlsContainer())
1401 layerChildren.append(*overflowControlLayer);
1402 }
1403
1404 adjustOverflowScrollbarContainerLayers(layer, compositedOverflowScrollLayers, layersClippedByScrollers, layerChildren);
1405 layerBacking->parentForSublayers()->setChildren(WTFMove(layerChildren));
1406 }
1407 }
1408
1409 childLayersOfEnclosingLayer.append(*layerBacking->childForSuperlayers());
1410
1411 if (layerBacking->hasAncestorClippingLayers() && layerBacking->ancestorClippingStack()->hasAnyScrollingLayers())
1412 traversalState.layersClippedByScrollers->append(&layer);
1413
1414 if (layer.hasCompositedScrollableOverflow())
1415 traversalState.overflowScrollLayers->append(&layer);
1416
1417 layerBacking->updateAfterDescendants();
1418 }
1419
1420 layer.clearUpdateBackingOrHierarchyTraversalState();
1421}
1422
1423// Finds the set of overflow:scroll layers whose overflow controls hosting layer needs to be reparented,
1424// to ensure that the scrollbars show on top of positioned content inside the scroller.
1425void RenderLayerCompositor::adjustOverflowScrollbarContainerLayers(RenderLayer& stackingContextLayer, const Vector<RenderLayer*>& overflowScrollLayers, const Vector<RenderLayer*>& layersClippedByScrollers, Vector<Ref<GraphicsLayer>>& layerChildren)
1426{
1427 if (layersClippedByScrollers.isEmpty())
1428 return;
1429
1430 HashMap<RenderLayer*, RenderLayer*> overflowScrollToLastContainedLayerMap;
1431
1432 for (auto* clippedLayer : layersClippedByScrollers) {
1433 auto* clippingStack = clippedLayer->backing()->ancestorClippingStack();
1434
1435 for (const auto& stackEntry : clippingStack->stack()) {
1436 if (!stackEntry.clipData.isOverflowScroll)
1437 continue;
1438
1439 if (auto* layer = stackEntry.clipData.clippingLayer.get())
1440 overflowScrollToLastContainedLayerMap.set(layer, clippedLayer);
1441 }
1442 }
1443
1444 for (auto* overflowScrollingLayer : overflowScrollLayers) {
1445 auto it = overflowScrollToLastContainedLayerMap.find(overflowScrollingLayer);
1446 if (it == overflowScrollToLastContainedLayerMap.end())
1447 continue;
1448
1449 auto* lastContainedDescendant = it->value;
1450 if (!lastContainedDescendant || !lastContainedDescendant->isComposited())
1451 continue;
1452
1453 auto* lastContainedDescendantBacking = lastContainedDescendant->backing();
1454 auto* overflowBacking = overflowScrollingLayer->backing();
1455 if (!overflowBacking)
1456 continue;
1457
1458 auto* overflowContainerLayer = overflowBacking->overflowControlsContainer();
1459 if (!overflowContainerLayer)
1460 continue;
1461
1462 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "Moving overflow controls layer for " << overflowScrollingLayer << " to appear after " << lastContainedDescendant);
1463
1464 overflowContainerLayer->removeFromParent();
1465
1466 if (overflowBacking->hasAncestorClippingLayers())
1467 overflowBacking->ensureOverflowControlsHostLayerAncestorClippingStack(&stackingContextLayer);
1468
1469 if (auto* overflowControlsAncestorClippingStack = overflowBacking->overflowControlsHostLayerAncestorClippingStack()) {
1470 Vector<Ref<GraphicsLayer>> children;
1471 children.append(*overflowContainerLayer);
1472 overflowControlsAncestorClippingStack->lastClippingLayer()->setChildren(WTFMove(children));
1473 overflowContainerLayer = overflowControlsAncestorClippingStack->firstClippingLayer();
1474 }
1475
1476 auto* lastDescendantGraphicsLayer = lastContainedDescendantBacking->childForSuperlayers();
1477 auto lastDescendantIndex = layerChildren.findMatching([&](auto& item) {
1478 return item.ptr() == lastDescendantGraphicsLayer;
1479 });
1480
1481 if (lastDescendantIndex != notFound)
1482 layerChildren.insert(lastDescendantIndex + 1, *overflowContainerLayer);
1483
1484 overflowBacking->adjustOverflowControlsPositionRelativeToAncestor(stackingContextLayer);
1485 }
1486}
1487
1488void RenderLayerCompositor::appendDocumentOverlayLayers(Vector<Ref<GraphicsLayer>>& childList)
1489{
1490 if (!isMainFrameCompositor() || !m_compositing)
1491 return;
1492
1493 if (!page().pageOverlayController().hasDocumentOverlays())
1494 return;
1495
1496 Ref<GraphicsLayer> overlayHost = page().pageOverlayController().layerWithDocumentOverlays();
1497 childList.append(WTFMove(overlayHost));
1498}
1499
1500bool RenderLayerCompositor::needsCompositingForContentOrOverlays() const
1501{
1502 return m_contentLayersCount + page().pageOverlayController().overlayCount();
1503}
1504
1505void RenderLayerCompositor::layerBecameComposited(const RenderLayer& layer)
1506{
1507 if (&layer != m_renderView.layer())
1508 ++m_contentLayersCount;
1509}
1510
1511void RenderLayerCompositor::layerBecameNonComposited(const RenderLayer& layer)
1512{
1513 // Inform the inspector that the given RenderLayer was destroyed.
1514 // FIXME: "destroyed" is a misnomer.
1515 InspectorInstrumentation::renderLayerDestroyed(&page(), layer);
1516
1517 if (&layer != m_renderView.layer()) {
1518 ASSERT(m_contentLayersCount > 0);
1519 --m_contentLayersCount;
1520 }
1521}
