1523#if !LOG_DISABLED
1524void RenderLayerCompositor::logLayerInfo(const RenderLayer& layer, const char* phase, int depth)
1525{
1526 if (!compositingLogEnabled())
1527 return;
1528
1529 auto* backing = layer.backing();
1530 RequiresCompositingData queryData;
1531 if (requiresCompositingLayer(layer, queryData) || layer.isRenderViewLayer()) {
1532 ++m_obligateCompositedLayerCount;
1533 m_obligatoryBackingStoreBytes += backing->backingStoreMemoryEstimate();
1534 } else {
1535 ++m_secondaryCompositedLayerCount;
1536 m_secondaryBackingStoreBytes += backing->backingStoreMemoryEstimate();
1537 }
1538
1539 LayoutRect absoluteBounds = backing->compositedBounds();
1540 absoluteBounds.move(layer.offsetFromAncestor(m_renderView.layer()));
1541
1542 StringBuilder logString;
1543 logString.append(pad(' ', 12 + depth * 2, hex(reinterpret_cast<uintptr_t>(&layer), Lowercase)), " id ", backing->graphicsLayer()->primaryLayerID(), " (", absoluteBounds.x().toFloat(), ',', absoluteBounds.y().toFloat(), '-', absoluteBounds.maxX().toFloat(), ',', absoluteBounds.maxY().toFloat(), ") ", FormattedNumber::fixedWidth(backing->backingStoreMemoryEstimate() / 1024, 2), "KB");
1544
1545 if (!layer.renderer().style().hasAutoUsedZIndex())
1546 logString.append(" z-index: ", layer.renderer().style().usedZIndex());
1547
1548 logString.append(" (", logOneReasonForCompositing(layer), ") ");
1549
1550 if (backing->graphicsLayer()->contentsOpaque() || backing->paintsIntoCompositedAncestor() || backing->foregroundLayer() || backing->backgroundLayer()) {
1551 logString.append('[');
1552
1553 const char* prefix = "";
1554 if (backing->graphicsLayer()->contentsOpaque()) {
1555 logString.append("opaque");
1556 prefix = ", ";
1557 }
1558
1559 if (backing->paintsIntoCompositedAncestor()) {
1560 logString.append(prefix, "paints into ancestor");
1561 prefix = ", ";
1562 }
1563
1564 if (backing->foregroundLayer() || backing->backgroundLayer()) {
1565 if (backing->foregroundLayer() && backing->backgroundLayer()) {
1566 logString.append(prefix, "+foreground+background");
1567 prefix = ", ";
1568 } else if (backing->foregroundLayer()) {
1569 logString.append(prefix, "+foreground");
1570 prefix = ", ";
1571 } else {
1572 logString.append(prefix, "+background");
1573 prefix = ", ";
1574 }
1575 }
1576
1577 if (backing->paintsSubpixelAntialiasedText())
1578 logString.append(prefix, "texty");
1579
1580 logString.append("] ");
1581 }
1582
1583 logString.append(layer.name(), " - ", phase);
1584
1585 LOG(Compositing, "%s", logString.toString().utf8().data());
1586}
1587#endif
1588
1589static bool clippingChanged(const RenderStyle& oldStyle, const RenderStyle& newStyle)
1590{
1591 return oldStyle.overflowX() != newStyle.overflowX() || oldStyle.overflowY() != newStyle.overflowY()
1592 || oldStyle.hasClip() != newStyle.hasClip() || oldStyle.clip() != newStyle.clip();
1593}
1594
1595static bool styleAffectsLayerGeometry(const RenderStyle& style)
1596{
1597 return style.hasClip() || style.clipPath() || style.hasBorderRadius();
1598}
1599
1600static bool recompositeChangeRequiresGeometryUpdate(const RenderStyle& oldStyle, const RenderStyle& newStyle)
1601{
1602 return oldStyle.transform() != newStyle.transform()
1603 || oldStyle.translate() != newStyle.translate()
1604 || oldStyle.scale() != newStyle.scale()
1605 || oldStyle.rotate() != newStyle.rotate()
1606 || oldStyle.transformOriginX() != newStyle.transformOriginX()
1607 || oldStyle.transformOriginY() != newStyle.transformOriginY()
1608 || oldStyle.transformOriginZ() != newStyle.transformOriginZ()
1609 || oldStyle.transformStyle3D() != newStyle.transformStyle3D()
1610 || oldStyle.perspective() != newStyle.perspective()
1611 || oldStyle.perspectiveOriginX() != newStyle.perspectiveOriginX()
1612 || oldStyle.perspectiveOriginY() != newStyle.perspectiveOriginY()
1613 || oldStyle.backfaceVisibility() != newStyle.backfaceVisibility()
1614 || !arePointingToEqualData(oldStyle.clipPath(), newStyle.clipPath());
1615}
1616
1617void RenderLayerCompositor::layerStyleChanged(StyleDifference diff, RenderLayer& layer, const RenderStyle* oldStyle)
1618{
1619 if (diff == StyleDifference::Equal)
1620 return;
1621
1622 // Create or destroy backing here so that code that runs during layout can reliably use isComposited() (though this
1623 // is only true for layers composited for direct reasons).
1624 // Also, it allows us to avoid a tree walk in updateCompositingLayers() when no layer changed its compositing state.
1625 RequiresCompositingData queryData;
1626 queryData.layoutUpToDate = LayoutUpToDate::No;
1627
1628 bool layerChanged = updateBacking(layer, queryData);
1629 if (layerChanged) {
1630 layer.setChildrenNeedCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1631 layer.setNeedsCompositingLayerConnection();
1632 layer.setSubsequentLayersNeedCompositingRequirementsTraversal();
1633 // Ancestor layers that composited for indirect reasons (things listed in styleChangeMayAffectIndirectCompositingReasons()) need to get updated.
1634 // This could be optimized by only setting this flag on layers with the relevant styles.
1635 layer.setNeedsPostLayoutCompositingUpdateOnAncestors();
1636 }
1637
1638 if (queryData.reevaluateAfterLayout)
1639 layer.setNeedsPostLayoutCompositingUpdate();
1640
1641 const auto& newStyle = layer.renderer().style();
1642
1643 if (hasContentCompositingLayers()) {
1644 if (diff >= StyleDifference::LayoutPositionedMovementOnly) {
1645 layer.setNeedsPostLayoutCompositingUpdate();
1646 layer.setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1647 }
1648
1649 if (diff >= StyleDifference::Layout) {
1650 // FIXME: only set flags here if we know we have a composited descendant, but we might not know at this point.
1651 if (oldStyle && clippingChanged(*oldStyle, newStyle)) {
1652 if (layer.isStackingContext()) {
1653 layer.setNeedsPostLayoutCompositingUpdate(); // Layer needs to become composited if it has composited descendants.
1654 layer.setNeedsCompositingConfigurationUpdate(); // If already composited, layer needs to create/destroy clipping layer.
1655 layer.setChildrenNeedCompositingGeometryUpdate(); // Clipping layers on this layer affect descendant layer geometry.
1656 } else {
1657 // Descendant (in containing block order) compositing layers need to re-evaluate their clipping,
1658 // but they might be siblings in z-order so go up to our stacking context.
1659 if (auto* stackingContext = layer.stackingContext())
1660 stackingContext->setDescendantsNeedUpdateBackingAndHierarchyTraversal();
1661 }
1662 }
1663
1664 // These properties trigger compositing if some descendant is composited.
1665 if (oldStyle && styleChangeMayAffectIndirectCompositingReasons(*oldStyle, newStyle))
1666 layer.setNeedsPostLayoutCompositingUpdate();
1667
1668 layer.setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1669 }
1670 }
1671
1672 auto* backing = layer.backing();
1673 if (!backing)
1674 return;
1675
1676 backing->updateConfigurationAfterStyleChange();
1677
1678 if (diff >= StyleDifference::Repaint) {
1679 // Visibility change may affect geometry of the enclosing composited layer.
1680 if (oldStyle && oldStyle->visibility() != newStyle.visibility())
1681 layer.setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1682
1683 // We'll get a diff of Repaint when things like clip-path change; these might affect layer or inner-layer geometry.
1684 if (layer.isComposited() && oldStyle) {
1685 if (styleAffectsLayerGeometry(*oldStyle) || styleAffectsLayerGeometry(newStyle))
1686 layer.setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1687 }
1688 }
1689
1690 if (diff >= StyleDifference::RecompositeLayer) {
1691 if (layer.isComposited()) {
1692 if (is<RenderWidget>(layer.renderer()) || (oldStyle && oldStyle->pointerEvents() != newStyle.pointerEvents())) {
1693 // For RenderWidgets this is necessary to get iframe layers hooked up in response to scheduleInvalidateStyleAndLayerComposition().
1694 layer.setNeedsCompositingConfigurationUpdate();
1695 }
1696 }
1697 if (oldStyle && recompositeChangeRequiresGeometryUpdate(*oldStyle, newStyle)) {
1698 // FIXME: transform changes really need to trigger layout. See RenderElement::adjustStyleDifference().
1699 layer.setNeedsPostLayoutCompositingUpdate();
1700 layer.setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1701 }
1702 }
1703}
1704
1705bool RenderLayerCompositor::needsCompositingUpdateForStyleChangeOnNonCompositedLayer(RenderLayer& layer, const RenderStyle* oldStyle) const
1706{
1707 // Needed for scroll bars.
1708 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer())
1709 return true;
1710
1711 if (!oldStyle)
1712 return false;
1713
1714 const RenderStyle& newStyle = layer.renderer().style();
1715 // Visibility change may affect geometry of the enclosing composited layer.
1716 if (oldStyle->visibility() != newStyle.visibility())
1717 return true;
1718
1719 // We don't have any direct reasons for this style change to affect layer composition. Test if it might affect things indirectly.
1720 if (styleChangeMayAffectIndirectCompositingReasons(*oldStyle, newStyle))
1721 return true;
1722
1723 return false;
1724}
1725
1726bool RenderLayerCompositor::canCompositeClipPath(const RenderLayer& layer)
1727{
1728 ASSERT(layer.isComposited());
1729 ASSERT(layer.renderer().style().clipPath());
1730
1731 if (layer.renderer().hasMask())
1732 return false;
1733
1734 auto& clipPath = *layer.renderer().style().clipPath();
1735 return (clipPath.type() != ClipPathOperation::Shape || clipPath.type() == ClipPathOperation::Shape) && GraphicsLayer::supportsLayerType(GraphicsLayer::Type::Shape);
1736}
1737
1738// FIXME: remove and never ask questions about reflection layers.
1739static RenderLayerModelObject& rendererForCompositingTests(const RenderLayer& layer)
1740{
1741 auto* renderer = &layer.renderer();
1742
1743 // The compositing state of a reflection should match that of its reflected layer.
1744 if (layer.isReflection())
1745 renderer = downcast<RenderLayerModelObject>(renderer->parent()); // The RenderReplica's parent is the object being reflected.
1746
1747 return *renderer;
1748}
1749
1750void RenderLayerCompositor::updateRootContentLayerClipping()
1751{
1752 m_rootContentsLayer->setMasksToBounds(!m_renderView.settings().backgroundShouldExtendBeyondPage());
1753}
1754
1755bool RenderLayerCompositor::updateBacking(RenderLayer& layer, RequiresCompositingData& queryData, BackingSharingState* backingSharingState, BackingRequired backingRequired)
1756{
1757 bool layerChanged = false;
1758 if (backingRequired == BackingRequired::Unknown)
1759 backingRequired = needsToBeComposited(layer, queryData) ? BackingRequired::Yes : BackingRequired::No;
1760 else {
1761 // Need to fetch viewportConstrainedNotCompositedReason, but without doing all the work that needsToBeComposited does.
1762 requiresCompositingForPosition(rendererForCompositingTests(layer), layer, queryData);
1763 }
1764
1765 auto repaintLayer = [&](RenderLayer& layer) {
1766 if (backingSharingState && layerRepaintTargetsBackingSharingLayer(layer, *backingSharingState)) {
1767 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "Layer " << &layer << " needs to repaint into potential backing-sharing layer, postponing repaint");
1768 backingSharingState->addLayerNeedingRepaint(layer);
1769 } else
1770 repaintOnCompositingChange(layer);
1771 };
1772
1773 if (backingRequired == BackingRequired::Yes) {
1774 // If we need to repaint, do so before making backing and disconnecting from the backing provider layer.
1775 if (!layer.backing())
1776 repaintLayer(layer);
1777
1778 layer.disconnectFromBackingProviderLayer();
1779
1780 enableCompositingMode();
1781
1782 if (!layer.backing()) {
1783 layer.ensureBacking();
1784
1785 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer() && useCoordinatedScrollingForLayer(layer)) {
1786 auto& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
1787 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
1788 scrollingCoordinator->frameViewRootLayerDidChange(frameView);
1789#if ENABLE(RUBBER_BANDING)
1790 updateLayerForHeader(frameView.headerHeight());
1791 updateLayerForFooter(frameView.footerHeight());
1792#endif
1793 updateRootContentLayerClipping();
1794
1795 if (auto* tiledBacking = layer.backing()->tiledBacking())
1796 tiledBacking->setTopContentInset(frameView.topContentInset());
1797 }
1798
1799 // This layer and all of its descendants have cached repaints rects that are relative to
1800 // the repaint container, so change when compositing changes; we need to update them here.
1801 if (layer.parent())
1802 layer.computeRepaintRectsIncludingDescendants();
1803
1804 layer.setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
1805 layer.setNeedsCompositingConfigurationUpdate();
1806 layer.setNeedsCompositingPaintOrderChildrenUpdate();
1807
1808 layerChanged = true;
1809 }
1810 } else {
1811 if (layer.backing()) {
1812 // If we're removing backing on a reflection, clear the source GraphicsLayer's pointer to
1813 // its replica GraphicsLayer. In practice this should never happen because reflectee and reflection
1814 // are both either composited, or not composited.
1815 if (layer.isReflection()) {
1816 auto* sourceLayer = downcast<RenderLayerModelObject>(*layer.renderer().parent()).layer();
1817 if (auto* backing = sourceLayer->backing()) {
1818 ASSERT(backing->graphicsLayer()->replicaLayer() == layer.backing()->graphicsLayer());
1819 backing->graphicsLayer()->setReplicatedByLayer(nullptr);
1820 }
1821 }
1822
1823 layer.clearBacking();
1824 layerChanged = true;
1825
1826 // This layer and all of its descendants have cached repaints rects that are relative to
1827 // the repaint container, so change when compositing changes; we need to update them here.
1828 layer.computeRepaintRectsIncludingDescendants();
1829
1830 // If we need to repaint, do so now that we've removed the backing
1831 repaintLayer(layer);
1832 }
1833 }
1834
1835#if ENABLE(VIDEO)
1836 if (layerChanged && is<RenderVideo>(layer.renderer())) {
1837 // If it's a video, give the media player a chance to hook up to the layer.
1838 downcast<RenderVideo>(layer.renderer()).acceleratedRenderingStateChanged();
1839 }
1840#endif
1841
1842 if (layerChanged && is<RenderWidget>(layer.renderer())) {
1843 auto* innerCompositor = frameContentsCompositor(downcast<RenderWidget>(layer.renderer()));
1844 if (innerCompositor && innerCompositor->usesCompositing())
1845 innerCompositor->updateRootLayerAttachment();
1846 }
1847
1848 if (layerChanged)
1849 layer.clearClipRectsIncludingDescendants(PaintingClipRects);
1850
1851 // If a fixed position layer gained/lost a backing or the reason not compositing it changed,
1852 // the scrolling coordinator needs to recalculate whether it can do fast scrolling.
1853 if (layer.renderer().isFixedPositioned()) {
1854 if (layer.viewportConstrainedNotCompositedReason() != queryData.nonCompositedForPositionReason) {
1855 layer.setViewportConstrainedNotCompositedReason(queryData.nonCompositedForPositionReason);
1856 layerChanged = true;
1857 }
1858 if (layerChanged) {
1859 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
1860 scrollingCoordinator->frameViewFixedObjectsDidChange(m_renderView.frameView());
1861 }
1862 } else
1863 layer.setViewportConstrainedNotCompositedReason(RenderLayer::NoNotCompositedReason);
1864
1865 if (layer.backing())
1866 layer.backing()->updateDebugIndicators(m_showDebugBorders, m_showRepaintCounter);
1867
1868 return layerChanged;
1869}
1870
1871bool RenderLayerCompositor::updateLayerCompositingState(RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositingAncestor, RequiresCompositingData& queryData, BackingSharingState& backingSharingState)
1872{
1873 bool layerChanged = updateBacking(layer, queryData, &backingSharingState);
1874
1875 // See if we need content or clipping layers. Methods called here should assume
1876 // that the compositing state of descendant layers has not been updated yet.
1877 if (layer.backing() && layer.backing()->updateConfiguration(compositingAncestor))
1878 layerChanged = true;
1879
1880 return layerChanged;
1881}
1882
1883void RenderLayerCompositor::repaintOnCompositingChange(RenderLayer& layer)
1884{
1885 // If the renderer is not attached yet, no need to repaint.
1886 if (&layer.renderer() != &m_renderView && !layer.renderer().parent())
1887 return;
1888
1889 auto* repaintContainer = layer.renderer().containerForRepaint();
1890 if (!repaintContainer)
1891 repaintContainer = &m_renderView;
1892
1893 layer.repaintIncludingNonCompositingDescendants(repaintContainer);
1894 if (repaintContainer == &m_renderView) {
1895 // The contents of this layer may be moving between the window
1896 // and a GraphicsLayer, so we need to make sure the window system
1897 // synchronizes those changes on the screen.
1898 m_renderView.frameView().setNeedsOneShotDrawingSynchronization();
1899 }
1900}
1901
1902// This method assumes that layout is up-to-date, unlike repaintOnCompositingChange().
1903void RenderLayerCompositor::repaintInCompositedAncestor(RenderLayer& layer, const LayoutRect& rect)
1904{
1905 auto* compositedAncestor = layer.enclosingCompositingLayerForRepaint(ExcludeSelf);
1906 if (!compositedAncestor)
1907 return;
1908
1909 ASSERT(compositedAncestor->backing());
1910 LayoutRect repaintRect = rect;
1911 repaintRect.move(layer.offsetFromAncestor(compositedAncestor));
1912 compositedAncestor->setBackingNeedsRepaintInRect(repaintRect);
1913
1914 // The contents of this layer may be moving from a GraphicsLayer to the window,
1915 // so we need to make sure the window system synchronizes those changes on the screen.
1916 if (compositedAncestor->isRenderViewLayer())
1917 m_renderView.frameView().setNeedsOneShotDrawingSynchronization();
1918}
1919
1920// FIXME: remove.
1921void RenderLayerCompositor::layerWasAdded(RenderLayer&, RenderLayer&)
1922{
1923}
1924
1925void RenderLayerCompositor::layerWillBeRemoved(RenderLayer& parent, RenderLayer& child)
1926{
1927 if (parent.renderer().renderTreeBeingDestroyed())
1928 return;
1929
1930 if (child.isComposited())
1931 repaintInCompositedAncestor(child, child.backing()->compositedBounds()); // FIXME: do via dirty bits?
1932 else if (child.paintsIntoProvidedBacking()) {
1933 auto* backingProviderLayer = child.backingProviderLayer();
1934 // FIXME: Optimize this repaint.
1935 backingProviderLayer->setBackingNeedsRepaint();
1936 backingProviderLayer->backing()->removeBackingSharingLayer(child);
1937 } else
1938 return;
1939
1940 child.setNeedsCompositingLayerConnection();
1941}
1942
1943RenderLayer* RenderLayerCompositor::enclosingNonStackingClippingLayer(const RenderLayer& layer) const
1944{
1945 for (auto* parent = layer.parent(); parent; parent = parent->parent()) {
1946 if (parent->isStackingContext())
1947 return nullptr;
1948 if (parent->renderer().hasClipOrOverflowClip())
1949 return parent;
1950 }
1951 return nullptr;
1952}
1953
1954void RenderLayerCompositor::computeExtent(const LayerOverlapMap& overlapMap, const RenderLayer& layer, OverlapExtent& extent) const
1955{
1956 if (extent.extentComputed)
1957 return;
1958
1959 LayoutRect layerBounds;
1960 if (extent.hasTransformAnimation)
1961 extent.animationCausesExtentUncertainty = !layer.getOverlapBoundsIncludingChildrenAccountingForTransformAnimations(layerBounds);
1962 else
1963 layerBounds = layer.overlapBounds();
1964
1965 // In the animating transform case, we avoid double-accounting for the transform because
1966 // we told pushMappingsToAncestor() to ignore transforms earlier.
1967 extent.bounds = enclosingLayoutRect(overlapMap.geometryMap().absoluteRect(layerBounds));
1968
1969 // Empty rects never intersect, but we need them to for the purposes of overlap testing.
1970 if (extent.bounds.isEmpty())
1971 extent.bounds.setSize(LayoutSize(1, 1));
1972
1973 RenderLayerModelObject& renderer = layer.renderer();
1974 if (renderer.isFixedPositioned() && renderer.container() == &m_renderView) {
1975 // Because fixed elements get moved around without re-computing overlap, we have to compute an overlap
1976 // rect that covers all the locations that the fixed element could move to.
1977 // FIXME: need to handle sticky too.
1978 extent.bounds = m_renderView.frameView().fixedScrollableAreaBoundsInflatedForScrolling(extent.bounds);
1979 }
1980
1981 extent.extentComputed = true;
1982}
1983
1984enum class AncestorTraversal { Continue, Stop };
1985
1986// This is a simplified version of containing block walking that only handles absolute position.
1987template <typename Function>
1988static AncestorTraversal traverseAncestorLayers(const RenderLayer& layer, Function&& function)
1989{
1990 bool containingBlockCanSkipLayers = layer.renderer().isAbsolutelyPositioned();
1991 RenderLayer* nextPaintOrderParent = layer.paintOrderParent();
1992
1993 for (const auto* ancestorLayer = layer.parent(); ancestorLayer; ancestorLayer = ancestorLayer->parent()) {
1994 bool inContainingBlockChain = true;
1995
1996 if (containingBlockCanSkipLayers)
1997 inContainingBlockChain = ancestorLayer->renderer().canContainAbsolutelyPositionedObjects();
1998
1999 if (function(*ancestorLayer, inContainingBlockChain, ancestorLayer == nextPaintOrderParent) == AncestorTraversal::Stop)
2000 return AncestorTraversal::Stop;
2001
2002 if (inContainingBlockChain)
2003 containingBlockCanSkipLayers = ancestorLayer->renderer().isAbsolutelyPositioned();
2004
2005 if (ancestorLayer == nextPaintOrderParent)
2006 nextPaintOrderParent = ancestorLayer->paintOrderParent();
2007 }
2008
2009 return AncestorTraversal::Continue;
2010}
2011
2012static bool createsClippingScope(const RenderLayer& layer)
2013{
2014 return layer.hasCompositedScrollableOverflow();
2015}
2016
2017static Vector<LayerOverlapMap::LayerAndBounds> enclosingClippingScopes(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer& rootLayer)
2018{
2019 Vector<LayerOverlapMap::LayerAndBounds> clippingScopes;
2020 clippingScopes.append({ const_cast<RenderLayer&>(rootLayer), { } });
2021
2022 if (!layer.hasCompositedScrollingAncestor())
2023 return clippingScopes;
2024
2025 traverseAncestorLayers(layer, [&](const RenderLayer& ancestorLayer, bool inContainingBlockChain, bool) {
2026 if (inContainingBlockChain && createsClippingScope(ancestorLayer)) {
2027 LayoutRect clipRect;
2028 if (is<RenderBox>(ancestorLayer.renderer())) {
2029 // FIXME: This is expensive. Broken with transforms.
2030 LayoutPoint offsetFromRoot = ancestorLayer.convertToLayerCoords(&rootLayer, { });
2031 clipRect = downcast<RenderBox>(ancestorLayer.renderer()).overflowClipRect(offsetFromRoot);
2032 }
2033
2034 LayerOverlapMap::LayerAndBounds layerAndBounds { const_cast<RenderLayer&>(ancestorLayer), clipRect };
2035 clippingScopes.insert(1, layerAndBounds); // Order is roots to leaves.
2036 }
2037 return AncestorTraversal::Continue;
2038 });
2039
2040 return clippingScopes;
2041}
2042
2043void RenderLayerCompositor::addToOverlapMap(LayerOverlapMap& overlapMap, const RenderLayer& layer, OverlapExtent& extent) const
2044{
2045 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer())
2046 return;
2047
2048 computeExtent(overlapMap, layer, extent);
2049
2050 // FIXME: constrain the scopes (by composited stacking context ancestor I think).
2051 auto clippingScopes = enclosingClippingScopes(layer, rootRenderLayer());
2052
2053 LayoutRect clipRect;
2054 if (layer.hasCompositedScrollingAncestor()) {
2055 // Compute a clip up to the composited scrolling ancestor, then convert it to absolute coordinates.
2056 auto& scrollingScope = clippingScopes.last();
2057 auto& scopeLayer = scrollingScope.layer;
2058 clipRect = layer.backgroundClipRect(RenderLayer::ClipRectsContext(&scopeLayer, TemporaryClipRects, IgnoreOverlayScrollbarSize, IgnoreOverflowClip)).rect();
2059 if (!clipRect.isInfinite())
2060 clipRect.setLocation(scopeLayer.convertToLayerCoords(&rootRenderLayer(), clipRect.location()));
2061 } else
2062 clipRect = layer.backgroundClipRect(RenderLayer::ClipRectsContext(&rootRenderLayer(), AbsoluteClipRects)).rect(); // FIXME: Incorrect for CSS regions.
2063
2064 auto clippedBounds = extent.bounds;
2065 if (!clipRect.isInfinite()) {
2066 // With delegated page scaling, pageScaleFactor() is not applied by RenderView, so we should not scale here.
2067 if (!page().delegatesScaling())
2068 clipRect.scale(pageScaleFactor());
2069
2070 clippedBounds.intersect(clipRect);
2071 }
2072
2073 overlapMap.add(layer, clippedBounds, clippingScopes);
2074}
2075
2076void RenderLayerCompositor::addDescendantsToOverlapMapRecursive(LayerOverlapMap& overlapMap, const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* ancestorLayer) const
2077{
2078 if (!canBeComposited(layer))
2079 return;
2080
2081 // A null ancestorLayer is an indication that 'layer' has already been pushed.
2082 if (ancestorLayer) {
2083 overlapMap.geometryMap().pushMappingsToAncestor(&layer, ancestorLayer);
2084
2085 OverlapExtent layerExtent;
2086 addToOverlapMap(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent);
2087 }
2088
2089#if ASSERT_ENABLED
2090 LayerListMutationDetector mutationChecker(const_cast<RenderLayer&>(layer));
2091#endif
2092
2093 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.negativeZOrderLayers())
2094 addDescendantsToOverlapMapRecursive(overlapMap, *renderLayer, &layer);
2095
2096 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.normalFlowLayers())
2097 addDescendantsToOverlapMapRecursive(overlapMap, *renderLayer, &layer);
2098
2099 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.positiveZOrderLayers())
2100 addDescendantsToOverlapMapRecursive(overlapMap, *renderLayer, &layer);
2101
2102 if (ancestorLayer)
2103 overlapMap.geometryMap().popMappingsToAncestor(ancestorLayer);
2104}
2105
2106void RenderLayerCompositor::updateOverlapMap(LayerOverlapMap& overlapMap, const RenderLayer& layer, OverlapExtent& layerExtent, bool didPushContainer, bool addLayerToOverlap, bool addDescendantsToOverlap) const
2107{
2108 if (addLayerToOverlap) {
2109 addToOverlapMap(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent);
2110 LOG_WITH_STREAM(CompositingOverlap, stream << "layer " << &layer << " contributes to overlap, added to map " << overlapMap);
2111 }
2112
2113 if (addDescendantsToOverlap) {
2114 // If this is the first non-root layer to composite, we need to add all the descendants we already traversed to the overlap map.
2115 addDescendantsToOverlapMapRecursive(overlapMap, layer);
2116 LOG_WITH_STREAM(CompositingOverlap, stream << "layer " << &layer << " composited post descendant traversal, added recursive " << overlapMap);
2117 }
2118
2119 if (didPushContainer) {
2120 overlapMap.popCompositingContainer();
2121 LOG_WITH_STREAM(CompositingOverlap, stream << "layer " << &layer << " is composited or shared, popped container " << overlapMap);
2122 }
2123}
2124
2125bool RenderLayerCompositor::layerOverlaps(const LayerOverlapMap& overlapMap, const RenderLayer& layer, OverlapExtent& layerExtent) const
2126{
2127 computeExtent(overlapMap, layer, layerExtent);
2128
2129 auto clippingScopes = enclosingClippingScopes(layer, rootRenderLayer());
2130 return overlapMap.overlapsLayers(layer, layerExtent.bounds, clippingScopes);
2131}

2149void RenderLayerCompositor::frameViewDidChangeSize()
2150{

2152 layer->setNeedsCompositingGeometryUpdate();
2153

2155 updateScrollLayerClipping();

2157 updateOverflowControlsLayers();

2161 auto& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
2162 m_layerForOverhangAreas->setSize(frameView.frameRect().size());

2165#endif

2169void RenderLayerCompositor::widgetDidChangeSize(RenderWidget& widget)
2170{
2171 if (!widget.hasLayer())
2172 return;
2173
2174 auto& layer = *widget.layer();
2175
2176 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor " << this << " widgetDidChangeSize (layer " << &layer << ")");
2177
2178 // Widget size affects answer to requiresCompositingForFrame() so we need to trigger
2179 // a compositing update.
2180 layer.setNeedsPostLayoutCompositingUpdate();
2181 scheduleCompositingLayerUpdate();
2182

2187bool RenderLayerCompositor::hasCoordinatedScrolling() const
2188{

2190 return scrollingCoordinator && scrollingCoordinator->coordinatesScrollingForFrameView(m_renderView.frameView());
2191}
2192
2193void RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollLayerPosition()
2194{
2195 ASSERT(!hasCoordinatedScrolling());
2196 ASSERT(m_scrolledContentsLayer);
2197
2198 auto& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
2199 IntPoint scrollPosition = frameView.scrollPosition();
2200
2201 // We use scroll position here because the root content layer is offset to account for scrollOrigin (see FrameView::positionForRootContentLayer).
2202 m_scrolledContentsLayer->setPosition(FloatPoint(-scrollPosition.x(), -scrollPosition.y()));
2203
2204 if (auto* fixedBackgroundLayer = fixedRootBackgroundLayer())
2205 fixedBackgroundLayer->setPosition(frameView.scrollPositionForFixedPosition());
2206}
2207
2208void RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollLayerClipping()
2209{
2210 auto* layerForClipping = this->layerForClipping();
2211 if (!layerForClipping)
2212 return;
2213
2214 auto layerSize = m_renderView.frameView().sizeForVisibleContent();
2215 layerForClipping->setSize(layerSize);
2216 layerForClipping->setPosition(positionForClipLayer());
2217
2218#if ENABLE(SCROLLING_THREAD)
2219 if (layerForClipping == m_clipLayer) {
2220 EventRegion eventRegion;
2221 auto eventRegionContext = eventRegion.makeContext();
2222 eventRegionContext.unite(IntRect({ }, layerSize), RenderStyle::defaultStyle());
2223 m_clipLayer->setEventRegion(WTFMove(eventRegion));
2224 }
2225#endif
2226}
2227
2228FloatPoint RenderLayerCompositor::positionForClipLayer() const
2229{
2230 auto& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
2231
2232 return FloatPoint(
2233 frameView.shouldPlaceVerticalScrollbarOnLeft() ? frameView.horizontalScrollbarIntrusion() : 0,
2234 FrameView::yPositionForInsetClipLayer(frameView.scrollPosition(), frameView.topContentInset()));
2235}
2236
2237void RenderLayerCompositor::frameViewDidScroll()
2238{
2239 if (!m_scrolledContentsLayer)
2240 return;
2241
2242 // If there's a scrolling coordinator that manages scrolling for this frame view,
2243 // it will also manage updating the scroll layer position.
2244 if (hasCoordinatedScrolling()) {
2245 // We have to schedule a flush in order for the main TiledBacking to update its tile coverage.
2246 scheduleRenderingUpdate();
2247 return;
2248 }
2249
2250 updateScrollLayerPosition();
2251}

2254{
2255 updateOverflowControlsLayers();
2256}
2257

2259{
2260 if (auto* renderViewBacking = m_renderView.layer()->backing())
2261 renderViewBacking->adjustTiledBackingCoverage();
2262}

2264void RenderLayerCompositor::rootLayerConfigurationChanged()
2265{
2266 auto* renderViewBacking = m_renderView.layer()->backing();
2267 if (renderViewBacking && renderViewBacking->isFrameLayerWithTiledBacking()) {
2268 m_renderView.layer()->setNeedsCompositingConfigurationUpdate();
2269 scheduleCompositingLayerUpdate();
2270 }
2271}
2272
2273void RenderLayerCompositor::updateCompositingForLayerTreeAsTextDump()
2274{
2275 auto& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
2276 frameView.updateLayoutAndStyleIfNeededRecursive();
2277
2278 updateEventRegions();
2279
2280 for (auto* child = frameView.frame().tree().firstRenderedChild(); child; child = child->tree().traverseNextRendered()) {
2281 if (auto* renderer = child->contentRenderer())
2282 renderer->compositor().updateEventRegions();
2283 }
2284
2285 updateCompositingLayers(CompositingUpdateType::AfterLayout);
2286
2287 if (!m_rootContentsLayer)
2288 return;
2289
2290 flushPendingLayerChanges(true);
2291 // We need to trigger an update because the flushPendingLayerChanges() will have pushed changes to platform layers,
2292 // which may cause painting to happen in the current runloop.
2293 page().triggerRenderingUpdateForTesting();
2294}
2295
2296String RenderLayerCompositor::layerTreeAsText(LayerTreeFlags flags)
2297{
2298 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor " << this << " layerTreeAsText");
2299
2300 updateCompositingForLayerTreeAsTextDump();
2301
2302 if (!m_rootContentsLayer)
2303 return String();
2304
2305 LayerTreeAsTextBehavior layerTreeBehavior = LayerTreeAsTextBehaviorNormal;
2306 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeDebugInfo)
2307 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextDebug;
2308 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeVisibleRects)
2309 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeVisibleRects;
2310 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeTileCaches)
2311 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeTileCaches;
2312 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeRepaintRects)
2313 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeRepaintRects;
2314 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludePaintingPhases)
2315 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludePaintingPhases;
2316 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeContentLayers)
2317 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeContentLayers;
2318 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeAcceleratesDrawing)
2319 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeAcceleratesDrawing;
2320 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeClipping)
2321 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeClipping;
2322 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeBackingStoreAttached)
2323 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeBackingStoreAttached;
2324 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeRootLayerProperties)
2325 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeRootLayerProperties;
2326 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeEventRegion)
2327 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeEventRegion;
2328 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeDeepColor)
2329 layerTreeBehavior |= LayerTreeAsTextIncludeDeepColor;
2330
2331 // We skip dumping the scroll and clip layers to keep layerTreeAsText output
2332 // similar between platforms.
2333 String layerTreeText = m_rootContentsLayer->layerTreeAsText(layerTreeBehavior);
2334
2335 // Dump an empty layer tree only if the only composited layer is the main frame's tiled backing,
2336 // so that tests expecting us to drop out of accelerated compositing when there are no layers succeed.
2337 if (!hasContentCompositingLayers() && documentUsesTiledBacking() && !(layerTreeBehavior & LayerTreeAsTextIncludeTileCaches) && !(layerTreeBehavior & LayerTreeAsTextIncludeRootLayerProperties))
2338 layerTreeText = emptyString();
2339
2340 // The true root layer is not included in the dump, so if we want to report
2341 // its repaint rects, they must be included here.
2342 if (flags & LayerTreeFlagsIncludeRepaintRects)
2343 return m_renderView.frameView().trackedRepaintRectsAsText() + layerTreeText;
2344
2345 return layerTreeText;
2346}
2347
2348std::optional<String> RenderLayerCompositor::platformLayerTreeAsText(Element& element, OptionSet<PlatformLayerTreeAsTextFlags> flags)
2349{
2350 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor " << this << " platformLayerTreeAsText");
2351
2352 updateCompositingForLayerTreeAsTextDump();
2353 if (!element.renderer() || !element.renderer()->hasLayer())
2354 return std::nullopt;
2355
2356 auto& layerModelObject = downcast<RenderLayerModelObject>(*element.renderer());
2357 if (!layerModelObject.layer()->isComposited())
2358 return std::nullopt;
2359
2360 auto* backing = layerModelObject.layer()->backing();
2361 return backing->graphicsLayer()->platformLayerTreeAsText(flags);
2362}
2363
2364static RenderView* frameContentsRenderView(RenderWidget& renderer)
2365{
2366 if (auto* contentDocument = renderer.frameOwnerElement().contentDocument())
2367 return contentDocument->renderView();
2368
2369 return nullptr;
2370}
2371
2372RenderLayerCompositor* RenderLayerCompositor::frameContentsCompositor(RenderWidget& renderer)
2373{
2374 if (auto* view = frameContentsRenderView(renderer))
2375 return &view->compositor();
2376
2377 return nullptr;
2378}
2379
2380bool RenderLayerCompositor::parentFrameContentLayers(RenderWidget& renderer)
2381{
2382 auto* innerCompositor = frameContentsCompositor(renderer);
2383 if (!innerCompositor || !innerCompositor->usesCompositing() || innerCompositor->rootLayerAttachment() != RootLayerAttachedViaEnclosingFrame)
2384 return false;
2385
2386 auto* layer = renderer.layer();
2387 if (!layer->isComposited())
2388 return false;
2389
2390 auto* backing = layer->backing();
2391 auto* hostingLayer = backing->parentForSublayers();
2392 auto* rootLayer = innerCompositor->rootGraphicsLayer();
2393 if (hostingLayer->children().size() != 1 || hostingLayer->children()[0].ptr() != rootLayer) {
2394 hostingLayer->removeAllChildren();
2395 hostingLayer->addChild(*rootLayer);
2396 }
2397
2398 if (auto frameHostingNodeID = backing->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting)) {
2399 auto* contentsRenderView = frameContentsRenderView(renderer);
2400 if (auto frameRootScrollingNodeID = contentsRenderView->frameView().scrollingNodeID()) {
2401 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
2402 scrollingCoordinator->insertNode(ScrollingNodeType::Subframe, frameRootScrollingNodeID, frameHostingNodeID, 0);
2403 }
2404 }
2405
2406 // FIXME: Why always return true and not just when the layers changed?
2407 return true;
2408}
2409
2410void RenderLayerCompositor::repaintCompositedLayers()
2411{
2412 recursiveRepaintLayer(rootRenderLayer());
2413}
2414
2415void RenderLayerCompositor::recursiveRepaintLayer(RenderLayer& layer)
2416{
2417 layer.updateLayerListsIfNeeded();
2418
2419 // FIXME: This method does not work correctly with transforms.
2420 if (layer.isComposited() && !layer.backing()->paintsIntoCompositedAncestor())
2421 layer.setBackingNeedsRepaint();
2422
2423#if ASSERT_ENABLED
2424 LayerListMutationDetector mutationChecker(layer);
2425#endif
2426
2427 if (layer.hasCompositingDescendant()) {
2428 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.negativeZOrderLayers())
2429 recursiveRepaintLayer(*renderLayer);
2430
2431 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.positiveZOrderLayers())
2432 recursiveRepaintLayer(*renderLayer);
2433 }
2434
2435 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.normalFlowLayers())
2436 recursiveRepaintLayer(*renderLayer);
2437}
2438
2439bool RenderLayerCompositor::layerRepaintTargetsBackingSharingLayer(RenderLayer& layer, BackingSharingState& sharingState) const
2440{
2441 if (!sharingState.backingProviderCandidate())
2442 return false;
2443
2444 for (const RenderLayer* currLayer = &layer; currLayer; currLayer = currLayer->paintOrderParent()) {
2445 if (compositedWithOwnBackingStore(*currLayer))
2446 return false;
2447
2448 if (currLayer->paintsIntoProvidedBacking())
2449 return false;
2450
2451 if (sharingState.isPotentialBackingSharingLayer(*currLayer))
2452 return true;
2453 }
2454
2455 return false;
2456}

2458RenderLayer& RenderLayerCompositor::rootRenderLayer() const
2459{
2460 return *m_renderView.layer();
2461}
2462
2463GraphicsLayer* RenderLayerCompositor::rootGraphicsLayer() const
2464{
2465 if (m_overflowControlsHostLayer)
2466 return m_overflowControlsHostLayer.get();
2467 return m_rootContentsLayer.get();
2468}
2469
2470void RenderLayerCompositor::setIsInWindow(bool isInWindow)
2471{
2472 LOG(Compositing, "RenderLayerCompositor %p setIsInWindow %d", this, isInWindow);
2473
2474 if (!usesCompositing())
2475 return;
2476
2477 if (auto* rootLayer = rootGraphicsLayer()) {
2478 GraphicsLayer::traverse(*rootLayer, [isInWindow](GraphicsLayer& layer) {
2479 layer.setIsInWindow(isInWindow);
2480 });
2481 }
2482
2483 if (isInWindow) {
2484 if (m_rootLayerAttachment != RootLayerUnattached)
2485 return;
2486
2487 RootLayerAttachment attachment = isMainFrameCompositor() ? RootLayerAttachedViaChromeClient : RootLayerAttachedViaEnclosingFrame;
2488 attachRootLayer(attachment);
2489#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
2490 if (m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator) {
2491 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->registerAllViewportConstrainedLayers(*this);
2492 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->registerAllScrollingLayers();
2493 }
2494#endif
2495 } else {
2496 if (m_rootLayerAttachment == RootLayerUnattached)
2497 return;
2498
2499 detachRootLayer();
2500#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
2501 if (m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator) {
2502 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->unregisterAllViewportConstrainedLayers();
2503 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->unregisterAllScrollingLayers();
2504 }
2505#endif
2506 }
2507}

2510{
2511 for (auto* frame = &page().mainFrame(); frame; frame = frame->tree().traverseNext()) {
2512 if (auto* view = frame->contentRenderer())
2513 view->compositor().invalidateEventRegionForAllLayers();
2514 }
2515}

2519 applyToCompositedLayerIncludingDescendants(*m_renderView.layer(), [](auto& layer) {
2520 layer.invalidateEventRegion(RenderLayer::EventRegionInvalidationReason::SettingDidChange);
2521 });
2522}

2524void RenderLayerCompositor::clearBackingForAllLayers()
2525{
2526 applyToCompositedLayerIncludingDescendants(*m_renderView.layer(), [](auto& layer) { layer.clearBacking(); });
2527}

2529void RenderLayerCompositor::updateRootLayerPosition()
2530{
2531 if (m_rootContentsLayer) {
2532 m_rootContentsLayer->setSize(m_renderView.frameView().contentsSize());
2533 m_rootContentsLayer->setPosition(m_renderView.frameView().positionForRootContentLayer());
2534 m_rootContentsLayer->setAnchorPoint(FloatPoint3D());
2535 }
2536
2537 updateScrollLayerClipping();
2538
2539#if ENABLE(RUBBER_BANDING)
2540 if (m_contentShadowLayer && m_rootContentsLayer) {
2541 m_contentShadowLayer->setPosition(m_rootContentsLayer->position());
2542 m_contentShadowLayer->setSize(m_rootContentsLayer->size());
2543 }
2544
2545 updateLayerForTopOverhangArea(m_layerForTopOverhangArea != nullptr);
2546 updateLayerForBottomOverhangArea(m_layerForBottomOverhangArea != nullptr);
2547 updateLayerForHeader(m_layerForHeader != nullptr);
2548 updateLayerForFooter(m_layerForFooter != nullptr);
2549#endif

2556
2557bool RenderLayerCompositor::needsToBeComposited(const RenderLayer& layer, RequiresCompositingData& queryData) const
2558{
2559 if (!canBeComposited(layer))
2560 return false;
2561
2562 return requiresCompositingLayer(layer, queryData) || layer.mustCompositeForIndirectReasons() || (usesCompositing() && layer.isRenderViewLayer());
2563}
2564
2565// Note: this specifies whether the RL needs a compositing layer for intrinsic reasons.
2566// Use needsToBeComposited() to determine if a RL actually needs a compositing layer.
2567// FIXME: is clipsCompositingDescendants() an intrinsic reason?
2568bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresCompositingLayer(const RenderLayer& layer, RequiresCompositingData& queryData) const
2569{
2570 auto& renderer = rendererForCompositingTests(layer);
2571
2572 // The root layer always has a compositing layer, but it may not have backing.
2573 return requiresCompositingForTransform(renderer)
2574 || requiresCompositingForAnimation(renderer)
2575 || requiresCompositingForPosition(renderer, *renderer.layer(), queryData)
2576 || requiresCompositingForCanvas(renderer)
2577 || requiresCompositingForFilters(renderer)
2578 || requiresCompositingForWillChange(renderer)
2579 || requiresCompositingForBackfaceVisibility(renderer)
2580 || requiresCompositingForVideo(renderer)
2581 || requiresCompositingForModel(renderer)
2582 || requiresCompositingForFrame(renderer, queryData)
2583 || requiresCompositingForPlugin(renderer, queryData)
2584 || requiresCompositingForOverflowScrolling(*renderer.layer(), queryData);
2585}
2586
2587bool RenderLayerCompositor::canBeComposited(const RenderLayer& layer) const
2588{
2589 if (m_hasAcceleratedCompositing && layer.isSelfPaintingLayer()) {
2590 if (!layer.isInsideFragmentedFlow())
2591 return true;
2592
2593 // CSS Regions flow threads do not need to be composited as we use composited RenderFragmentContainers
2594 // to render the background of the RenderFragmentedFlow.
2595 if (layer.isRenderFragmentedFlow())
2596 return false;
2597
2598 return true;
2599 }
2600 return false;
2601}
2602
2603#if ENABLE(FULLSCREEN_API)
2604enum class FullScreenDescendant { Yes, No, NotApplicable };
2605static FullScreenDescendant isDescendantOfFullScreenLayer(const RenderLayer& layer)
2606{
2607 auto& document = layer.renderer().document();
2608
2609 if (!document.fullscreenManager().isFullscreen() || !document.fullscreenManager().fullscreenRenderer())
2610 return FullScreenDescendant::NotApplicable;
2611
2612 auto* fullScreenLayer = document.fullscreenManager().fullscreenRenderer()->layer();
2613 if (!fullScreenLayer) {
2614 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
2615 return FullScreenDescendant::NotApplicable;
2616 }
2617
2618 return layer.isDescendantOf(*fullScreenLayer) ? FullScreenDescendant::Yes : FullScreenDescendant::No;
2619}
2620#endif
2621
2622bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresOwnBackingStore(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositingAncestorLayer, const LayoutRect& layerCompositedBoundsInAncestor, const LayoutRect& ancestorCompositedBounds) const
2623{
2624 auto& renderer = layer.renderer();
2625
2626 if (compositingAncestorLayer
2627 && !(compositingAncestorLayer->backing()->graphicsLayer()->drawsContent()
2628 || compositingAncestorLayer->backing()->paintsIntoWindow()
2629 || compositingAncestorLayer->backing()->paintsIntoCompositedAncestor()))
2630 return true;
2631
2632 RequiresCompositingData queryData;
2633 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer()
2634 || layer.transform() // note: excludes perspective and transformStyle3D.
2635 || requiresCompositingForAnimation(renderer)
2636 || requiresCompositingForPosition(renderer, layer, queryData)
2637 || requiresCompositingForCanvas(renderer)
2638 || requiresCompositingForFilters(renderer)
2639 || requiresCompositingForWillChange(renderer)
2640 || requiresCompositingForBackfaceVisibility(renderer)
2641 || requiresCompositingForVideo(renderer)
2642 || requiresCompositingForModel(renderer)
2643 || requiresCompositingForFrame(renderer, queryData)
2644 || requiresCompositingForPlugin(renderer, queryData)
2645 || requiresCompositingForOverflowScrolling(layer, queryData)
2646 || needsContentsCompositingLayer(layer)
2647 || renderer.isTransparent()
2648 || renderer.hasMask()
2649 || renderer.hasReflection()
2650 || renderer.hasFilter()
2651 || renderer.hasBackdropFilter())
2652 return true;
2653
2654 if (layer.isComposited() && layer.backing()->hasBackingSharingLayers())
2655 return true;
2656
2657 // FIXME: We really need to keep track of the ancestor layer that has its own backing store.
2658 if (!ancestorCompositedBounds.contains(layerCompositedBoundsInAncestor))
2659 return true;
2660
2661 if (layer.mustCompositeForIndirectReasons()) {
2662 IndirectCompositingReason reason = layer.indirectCompositingReason();
2663 return reason == IndirectCompositingReason::Overlap
2664 || reason == IndirectCompositingReason::OverflowScrollPositioning
2665 || reason == IndirectCompositingReason::Stacking
2666 || reason == IndirectCompositingReason::BackgroundLayer
2667 || reason == IndirectCompositingReason::GraphicalEffect
2668 || reason == IndirectCompositingReason::Preserve3D; // preserve-3d has to create backing store to ensure that 3d-transformed elements intersect.
2669 }
2670
2671 return false;
2672}
2673
2674OptionSet<CompositingReason> RenderLayerCompositor::reasonsForCompositing(const RenderLayer& layer) const
2675{
2676 OptionSet<CompositingReason> reasons;
2677
2678 if (!layer.isComposited())
2679 return reasons;
2680
2681 RequiresCompositingData queryData;
2682
2683 auto& renderer = rendererForCompositingTests(layer);
2684
2685 if (requiresCompositingForTransform(renderer))
2686 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Transform3D);
2687
2688 if (requiresCompositingForVideo(renderer))
2689 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Video);
2690 else if (requiresCompositingForCanvas(renderer))
2691 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Canvas);
2692 else if (requiresCompositingForModel(renderer))
2693 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Model);
2694 else if (requiresCompositingForPlugin(renderer, queryData))
2695 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Plugin);
2696 else if (requiresCompositingForFrame(renderer, queryData))
2697 reasons.add(CompositingReason::IFrame);
2698
2699 if ((canRender3DTransforms() && renderer.style().backfaceVisibility() == BackfaceVisibility::Hidden))
2700 reasons.add(CompositingReason::BackfaceVisibilityHidden);
2701
2702 if (requiresCompositingForAnimation(renderer))
2703 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Animation);
2704
2705 if (requiresCompositingForFilters(renderer))
2706 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Filters);
2707
2708 if (requiresCompositingForWillChange(renderer))
2709 reasons.add(CompositingReason::WillChange);
2710
2711 if (requiresCompositingForPosition(renderer, *renderer.layer(), queryData))
2712 reasons.add(renderer.isFixedPositioned() ? CompositingReason::PositionFixed : CompositingReason::PositionSticky);
2713
2714 if (requiresCompositingForOverflowScrolling(*renderer.layer(), queryData))
2715 reasons.add(CompositingReason::OverflowScrolling);
2716
2717 switch (renderer.layer()->indirectCompositingReason()) {
2718 case IndirectCompositingReason::None:
2719 break;
2720 case IndirectCompositingReason::Clipping:
2721 reasons.add(CompositingReason::ClipsCompositingDescendants);
2722 break;
2723 case IndirectCompositingReason::Stacking:
2724 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Stacking);
2725 break;
2726 case IndirectCompositingReason::OverflowScrollPositioning:
2727 reasons.add(CompositingReason::OverflowScrollPositioning);
2728 break;
2729 case IndirectCompositingReason::Overlap:
2730 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Overlap);
2731 break;
2732 case IndirectCompositingReason::BackgroundLayer:
2733 reasons.add(CompositingReason::NegativeZIndexChildren);
2734 break;
2735 case IndirectCompositingReason::GraphicalEffect:
2736 if (renderer.hasTransform())
2737 reasons.add(CompositingReason::TransformWithCompositedDescendants);
2738
2739 if (renderer.isTransparent())
2740 reasons.add(CompositingReason::OpacityWithCompositedDescendants);
2741
2742 if (renderer.hasMask())
2743 reasons.add(CompositingReason::MaskWithCompositedDescendants);
2744
2745 if (renderer.hasReflection())
2746 reasons.add(CompositingReason::ReflectionWithCompositedDescendants);
2747
2748 if (renderer.hasFilter() || renderer.hasBackdropFilter())
2749 reasons.add(CompositingReason::FilterWithCompositedDescendants);
2750
2751#if ENABLE(CSS_COMPOSITING)
2752 if (layer.isolatesCompositedBlending())
2753 reasons.add(CompositingReason::IsolatesCompositedBlendingDescendants);
2754
2755 if (layer.hasBlendMode())
2756 reasons.add(CompositingReason::BlendingWithCompositedDescendants);
2757#endif
2758 break;
2759 case IndirectCompositingReason::Perspective:
2760 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Perspective);
2761 break;
2762 case IndirectCompositingReason::Preserve3D:
2763 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Preserve3D);
2764 break;
2765 }
2766
2767 if (usesCompositing() && renderer.layer()->isRenderViewLayer())
2768 reasons.add(CompositingReason::Root);
2769
2770 return reasons;
2771}
2772
2773static const char* compositingReasonToString(CompositingReason reason)
2774{
2775 switch (reason) {
2776 case CompositingReason::Transform3D: return "3D transform";
2777 case CompositingReason::Video: return "video";
2778 case CompositingReason::Canvas: return "canvas";
2779 case CompositingReason::Plugin: return "plugin";
2780 case CompositingReason::IFrame: return "iframe";
2781 case CompositingReason::BackfaceVisibilityHidden: return "backface-visibility: hidden";
2782 case CompositingReason::ClipsCompositingDescendants: return "clips compositing descendants";
2783 case CompositingReason::Animation: return "animation";
2784 case CompositingReason::Filters: return "filters";
2785 case CompositingReason::PositionFixed: return "position: fixed";
2786 case CompositingReason::PositionSticky: return "position: sticky";
2787 case CompositingReason::OverflowScrolling: return "async overflow scrolling";
2788 case CompositingReason::Stacking: return "stacking";
2789 case CompositingReason::Overlap: return "overlap";
2790 case CompositingReason::OverflowScrollPositioning: return "overflow scroll positioning";
2791 case CompositingReason::NegativeZIndexChildren: return "negative z-index children";
2792 case CompositingReason::TransformWithCompositedDescendants: return "transform with composited descendants";
2793 case CompositingReason::OpacityWithCompositedDescendants: return "opacity with composited descendants";
2794 case CompositingReason::MaskWithCompositedDescendants: return "mask with composited descendants";
2795 case CompositingReason::ReflectionWithCompositedDescendants: return "reflection with composited descendants";
2796 case CompositingReason::FilterWithCompositedDescendants: return "filter with composited descendants";
2797 case CompositingReason::BlendingWithCompositedDescendants: return "blending with composited descendants";
2798 case CompositingReason::IsolatesCompositedBlendingDescendants: return "isolates composited blending descendants";
2799 case CompositingReason::Perspective: return "perspective";
2800 case CompositingReason::Preserve3D: return "preserve-3d";
2801 case CompositingReason::WillChange: return "will-change";
2802 case CompositingReason::Root: return "root";
2803 case CompositingReason::Model: return "model";
2804 }
2805 return "";
2806}
2807
2808#if !LOG_DISABLED
2809const char* RenderLayerCompositor::logOneReasonForCompositing(const RenderLayer& layer)
2810{
2811 for (auto reason : reasonsForCompositing(layer))
2812 return compositingReasonToString(reason);
2813 return "";
2814}
2815#endif
2816
2817// Return true if the given layer has some ancestor in the RenderLayer hierarchy that clips,
2818// up to the enclosing compositing ancestor. This is required because compositing layers are parented
2819// according to the z-order hierarchy, yet clipping goes down the renderer hierarchy.
2820// Thus, a RenderLayer can be clipped by a RenderLayer that is an ancestor in the renderer hierarchy,
2821// but a sibling in the z-order hierarchy.
2822// FIXME: can we do this without a tree walk?
2823bool RenderLayerCompositor::clippedByAncestor(RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositingAncestor) const
2824{
2825 ASSERT(layer.isComposited());
2826 if (!compositingAncestor)
2827 return false;
2828
2829 // If the compositingAncestor clips, that will be taken care of by clipsCompositingDescendants(),
2830 // so we only care about clipping between its first child that is our ancestor (the computeClipRoot),
2831 // and layer. The exception is when the compositingAncestor isolates composited blending children,
2832 // in this case it is not allowed to clipsCompositingDescendants() and each of its children
2833 // will be clippedByAncestor()s, including the compositingAncestor.
2834 auto* computeClipRoot = compositingAncestor;
2835 if (!compositingAncestor->isolatesCompositedBlending()) {
2836 computeClipRoot = nullptr;
2837 auto* parent = &layer;
2838 while (parent) {
2839 auto* next = parent->parent();
2840 if (next == compositingAncestor) {
2841 computeClipRoot = parent;
2842 break;
2843 }
2844 parent = next;
2845 }
2846
2847 if (!computeClipRoot || computeClipRoot == &layer)
2848 return false;
2849 }
2850
2851 return !layer.backgroundClipRect(RenderLayer::ClipRectsContext(computeClipRoot, TemporaryClipRects)).isInfinite(); // FIXME: Incorrect for CSS regions.
2852}
2853
2854bool RenderLayerCompositor::updateAncestorClippingStack(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositingAncestor) const
2855{
2856 ASSERT(layer.isComposited());
2857
2858 auto clippingStack = computeAncestorClippingStack(layer, compositingAncestor);
2859 return layer.backing()->updateAncestorClippingStack(WTFMove(clippingStack));
2860}
2861
2862Vector<CompositedClipData> RenderLayerCompositor::computeAncestorClippingStack(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositingAncestor) const
2863{
2864 // On first pass in WK1, the root may not have become composited yet.
2865 if (!compositingAncestor)
2866 return { };
2867
2868 // We'll start by building a child-to-ancestors stack.
2869 Vector<CompositedClipData> newStack;
2870
2871 // Walk up the containing block chain to composited ancestor, prepending an entry to the clip stack for:
2872 // * each composited scrolling layer
2873 // * each set of RenderLayers which contribute a clip.
2874 bool haveNonScrollableClippingIntermediateLayer = false;
2875 const RenderLayer* currentClippedLayer = &layer;
2876
2877 auto pushNonScrollableClip = [&](const RenderLayer& clippedLayer, const RenderLayer& clippingRoot, ShouldRespectOverflowClip respectClip = IgnoreOverflowClip) {
2878 // Pass IgnoreOverflowClip to ignore overflow contributed by clippingRoot (which may be a scroller).
2879 auto clipRect = clippedLayer.backgroundClipRect(RenderLayer::ClipRectsContext(&clippingRoot, TemporaryClipRects, IgnoreOverlayScrollbarSize, respectClip)).rect();
2880 auto offset = layer.convertToLayerCoords(&clippingRoot, { }, RenderLayer::AdjustForColumns);
2881 clipRect.moveBy(-offset);
2882
2883 CompositedClipData clipData { const_cast<RenderLayer*>(&clippedLayer), clipRect, false };
2884 newStack.insert(0, WTFMove(clipData));
2885 };
2886
2887 traverseAncestorLayers(layer, [&](const RenderLayer& ancestorLayer, bool isContainingBlockChain, bool /*isPaintOrderAncestor*/) {
2888 if (&ancestorLayer == compositingAncestor) {
2889
2890 if (haveNonScrollableClippingIntermediateLayer)
2891 pushNonScrollableClip(*currentClippedLayer, ancestorLayer, ancestorLayer.isolatesCompositedBlending() ? RespectOverflowClip : IgnoreOverflowClip);
2892 else if (ancestorLayer.isolatesCompositedBlending() && newStack.isEmpty())
2893 pushNonScrollableClip(*currentClippedLayer, ancestorLayer, RespectOverflowClip);
2894
2895 return AncestorTraversal::Stop;
2896 }
2897
2898 if (isContainingBlockChain && ancestorLayer.renderer().hasClipOrOverflowClip()) {
2899 if (ancestorLayer.hasCompositedScrollableOverflow()) {
2900 if (haveNonScrollableClippingIntermediateLayer) {
2901 pushNonScrollableClip(*currentClippedLayer, ancestorLayer);
2902 haveNonScrollableClippingIntermediateLayer = false;
2903 }
2904
2905 auto clipRect = parentRelativeScrollableRect(ancestorLayer, &ancestorLayer);
2906 auto offset = layer.convertToLayerCoords(&ancestorLayer, { }, RenderLayer::AdjustForColumns);
2907 clipRect.moveBy(-offset);
2908
2909 CompositedClipData clipData { const_cast<RenderLayer*>(&ancestorLayer), clipRect, true };
2910 newStack.insert(0, WTFMove(clipData));
2911 currentClippedLayer = &ancestorLayer;
2912 } else
2913 haveNonScrollableClippingIntermediateLayer = true;
2914 }
2915
2916 return AncestorTraversal::Continue;
2917 });
2918
2919 return newStack;
2920}
2921
2922// Note that this returns the ScrollingNodeID of the scroller this layer is embedded in, not the layer's own ScrollingNodeID if it has one.
2923ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::asyncScrollableContainerNodeID(const RenderObject& renderer)
2924{
2925 auto* enclosingLayer = renderer.enclosingLayer();
2926 if (!enclosingLayer)
2927 return 0;
2928
2929 auto layerScrollingNodeID = [](const RenderLayer& layer) -> ScrollingNodeID {
2930 if (layer.isComposited())
2931 return layer.backing()->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling);
2932 return 0;
2933 };
2934
2935 // If the renderer is inside the layer, we care about the layer's scrollability. Otherwise, we let traverseAncestorLayers look at ancestors.
2936 if (!renderer.hasLayer()) {
2937 if (auto scrollingNodeID = layerScrollingNodeID(*enclosingLayer))
2938 return scrollingNodeID;
2939 }
2940
2941 ScrollingNodeID containerScrollingNodeID = 0;
2942 traverseAncestorLayers(*enclosingLayer, [&](const RenderLayer& ancestorLayer, bool isContainingBlockChain, bool /*isPaintOrderAncestor*/) {
2943 if (isContainingBlockChain && ancestorLayer.hasCompositedScrollableOverflow()) {
2944 containerScrollingNodeID = layerScrollingNodeID(ancestorLayer);
2945 return AncestorTraversal::Stop;
2946 }
2947 return AncestorTraversal::Continue;
2948 });
2949
2950 return containerScrollingNodeID;
2951}
2952
2953bool RenderLayerCompositor::isCompositedSubframeRenderer(const RenderObject& renderer)
2954{
2955 if (!is<RenderWidget>(renderer))
2956 return false;
2957
2958 return downcast<RenderWidget>(renderer).requiresAcceleratedCompositing();
2959}
2960
2961// Return true if the given layer is a stacking context and has compositing child
2962// layers that it needs to clip. In this case we insert a clipping GraphicsLayer
2963// into the hierarchy between this layer and its children in the z-order hierarchy.
2964bool RenderLayerCompositor::clipsCompositingDescendants(const RenderLayer& layer)
2965{
2966 return layer.hasCompositingDescendant() && layer.renderer().hasClipOrOverflowClip() && !layer.isolatesCompositedBlending() && !layer.hasCompositedNonContainedDescendants();
2967}

2969bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresCompositingForAnimation(RenderLayerModelObject& renderer) const
2970{
2971 if (!(m_compositingTriggers & ChromeClient::AnimationTrigger))
2972 return false;
2973
2974 if (auto styleable = Styleable::fromRenderer(renderer)) {
2975 if (auto* effectsStack = styleable->keyframeEffectStack()) {
2976 return (effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyOpacity)
2977 && (usesCompositing() || (m_compositingTriggers & ChromeClient::AnimatedOpacityTrigger)))
2978 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyFilter)
2979#if ENABLE(FILTERS_LEVEL_2)
2980 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyWebkitBackdropFilter)
2981#endif
2982 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyTranslate)
2983 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyScale)
2984 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyRotate)
2985 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyTransform);
2986 }
2987 }
2988
2989 return false;
2990}

2992static bool styleHas3DTransformOperation(const RenderStyle& style)
2993{
2994 return style.transform().has3DOperation()
2995 || (style.translate() && style.translate()->is3DOperation())
2996 || (style.scale() && style.scale()->is3DOperation())
2997 || (style.rotate() && style.rotate()->is3DOperation());
2998}
2999
3000static bool styleTransformOperationsAreRepresentableIn2D(const RenderStyle& style)
3001{
3002 return style.transform().isRepresentableIn2D()
3003 && (!style.translate() || style.translate()->isRepresentableIn2D())
3004 && (!style.scale() || style.scale()->isRepresentableIn2D())
3005 && (!style.rotate() || style.rotate()->isRepresentableIn2D());

3007
3008bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresCompositingForTransform(RenderLayerModelObject& renderer) const
3009{
3010 if (!(m_compositingTriggers & ChromeClient::ThreeDTransformTrigger))
3011 return false;
3012
3013 // Note that we ask the renderer if it has a transform, because the style may have transforms,
3014 // but the renderer may be an inline that doesn't suppport them.
3015 if (!renderer.hasTransform())
3016 return false;
3017
3018 switch (m_compositingPolicy) {
3019 case CompositingPolicy::Normal:
3020 return styleHas3DTransformOperation(renderer.style());
3021 case CompositingPolicy::Conservative:
3022 // Continue to allow pages to avoid the very slow software filter path.
3023 if (styleHas3DTransformOperation(renderer.style()) && renderer.hasFilter())
3024 return true;
3025 return styleTransformOperationsAreRepresentableIn2D(renderer.style()) ? false : true;
3026 }
3027 return false;
3028}

3035 if (renderer.style().backfaceVisibility() != BackfaceVisibility::Hidden)
3036 return false;
3037
3038 if (renderer.layer()->has3DTransformedAncestor())
3039 return true;

3042 auto* stackingContext = renderer.layer()->stackingContext();
3043 if (stackingContext && stackingContext->renderer().style().transformStyle3D() == TransformStyle3D::Preserve3D)
3044 return true;

3140bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresCompositingForPlugin(RenderLayerModelObject& renderer, RequiresCompositingData& queryData) const
3141{
3142 if (!(m_compositingTriggers & ChromeClient::PluginTrigger))
3143 return false;
3144
3145 bool isCompositedPlugin = is<RenderEmbeddedObject>(renderer) && downcast<RenderEmbeddedObject>(renderer).allowsAcceleratedCompositing();
3146 if (!isCompositedPlugin)
3147 return false;
3148
3149 auto& pluginRenderer = downcast<RenderWidget>(renderer);
3150 if (pluginRenderer.style().visibility() != Visibility::Visible)
3151 return false;
3152
3153 // If we can't reliably know the size of the plugin yet, don't change compositing state.
3154 if (queryData.layoutUpToDate == LayoutUpToDate::No) {
3155 queryData.reevaluateAfterLayout = true;
3156 return pluginRenderer.isComposited();
3157 }
3158
3159 // Don't go into compositing mode if height or width are zero, or size is 1x1.
3160 IntRect contentBox = snappedIntRect(pluginRenderer.contentBoxRect());
3161 return (contentBox.height() * contentBox.width() > 1);
3162}

3164bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresCompositingForFrame(RenderLayerModelObject& renderer, RequiresCompositingData& queryData) const
3165{
3166 if (!is<RenderWidget>(renderer))
3167 return false;
3168
3169 auto& frameRenderer = downcast<RenderWidget>(renderer);
3170 if (frameRenderer.style().visibility() != Visibility::Visible)
3171 return false;
3172
3173 if (!frameRenderer.requiresAcceleratedCompositing())
3174 return false;
3175
3176 if (queryData.layoutUpToDate == LayoutUpToDate::No) {
3177 queryData.reevaluateAfterLayout = true;
3178 return frameRenderer.isComposited();
3179 }
3180
3181 // Don't go into compositing mode if height or width are zero.
3182 return !snappedIntRect(frameRenderer.contentBoxRect()).isEmpty();
3183}

3192 return false;
3193#endif
3194

3196 return false;
3197
3198 if (queryData.layoutUpToDate == LayoutUpToDate::No) {
3199 queryData.reevaluateAfterLayout = true;
3200 return m_renderView.isComposited();
3201 }
3202
3203 return m_renderView.frameView().isScrollable();
