3205
3206bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresCompositingForPosition(RenderLayerModelObject& renderer, const RenderLayer& layer, RequiresCompositingData& queryData) const
3207{
3208 // position:fixed elements that create their own stacking context (e.g. have an explicit z-index,
3209 // opacity, transform) can get their own composited layer. A stacking context is required otherwise
3210 // z-index and clipping will be broken.
3211 if (!renderer.isPositioned())
3212 return false;
3213
3214#if ENABLE(FULLSCREEN_API)
3215 if (isDescendantOfFullScreenLayer(layer) == FullScreenDescendant::No)
3216 return false;
3217#endif
3218
3219 auto position = renderer.style().position();
3220 bool isFixed = renderer.isFixedPositioned();
3221 if (isFixed && !layer.isStackingContext())
3222 return false;
3223
3224 bool isSticky = renderer.isInFlowPositioned() && position == PositionType::Sticky;
3225 if (!isFixed && !isSticky)
3226 return false;
3227
3228 // FIXME: acceleratedCompositingForFixedPositionEnabled should probably be renamed acceleratedCompositingForViewportConstrainedPositionEnabled().
3229 if (!m_renderView.settings().acceleratedCompositingForFixedPositionEnabled())
3230 return false;
3231
3232 if (isSticky)
3233 return isAsyncScrollableStickyLayer(layer);
3234
3235 if (queryData.layoutUpToDate == LayoutUpToDate::No) {
3236 queryData.reevaluateAfterLayout = true;
3237 return layer.isComposited();
3238 }
3239
3240 auto container = renderer.container();
3241 ASSERT(container);
3242
3243 // Don't promote fixed position elements that are descendants of a non-view container, e.g. transformed elements.
3244 // They will stay fixed wrt the container rather than the enclosing frame.
3245 if (container != &m_renderView) {
3246 queryData.nonCompositedForPositionReason = RenderLayer::NotCompositedForNonViewContainer;
3247 return false;
3248 }
3249
3250 bool paintsContent = layer.isVisuallyNonEmpty() || layer.hasVisibleDescendant();
3251 if (!paintsContent) {
3252 queryData.nonCompositedForPositionReason = RenderLayer::NotCompositedForNoVisibleContent;
3253 return false;
3254 }
3255
3256 bool intersectsViewport = fixedLayerIntersectsViewport(layer);
3257 if (!intersectsViewport) {
3258 queryData.nonCompositedForPositionReason = RenderLayer::NotCompositedForBoundsOutOfView;
3259 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "Layer " << &layer << " is outside the viewport");
3260 return false;
3261 }
3262
3263 return true;
3264}
3265
3266bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresCompositingForOverflowScrolling(const RenderLayer& layer, RequiresCompositingData& queryData) const
3267{
3268 if (!layer.canUseCompositedScrolling())
3269 return false;
3270
3271 if (queryData.layoutUpToDate == LayoutUpToDate::No) {
3272 queryData.reevaluateAfterLayout = true;
3273 return layer.isComposited();
3274 }
3275
3276 return layer.hasCompositedScrollableOverflow();
3277}
3278
3279IndirectCompositingReason RenderLayerCompositor::computeIndirectCompositingReason(const RenderLayer& layer, bool hasCompositedDescendants, bool has3DTransformedDescendants, bool paintsIntoProvidedBacking) const
3280{
3281 // When a layer has composited descendants, some effects, like 2d transforms, filters, masks etc must be implemented
3282 // via compositing so that they also apply to those composited descendants.
3283 auto& renderer = layer.renderer();
3284 if (hasCompositedDescendants && (layer.isolatesCompositedBlending() || layer.transform() || renderer.createsGroup() || renderer.hasReflection()))
3285 return IndirectCompositingReason::GraphicalEffect;
3286
3287 // A layer with preserve-3d or perspective only needs to be composited if there are descendant layers that
3288 // will be affected by the preserve-3d or perspective.
3289 if (has3DTransformedDescendants) {
3290 if (renderer.style().transformStyle3D() == TransformStyle3D::Preserve3D)
3291 return IndirectCompositingReason::Preserve3D;
3292
3293 if (renderer.style().hasPerspective())
3294 return IndirectCompositingReason::Perspective;
3295 }
3296
3297 // If this layer scrolls independently from the layer that it would paint into, it needs to get composited.
3298 if (!paintsIntoProvidedBacking && layer.hasCompositedScrollingAncestor()) {
3299 auto* paintDestination = layer.paintOrderParent();
3300 if (paintDestination && layerScrollBehahaviorRelativeToCompositedAncestor(layer, *paintDestination) != ScrollPositioningBehavior::None)
3301 return IndirectCompositingReason::OverflowScrollPositioning;
3302 }
3303
3304 // Check for clipping last; if compositing just for clipping, the layer doesn't need its own backing store.
3305 if (hasCompositedDescendants && clipsCompositingDescendants(layer))
3306 return IndirectCompositingReason::Clipping;
3307
3308 return IndirectCompositingReason::None;
3309}
3310
3311bool RenderLayerCompositor::styleChangeMayAffectIndirectCompositingReasons(const RenderStyle& oldStyle, const RenderStyle& newStyle)
3312{
3313 if (RenderElement::createsGroupForStyle(newStyle) != RenderElement::createsGroupForStyle(oldStyle))
3314 return true;
3315 if (newStyle.isolation() != oldStyle.isolation())
3316 return true;
3317 if (newStyle.hasTransform() != oldStyle.hasTransform())
3318 return true;
3319 if (newStyle.boxReflect() != oldStyle.boxReflect())
3320 return true;
3321 if (newStyle.transformStyle3D() != oldStyle.transformStyle3D())
3322 return true;
3323 if (newStyle.hasPerspective() != oldStyle.hasPerspective())
3324 return true;
3325
3326 return false;
3327}
3328
3329bool RenderLayerCompositor::isAsyncScrollableStickyLayer(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer** enclosingAcceleratedOverflowLayer) const
3330{
3331 ASSERT(layer.renderer().isStickilyPositioned());
3332
3333 auto* enclosingOverflowLayer = layer.enclosingOverflowClipLayer(ExcludeSelf);
3334
3335 if (enclosingOverflowLayer && enclosingOverflowLayer->hasCompositedScrollableOverflow()) {
3336 if (enclosingAcceleratedOverflowLayer)
3337 *enclosingAcceleratedOverflowLayer = enclosingOverflowLayer;
3338 return true;
3339 }
3340
3341 // If the layer is inside normal overflow, it's not async-scrollable.
3342 if (enclosingOverflowLayer)
3343 return false;
3344
3345 // No overflow ancestor, so see if the frame supports async scrolling.
3346 if (hasCoordinatedScrolling())
3347 return true;
3348
3349#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
3350 // iOS WK1 has fixed/sticky support in the main frame via WebFixedPositionContent.
3351 return isMainFrameCompositor();
3352#else
3353 return false;
3354#endif
3355}
3356
3357bool RenderLayerCompositor::isViewportConstrainedFixedOrStickyLayer(const RenderLayer& layer) const
3358{
3359 if (layer.renderer().isStickilyPositioned())
3360 return isAsyncScrollableStickyLayer(layer);
3361
3362 if (!layer.renderer().isFixedPositioned())
3363 return false;
3364
3365 // FIXME: Handle fixed inside of a transform, which should not behave as fixed.
3366 for (auto* ancestor = layer.parent(); ancestor; ancestor = ancestor->parent()) {
3367 if (ancestor->hasCompositedScrollableOverflow())
3368 return true;
3369 if (ancestor->isStackingContext() && ancestor->isComposited() && ancestor->renderer().isFixedPositioned())
3370 return false;
3371 }
3372
3373 return true;
3374}
3375
3376bool RenderLayerCompositor::fixedLayerIntersectsViewport(const RenderLayer& layer) const
3377{
3378 ASSERT(layer.renderer().isFixedPositioned());
3379
3380 // Fixed position elements that are invisible in the current view don't get their own layer.
3381 // FIXME: We shouldn't have to check useFixedLayout() here; one of the viewport rects needs to give the correct answer.
3382 LayoutRect viewBounds;
3383 if (m_renderView.frameView().useFixedLayout())
3384 viewBounds = m_renderView.unscaledDocumentRect();
3385 else
3386 viewBounds = m_renderView.frameView().rectForFixedPositionLayout();
3387
3388 LayoutRect layerBounds = layer.calculateLayerBounds(&layer, LayoutSize(), { RenderLayer::UseLocalClipRectIfPossible, RenderLayer::IncludeFilterOutsets, RenderLayer::UseFragmentBoxesExcludingCompositing,
3389 RenderLayer::ExcludeHiddenDescendants, RenderLayer::DontConstrainForMask, RenderLayer::IncludeCompositedDescendants });
3390 // Map to m_renderView to ignore page scale.
3391 FloatRect absoluteBounds = layer.renderer().localToContainerQuad(FloatRect(layerBounds), &m_renderView).boundingBox();
3392 return viewBounds.intersects(enclosingIntRect(absoluteBounds));
3393}
3394
3395bool RenderLayerCompositor::useCoordinatedScrollingForLayer(const RenderLayer& layer) const
3396{
3397 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer() && hasCoordinatedScrolling())
3398 return true;
3399
3400 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
3401 return scrollingCoordinator->coordinatesScrollingForOverflowLayer(layer);
3402
3403 return false;
3404}
3405
3406ScrollPositioningBehavior RenderLayerCompositor::layerScrollBehahaviorRelativeToCompositedAncestor(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer& compositedAncestor)
3407{
3408 if (!layer.hasCompositedScrollingAncestor())
3409 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::None;
3410
3411 auto needsMovesNode = [&] {
3412 bool result = false;
3413 traverseAncestorLayers(layer, [&](const RenderLayer& ancestorLayer, bool isContainingBlockChain, bool /* isPaintOrderAncestor */) {
3414 if (&ancestorLayer == &compositedAncestor)
3415 return AncestorTraversal::Stop;
3416
3417 if (isContainingBlockChain && ancestorLayer.hasCompositedScrollableOverflow()) {
3418 result = true;
3419 return AncestorTraversal::Stop;
3420 }
3421
3422 return AncestorTraversal::Continue;
3423 });
3424
3425 return result;
3426 };
3427
3428 if (needsMovesNode())
3429 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::Moves;
3430
3431 if (layer.boxScrollingScope() != compositedAncestor.contentsScrollingScope())
3432 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::Stationary;
3433
3434 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::None;
3435}
3436
3437static void collectStationaryLayerRelatedOverflowNodes(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer&, Vector<ScrollingNodeID>& scrollingNodes)
3438{
3439 ASSERT(layer.isComposited());
3440
3441 auto appendOverflowLayerNodeID = [&scrollingNodes] (const RenderLayer& overflowLayer) {
3442 ASSERT(overflowLayer.isComposited());
3443 auto scrollingNodeID = overflowLayer.backing()->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling);
3444 if (scrollingNodeID)
3445 scrollingNodes.append(scrollingNodeID);
3446 else
3447 LOG(Scrolling, "Layer %p doesn't have scrolling node ID yet", &overflowLayer);
3448 };
3449
3450 // Collect all the composited scrollers which affect the position of this layer relative to its compositing ancestor (which might be inside the scroller or the scroller itself).
3451 bool seenPaintOrderAncestor = false;
3452 traverseAncestorLayers(layer, [&](const RenderLayer& ancestorLayer, bool isContainingBlockChain, bool isPaintOrderAncestor) {
3453 seenPaintOrderAncestor |= isPaintOrderAncestor;
3454 if (isContainingBlockChain && isPaintOrderAncestor)
3455 return AncestorTraversal::Stop;
3456
3457 if (seenPaintOrderAncestor && !isContainingBlockChain && ancestorLayer.hasCompositedScrollableOverflow())
3458 appendOverflowLayerNodeID(ancestorLayer);
3459
3460 return AncestorTraversal::Continue;
3461 });
3462}
3463
3464ScrollPositioningBehavior RenderLayerCompositor::computeCoordinatedPositioningForLayer(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositedAncestor) const
3465{
3466 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer())
3467 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::None;
3468
3469 if (layer.renderer().isFixedPositioned())
3470 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::None;
3471
3472 if (!layer.hasCompositedScrollingAncestor())
3473 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::None;
3474
3475 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
3476 if (!scrollingCoordinator)
3477 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::None;
3478
3479 if (!compositedAncestor) {
3480 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
3481 return ScrollPositioningBehavior::None;
3482 }
3483
3484 return layerScrollBehahaviorRelativeToCompositedAncestor(layer, *compositedAncestor);
3485}
3486
3487static Vector<ScrollingNodeID> collectRelatedCoordinatedScrollingNodes(const RenderLayer& layer, ScrollPositioningBehavior positioningBehavior)
3488{
3489 Vector<ScrollingNodeID> overflowNodeIDs;
3490
3491 switch (positioningBehavior) {
3492 case ScrollPositioningBehavior::Stationary: {
3493 auto* compositedAncestor = layer.ancestorCompositingLayer();
3494 if (!compositedAncestor)
3495 return overflowNodeIDs;
3496 collectStationaryLayerRelatedOverflowNodes(layer, *compositedAncestor, overflowNodeIDs);
3497 break;
3498 }
3499 case ScrollPositioningBehavior::Moves:
3500 case ScrollPositioningBehavior::None:
3501 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
3502 break;
3503 }
3504
3505 return overflowNodeIDs;
3506}
3507
3508bool RenderLayerCompositor::isLayerForIFrameWithScrollCoordinatedContents(const RenderLayer& layer) const
3509{
3510 if (!is<RenderWidget>(layer.renderer()))
3511 return false;
3512
3513 auto* contentDocument = downcast<RenderWidget>(layer.renderer()).frameOwnerElement().contentDocument();
3514 if (!contentDocument)
3515 return false;
3516
3517 auto* view = contentDocument->renderView();
3518 if (!view)
3519 return false;
3520
3521 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
3522 return scrollingCoordinator->coordinatesScrollingForFrameView(view->frameView());
3523
3524 return false;
3525}
3526
3527bool RenderLayerCompositor::isRunningTransformAnimation(RenderLayerModelObject& renderer) const
3528{
3529 if (!(m_compositingTriggers & ChromeClient::AnimationTrigger))
3530 return false;
3531
3532 if (auto styleable = Styleable::fromRenderer(renderer)) {
3533 if (auto* effectsStack = styleable->keyframeEffectStack())
3534 return effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyTransform)
3535 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyRotate)
3536 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyScale)
3537 || effectsStack->isCurrentlyAffectingProperty(CSSPropertyTranslate);
3538 }
3539
3540 return false;
3541}
3542
3543// If an element has composited negative z-index children, those children render in front of the
3544// layer background, so we need an extra 'contents' layer for the foreground of the layer object.
3545bool RenderLayerCompositor::needsContentsCompositingLayer(const RenderLayer& layer) const
3546{
3547 for (auto* layer : layer.negativeZOrderLayers()) {
3548 if (layer->isComposited() || layer->hasCompositingDescendant())
3549 return true;
3550 }
3551
3552 return false;
3553}
3554
3555bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresScrollLayer(RootLayerAttachment attachment) const
3556{
3557 auto& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
3558
3559 // This applies when the application UI handles scrolling, in which case RenderLayerCompositor doesn't need to manage it.
3560 if (frameView.delegatesScrolling() && isMainFrameCompositor())
3561 return false;
3562
3563 // We need to handle our own scrolling if we're:
3564 return !m_renderView.frameView().platformWidget() // viewless (i.e. non-Mac, or Mac in WebKit2)
3565 || attachment == RootLayerAttachedViaEnclosingFrame; // a composited frame on Mac
3566}
3567
3568void paintScrollbar(Scrollbar* scrollbar, GraphicsContext& context, const IntRect& clip)
3569{
3570 if (!scrollbar)
3571 return;
3572
3573 context.save();
3574 const IntRect& scrollbarRect = scrollbar->frameRect();
3575 context.translate(-scrollbarRect.location());
3576 IntRect transformedClip = clip;
3577 transformedClip.moveBy(scrollbarRect.location());
3578 scrollbar->paint(context, transformedClip);
3579 context.restore();
3580}
3581
3582void RenderLayerCompositor::paintContents(const GraphicsLayer* graphicsLayer, GraphicsContext& context, const FloatRect& clip, GraphicsLayerPaintBehavior)
3583{
3584#if PLATFORM(MAC)
3585 LocalDefaultSystemAppearance localAppearance(m_renderView.useDarkAppearance());
3586#endif
3587
3588 IntRect pixelSnappedRectForIntegralPositionedItems = snappedIntRect(LayoutRect(clip));
3589 if (graphicsLayer == layerForHorizontalScrollbar())
3590 paintScrollbar(m_renderView.frameView().horizontalScrollbar(), context, pixelSnappedRectForIntegralPositionedItems);
3591 else if (graphicsLayer == layerForVerticalScrollbar())
3592 paintScrollbar(m_renderView.frameView().verticalScrollbar(), context, pixelSnappedRectForIntegralPositionedItems);
3593 else if (graphicsLayer == layerForScrollCorner()) {
3594 const IntRect& scrollCorner = m_renderView.frameView().scrollCornerRect();
3595 context.save();
3596 context.translate(-scrollCorner.location());
3597 IntRect transformedClip = pixelSnappedRectForIntegralPositionedItems;
3598 transformedClip.moveBy(scrollCorner.location());
3599 m_renderView.frameView().paintScrollCorner(context, transformedClip);
3600 context.restore();
3601 }
3602}
3603
3604bool RenderLayerCompositor::supportsFixedRootBackgroundCompositing() const
3605{
3606 auto* renderViewBacking = m_renderView.layer()->backing();
3607 return renderViewBacking && renderViewBacking->isFrameLayerWithTiledBacking();
3608}
3609
3610bool RenderLayerCompositor::needsFixedRootBackgroundLayer(const RenderLayer& layer) const
3611{
3612 if (!layer.isRenderViewLayer())
3613 return false;
3614
3615 if (m_renderView.settings().fixedBackgroundsPaintRelativeToDocument())
3616 return false;
3617
3618 return supportsFixedRootBackgroundCompositing() && m_renderView.rootBackgroundIsEntirelyFixed();
3619}
3620
3621GraphicsLayer* RenderLayerCompositor::fixedRootBackgroundLayer() const
3622{
3623 // Get the fixed root background from the RenderView layer's backing.
3624 auto* viewLayer = m_renderView.layer();
3625 if (!viewLayer)
3626 return nullptr;
3627
3628 if (viewLayer->isComposited() && viewLayer->backing()->backgroundLayerPaintsFixedRootBackground())
3629 return viewLayer->backing()->backgroundLayer();
3630
3631 return nullptr;
3632}
3633
3634void RenderLayerCompositor::resetTrackedRepaintRects()
3635{
3636 if (auto* rootLayer = rootGraphicsLayer()) {
3637 GraphicsLayer::traverse(*rootLayer, [](GraphicsLayer& layer) {
3638 layer.resetTrackedRepaints();
3639 });
3640 }
3641}

3657
3658float RenderLayerCompositor::contentsScaleMultiplierForNewTiles(const GraphicsLayer*) const
3659{
3660#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
3661 LegacyTileCache* tileCache = nullptr;
3662 if (auto* frameView = page().mainFrame().view())
3663 tileCache = frameView->legacyTileCache();
3664
3665 if (!tileCache)
3666 return 1;
3667
3668 return tileCache->tileControllerShouldUseLowScaleTiles() ? 0.125 : 1;
3669#else
3670 return 1;
3671#endif
3672}
3673
3674bool RenderLayerCompositor::documentUsesTiledBacking() const
3675{
3676 auto* layer = m_renderView.layer();
3677 if (!layer)
3678 return false;
3679
3680 auto* backing = layer->backing();
3681 if (!backing)
3682 return false;
3683
3684 return backing->isFrameLayerWithTiledBacking();
3685}
3686
3687bool RenderLayerCompositor::isMainFrameCompositor() const
3688{
3689 return m_renderView.frameView().frame().isMainFrame();
3690}
3691
3692bool RenderLayerCompositor::shouldCompositeOverflowControls() const
3693{
3694 auto& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
3695
3696 if (!frameView.managesScrollbars())
3697 return false;
3698
3699 if (documentUsesTiledBacking())
3700 return true;
3701
3702 if (m_overflowControlsHostLayer && isMainFrameCompositor())
3703 return true;
3704
3705#if !USE(COORDINATED_GRAPHICS)
3706 if (!frameView.hasOverlayScrollbars())
3707 return false;
3708#endif
3709
3710 return true;
3711}
3712
3713bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresHorizontalScrollbarLayer() const
3714{
3715 return shouldCompositeOverflowControls() && m_renderView.frameView().horizontalScrollbar();
3716}
3717
3718bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresVerticalScrollbarLayer() const
3719{
3720 return shouldCompositeOverflowControls() && m_renderView.frameView().verticalScrollbar();
3721}
3722
3723bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresScrollCornerLayer() const
3724{
3725 return shouldCompositeOverflowControls() && m_renderView.frameView().isScrollCornerVisible();
3726}

3728#if ENABLE(RUBBER_BANDING)
3729bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresOverhangAreasLayer() const
3730{
3731 if (!isMainFrameCompositor())
3732 return false;
3733
3734 // We do want a layer if we're using tiled drawing and can scroll.
3735 if (documentUsesTiledBacking() && m_renderView.frameView().hasOpaqueBackground() && !m_renderView.frameView().prohibitsScrolling())
3736 return true;
3737
3738 return false;
3739}
3740
3741bool RenderLayerCompositor::requiresContentShadowLayer() const
3742{
3743 if (!isMainFrameCompositor())
3744 return false;
3745
3746#if PLATFORM(COCOA)
3747 if (viewHasTransparentBackground())
3748 return false;
3749
3750 // If the background is going to extend, then it doesn't make sense to have a shadow layer.
3751 if (m_renderView.settings().backgroundShouldExtendBeyondPage())
3752 return false;
3753
3754 // On Mac, we want a content shadow layer if we're using tiled drawing and can scroll.
3755 if (documentUsesTiledBacking() && !m_renderView.frameView().prohibitsScrolling())
3756 return true;
3757#endif
3758
3759 return false;
3760}

3762GraphicsLayer* RenderLayerCompositor::updateLayerForTopOverhangArea(bool wantsLayer)
3763{
3764 if (!isMainFrameCompositor())

3769 return nullptr;

3774 m_layerForTopOverhangArea->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("top overhang"));
3775 m_scrolledContentsLayer->addChildBelow(*m_layerForTopOverhangArea, m_rootContentsLayer.get());
3776 }

3779}

3781GraphicsLayer* RenderLayerCompositor::updateLayerForBottomOverhangArea(bool wantsLayer)
3782{
3783 if (!isMainFrameCompositor())
3784 return nullptr;
3785
3786 if (!wantsLayer) {
3787 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForBottomOverhangArea);
3788 return nullptr;
3789 }
3790
3791 if (!m_layerForBottomOverhangArea) {
3792 m_layerForBottomOverhangArea = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
3793 m_layerForBottomOverhangArea->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("bottom overhang"));
3794 m_scrolledContentsLayer->addChildBelow(*m_layerForBottomOverhangArea, m_rootContentsLayer.get());

3801
3802GraphicsLayer* RenderLayerCompositor::updateLayerForHeader(bool wantsLayer)
3803{
3804 if (!isMainFrameCompositor())
3805 return nullptr;
3806
3807 if (!wantsLayer) {
3808 if (m_layerForHeader) {
3809 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForHeader);
3810
3811 // The ScrollingTree knows about the header layer, and the position of the root layer is affected
3812 // by the header layer, so if we remove the header, we need to tell the scrolling tree.
3813 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
3814 scrollingCoordinator->frameViewRootLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView());
3815 }
3816 return nullptr;
3817 }
3818
3819 if (!m_layerForHeader) {
3820 m_layerForHeader = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
3821 m_layerForHeader->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("header"));
3822 m_scrolledContentsLayer->addChildAbove(*m_layerForHeader, m_rootContentsLayer.get());
3823 m_renderView.frameView().addPaintPendingMilestones(DidFirstFlushForHeaderLayer);
3824 }
3825
3826 m_layerForHeader->setPosition(FloatPoint(0,
3827 FrameView::yPositionForHeaderLayer(m_renderView.frameView().scrollPosition(), m_renderView.frameView().topContentInset())));
3828 m_layerForHeader->setAnchorPoint(FloatPoint3D());
3829 m_layerForHeader->setSize(FloatSize(m_renderView.frameView().visibleWidth(), m_renderView.frameView().headerHeight()));
3830
3831 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
3832 scrollingCoordinator->frameViewRootLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView());
3833
3834 page().chrome().client().didAddHeaderLayer(*m_layerForHeader);
3835
3836 return m_layerForHeader.get();
3837}
3838
3839GraphicsLayer* RenderLayerCompositor::updateLayerForFooter(bool wantsLayer)
3840{
3841 if (!isMainFrameCompositor())
3842 return nullptr;
3843
3844 if (!wantsLayer) {
3845 if (m_layerForFooter) {
3846 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForFooter);
3847
3848 // The ScrollingTree knows about the footer layer, and the total scrollable size is affected
3849 // by the footer layer, so if we remove the footer, we need to tell the scrolling tree.
3850 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
3851 scrollingCoordinator->frameViewRootLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView());
3852 }
3853 return nullptr;
3854 }
3855
3856 if (!m_layerForFooter) {
3857 m_layerForFooter = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
3858 m_layerForFooter->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("footer"));
3859 m_scrolledContentsLayer->addChildAbove(*m_layerForFooter, m_rootContentsLayer.get());
3860 }
3861
3862 float totalContentHeight = m_rootContentsLayer->size().height() + m_renderView.frameView().headerHeight() + m_renderView.frameView().footerHeight();
3863 m_layerForFooter->setPosition(FloatPoint(0, FrameView::yPositionForFooterLayer(m_renderView.frameView().scrollPosition(),
3864 m_renderView.frameView().topContentInset(), totalContentHeight, m_renderView.frameView().footerHeight())));
3865 m_layerForFooter->setAnchorPoint(FloatPoint3D());
3866 m_layerForFooter->setSize(FloatSize(m_renderView.frameView().visibleWidth(), m_renderView.frameView().footerHeight()));
3867
3868 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
3869 scrollingCoordinator->frameViewRootLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView());
3870
3871 page().chrome().client().didAddFooterLayer(*m_layerForFooter);
3872
3873 return m_layerForFooter.get();
3874}
3875
3876void RenderLayerCompositor::updateLayerForOverhangAreasBackgroundColor()
3877{
3878 if (!m_layerForOverhangAreas)
3879 return;
3880
3881 Color backgroundColor;
3882
3883 if (m_renderView.settings().backgroundShouldExtendBeyondPage()) {
3884 backgroundColor = ([&] {
3885 if (auto underPageBackgroundColorOverride = page().underPageBackgroundColorOverride(); underPageBackgroundColorOverride.isValid())
3886 return underPageBackgroundColorOverride;
3887
3888 return m_rootExtendedBackgroundColor;
3889 })();
3890 m_layerForOverhangAreas->setBackgroundColor(backgroundColor);
3891 }
3892
3893 if (!backgroundColor.isValid())
3894 m_layerForOverhangAreas->setCustomAppearance(GraphicsLayer::CustomAppearance::ScrollingOverhang);
3895}
3896
3897#endif // ENABLE(RUBBER_BANDING)
3898
3899bool RenderLayerCompositor::viewNeedsToInvalidateEventRegionOfEnclosingCompositingLayerForRepaint() const
3900{
3901 // Event regions are only updated on compositing layers. Non-composited layers must
3902 // delegate to their enclosing compositing layer for repaint to update the event region
3903 // for elements inside them.
3904 return !m_renderView.isComposited();
3905}
3906
3907bool RenderLayerCompositor::viewHasTransparentBackground(Color* backgroundColor) const
3908{
3909 if (m_renderView.frameView().isTransparent()) {
3910 if (backgroundColor)
3911 *backgroundColor = Color(); // Return an invalid color.
3912 return true;
3913 }
3914
3915 Color documentBackgroundColor = m_renderView.frameView().documentBackgroundColor();
3916 if (!documentBackgroundColor.isValid())
3917 documentBackgroundColor = m_renderView.frameView().baseBackgroundColor();
3918
3919 ASSERT(documentBackgroundColor.isValid());
3920
3921 if (backgroundColor)
3922 *backgroundColor = documentBackgroundColor;
3923
3924 return !documentBackgroundColor.isOpaque();
3925}
3926
3927// We can't rely on getting layerStyleChanged() for a style change that affects the root background, because the style change may
3928// be on the body which has no RenderLayer.
3929void RenderLayerCompositor::rootOrBodyStyleChanged(RenderElement& renderer, const RenderStyle* oldStyle)
3930{
3931 if (!usesCompositing())
3932 return;
3933
3934 Color oldBackgroundColor;
3935 if (oldStyle)
3936 oldBackgroundColor = oldStyle->visitedDependentColorWithColorFilter(CSSPropertyBackgroundColor);
3937
3938 if (oldBackgroundColor != renderer.style().visitedDependentColorWithColorFilter(CSSPropertyBackgroundColor))
3939 rootBackgroundColorOrTransparencyChanged();
3940
3941 bool hadFixedBackground = oldStyle && oldStyle->hasEntirelyFixedBackground();
3942 if (hadFixedBackground != renderer.style().hasEntirelyFixedBackground())
3943 rootLayerConfigurationChanged();
3944}
3945
3946void RenderLayerCompositor::rootBackgroundColorOrTransparencyChanged()
3947{
3948 if (!usesCompositing())
3949 return;
3950
3951 Color backgroundColor;
3952 bool isTransparent = viewHasTransparentBackground(&backgroundColor);
3953
3954 Color extendedBackgroundColor = m_renderView.settings().backgroundShouldExtendBeyondPage() ? backgroundColor : Color();
3955
3956 bool transparencyChanged = m_viewBackgroundIsTransparent != isTransparent;
3957 bool backgroundColorChanged = m_viewBackgroundColor != backgroundColor;
3958 bool extendedBackgroundColorChanged = m_rootExtendedBackgroundColor != extendedBackgroundColor;
3959
3960 if (!transparencyChanged && !backgroundColorChanged && !extendedBackgroundColorChanged)
3961 return;
3962
3963 LOG(Compositing, "RenderLayerCompositor %p rootBackgroundColorOrTransparencyChanged. isTransparent=%d", this, isTransparent);
3964
3965 m_viewBackgroundIsTransparent = isTransparent;
3966 m_viewBackgroundColor = backgroundColor;
3967 m_rootExtendedBackgroundColor = extendedBackgroundColor;
3968
3969 if (extendedBackgroundColorChanged) {
3970 page().chrome().client().pageExtendedBackgroundColorDidChange();
3971
3972#if ENABLE(RUBBER_BANDING)
3973 updateLayerForOverhangAreasBackgroundColor();
3974#endif
3975 }
3976
3977 rootLayerConfigurationChanged();
3978}
3979
3980void RenderLayerCompositor::updateOverflowControlsLayers()
3981{
3982#if ENABLE(RUBBER_BANDING)
3983 if (requiresOverhangAreasLayer()) {
3984 if (!m_layerForOverhangAreas) {
3985 m_layerForOverhangAreas = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
3986 m_layerForOverhangAreas->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("overhang areas"));
3987 m_layerForOverhangAreas->setDrawsContent(false);
3988
3989 float topContentInset = m_renderView.frameView().topContentInset();
3990 IntSize overhangAreaSize = m_renderView.frameView().frameRect().size();
3991 overhangAreaSize.setHeight(overhangAreaSize.height() - topContentInset);
3992 m_layerForOverhangAreas->setSize(overhangAreaSize);
3993 m_layerForOverhangAreas->setPosition(FloatPoint(0, topContentInset));
3994 m_layerForOverhangAreas->setAnchorPoint(FloatPoint3D());
3995 updateLayerForOverhangAreasBackgroundColor();
3996
3997 // We want the overhang areas layer to be positioned below the frame contents,
3998 // so insert it below the clip layer.
3999 m_overflowControlsHostLayer->addChildBelow(*m_layerForOverhangAreas, layerForClipping());
4000 }
4001 } else
4002 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForOverhangAreas);
4003
4004 if (requiresContentShadowLayer()) {
4005 if (!m_contentShadowLayer) {
4006 m_contentShadowLayer = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
4007 m_contentShadowLayer->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("content shadow"));
4008 m_contentShadowLayer->setSize(m_rootContentsLayer->size());
4009 m_contentShadowLayer->setPosition(m_rootContentsLayer->position());
4010 m_contentShadowLayer->setAnchorPoint(FloatPoint3D());
4011 m_contentShadowLayer->setCustomAppearance(GraphicsLayer::CustomAppearance::ScrollingShadow);
4012
4013 m_scrolledContentsLayer->addChildBelow(*m_contentShadowLayer, m_rootContentsLayer.get());
4014 }
4015 } else
4016 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_contentShadowLayer);
4017#endif
4018
4019 if (requiresHorizontalScrollbarLayer()) {
4020 if (!m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar) {
4021 m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
4022 m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar->setAllowsBackingStoreDetaching(false);
4023 m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar->setShowDebugBorder(m_showDebugBorders);
4024 m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("horizontal scrollbar container"));
4025#if PLATFORM(COCOA) && USE(CA)
4026 m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar->setAcceleratesDrawing(acceleratedDrawingEnabled());
4027#endif
4028 m_overflowControlsHostLayer->addChild(*m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar);
4029
4030 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
4031 scrollingCoordinator->scrollableAreaScrollbarLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView(), HorizontalScrollbar);
4032 }
4033 } else if (m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar) {
4034 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar);
4035
4036 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
4037 scrollingCoordinator->scrollableAreaScrollbarLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView(), HorizontalScrollbar);
4038 }
4039
4040 if (requiresVerticalScrollbarLayer()) {
4041 if (!m_layerForVerticalScrollbar) {
4042 m_layerForVerticalScrollbar = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
4043 m_layerForVerticalScrollbar->setAllowsBackingStoreDetaching(false);
4044 m_layerForVerticalScrollbar->setShowDebugBorder(m_showDebugBorders);
4045 m_layerForVerticalScrollbar->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("vertical scrollbar container"));
4046#if PLATFORM(COCOA) && USE(CA)
4047 m_layerForVerticalScrollbar->setAcceleratesDrawing(acceleratedDrawingEnabled());
4048#endif
4049 m_overflowControlsHostLayer->addChild(*m_layerForVerticalScrollbar);
4050
4051 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
4052 scrollingCoordinator->scrollableAreaScrollbarLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView(), VerticalScrollbar);
4053 }
4054 } else if (m_layerForVerticalScrollbar) {
4055 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForVerticalScrollbar);
4056
4057 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
4058 scrollingCoordinator->scrollableAreaScrollbarLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView(), VerticalScrollbar);
4059 }
4060
4061 if (requiresScrollCornerLayer()) {
4062 if (!m_layerForScrollCorner) {
4063 m_layerForScrollCorner = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
4064 m_layerForScrollCorner->setAllowsBackingStoreDetaching(false);
4065 m_layerForScrollCorner->setShowDebugBorder(m_showDebugBorders);
4066 m_layerForScrollCorner->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("scroll corner"));
4067#if PLATFORM(COCOA) && USE(CA)
4068 m_layerForScrollCorner->setAcceleratesDrawing(acceleratedDrawingEnabled());
4069#endif
4070 m_overflowControlsHostLayer->addChild(*m_layerForScrollCorner);
4071 }
4072 } else
4073 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForScrollCorner);
4074
4075 m_renderView.frameView().positionScrollbarLayers();
4076}
4077
4078void RenderLayerCompositor::ensureRootLayer()
4079{
4080 RootLayerAttachment expectedAttachment = isMainFrameCompositor() ? RootLayerAttachedViaChromeClient : RootLayerAttachedViaEnclosingFrame;
4081 if (expectedAttachment == m_rootLayerAttachment)
4082 return;
4083
4084 if (!m_rootContentsLayer) {
4085 m_rootContentsLayer = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
4086 m_rootContentsLayer->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("content root"));
4087 IntRect overflowRect = snappedIntRect(m_renderView.layoutOverflowRect());
4088 m_rootContentsLayer->setSize(FloatSize(overflowRect.maxX(), overflowRect.maxY()));
4089 m_rootContentsLayer->setPosition(FloatPoint());
4090
4091#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
4092 // Page scale is applied above this on iOS, so we'll just say that our root layer applies it.
4093 auto& frame = m_renderView.frameView().frame();
4094 if (frame.isMainFrame())
4095 m_rootContentsLayer->setAppliesPageScale();
4096#endif
4097
4098 // Need to clip to prevent transformed content showing outside this frame
4099 updateRootContentLayerClipping();
4100 }
4101
4102 if (requiresScrollLayer(expectedAttachment)) {
4103 if (!m_overflowControlsHostLayer) {
4104 ASSERT(!m_scrolledContentsLayer);
4105 ASSERT(!m_clipLayer);
4106
4107 // Create a layer to host the clipping layer and the overflow controls layers.
4108 m_overflowControlsHostLayer = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
4109 m_overflowControlsHostLayer->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("overflow controls host"));
4110
4111 m_scrolledContentsLayer = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this, GraphicsLayer::Type::ScrolledContents);
4112 m_scrolledContentsLayer->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("frame scrolled contents"));
4113 m_scrolledContentsLayer->setAnchorPoint({ });
4114
4115#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
4116 if (m_renderView.settings().asyncFrameScrollingEnabled()) {
4117 m_scrollContainerLayer = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this, GraphicsLayer::Type::ScrollContainer);
4118
4119 m_scrollContainerLayer->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("scroll container"));
4120 m_scrollContainerLayer->setMasksToBounds(true);
4121 m_scrollContainerLayer->setAnchorPoint({ });
4122
4123 m_scrollContainerLayer->addChild(*m_scrolledContentsLayer);
4124 m_overflowControlsHostLayer->addChild(*m_scrollContainerLayer);
4125 }
4126#endif
4127 // FIXME: m_scrollContainerLayer and m_clipLayer have similar roles here, but m_clipLayer has some special positioning to
4128 // account for clipping and top content inset (see FrameView::yPositionForInsetClipLayer()).
4129 if (!m_scrollContainerLayer) {
4130 m_clipLayer = GraphicsLayer::create(graphicsLayerFactory(), *this);
4131 m_clipLayer->setName(MAKE_STATIC_STRING_IMPL("frame clipping"));
4132 m_clipLayer->setMasksToBounds(true);
4133 m_clipLayer->setAnchorPoint({ });
4134
4135 m_clipLayer->addChild(*m_scrolledContentsLayer);
4136 m_overflowControlsHostLayer->addChild(*m_clipLayer);
4137 }
4138
4139 m_scrolledContentsLayer->addChild(*m_rootContentsLayer);
4140
4141 updateScrollLayerClipping();
4142 updateOverflowControlsLayers();
4143
4144 if (hasCoordinatedScrolling())
4145 scheduleRenderingUpdate();
4146 else
4147 updateScrollLayerPosition();
4148 }
4149 } else {
4150 if (m_overflowControlsHostLayer) {
4151 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_overflowControlsHostLayer);
4152 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_clipLayer);
4153 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_scrollContainerLayer);
4154 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_scrolledContentsLayer);
4155 }
4156 }
4157
4158 // Check to see if we have to change the attachment
4159 if (m_rootLayerAttachment != RootLayerUnattached)
4160 detachRootLayer();
4161
4162 attachRootLayer(expectedAttachment);
4163}
4164
4165void RenderLayerCompositor::destroyRootLayer()
4166{
4167 if (!m_rootContentsLayer)
4168 return;
4169
4170 detachRootLayer();
4171
4172#if ENABLE(RUBBER_BANDING)
4173 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForOverhangAreas);
4174#endif
4175
4176 if (m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar) {
4177 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForHorizontalScrollbar);
4178 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
4179 scrollingCoordinator->scrollableAreaScrollbarLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView(), HorizontalScrollbar);
4180 if (auto* horizontalScrollbar = m_renderView.frameView().verticalScrollbar())
4181 m_renderView.frameView().invalidateScrollbar(*horizontalScrollbar, IntRect(IntPoint(0, 0), horizontalScrollbar->frameRect().size()));
4182 }
4183
4184 if (m_layerForVerticalScrollbar) {
4185 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForVerticalScrollbar);
4186 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
4187 scrollingCoordinator->scrollableAreaScrollbarLayerDidChange(m_renderView.frameView(), VerticalScrollbar);
4188 if (auto* verticalScrollbar = m_renderView.frameView().verticalScrollbar())
4189 m_renderView.frameView().invalidateScrollbar(*verticalScrollbar, IntRect(IntPoint(0, 0), verticalScrollbar->frameRect().size()));
4190 }
4191
4192 if (m_layerForScrollCorner) {
4193 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_layerForScrollCorner);
4194 m_renderView.frameView().invalidateScrollCorner(m_renderView.frameView().scrollCornerRect());
4195 }
4196
4197 if (m_overflowControlsHostLayer) {
4198 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_overflowControlsHostLayer);
4199 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_clipLayer);
4200 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_scrollContainerLayer);
4201 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_scrolledContentsLayer);
4202 }
4203 ASSERT(!m_scrolledContentsLayer);
4204 GraphicsLayer::unparentAndClear(m_rootContentsLayer);
4205
4206 m_layerUpdater = nullptr;
4207}
4208
4209void RenderLayerCompositor::attachRootLayer(RootLayerAttachment attachment)
4210{
4211 if (!m_rootContentsLayer)
4212 return;
4213
4214 LOG(Compositing, "RenderLayerCompositor %p attachRootLayer %d", this, attachment);
4215
4216 switch (attachment) {
4217 case RootLayerUnattached:
4218 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4219 break;
4220 case RootLayerAttachedViaChromeClient: {
4221 auto& frame = m_renderView.frameView().frame();
4222 page().chrome().client().attachRootGraphicsLayer(frame, rootGraphicsLayer());
4223 break;
4224 }
4225 case RootLayerAttachedViaEnclosingFrame: {
4226 // The layer will get hooked up via RenderLayerBacking::updateConfiguration()
4227 // for the frame's renderer in the parent document.
4228 if (auto* ownerElement = m_renderView.document().ownerElement())
4229 ownerElement->scheduleInvalidateStyleAndLayerComposition();
4230 break;
4231 }
4232 }
4233
4234 m_rootLayerAttachment = attachment;
4235 rootLayerAttachmentChanged();
4236
4237 if (m_shouldFlushOnReattach) {
4238 scheduleRenderingUpdate();
4239 m_shouldFlushOnReattach = false;
4240 }
4241}
4242
4243void RenderLayerCompositor::detachRootLayer()
4244{
4245 if (!m_rootContentsLayer || m_rootLayerAttachment == RootLayerUnattached)
4246 return;
4247
4248 switch (m_rootLayerAttachment) {
4249 case RootLayerAttachedViaEnclosingFrame: {
4250 // The layer will get unhooked up via RenderLayerBacking::updateConfiguration()
4251 // for the frame's renderer in the parent document.
4252 if (m_overflowControlsHostLayer)
4253 m_overflowControlsHostLayer->removeFromParent();
4254 else
4255 m_rootContentsLayer->removeFromParent();
4256
4257 if (auto* ownerElement = m_renderView.document().ownerElement())
4258 ownerElement->scheduleInvalidateStyleAndLayerComposition();
4259
4260 if (auto frameRootScrollingNodeID = m_renderView.frameView().scrollingNodeID()) {
4261 if (auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator())
4262 scrollingCoordinator->unparentNode(frameRootScrollingNodeID);
4263 }
4264 break;
4265 }
4266 case RootLayerAttachedViaChromeClient: {
4267 auto& frame = m_renderView.frameView().frame();
4268 page().chrome().client().attachRootGraphicsLayer(frame, nullptr);
4269 }
4270 break;
4271 case RootLayerUnattached:
4272 break;
4273 }
4274
4275 m_rootLayerAttachment = RootLayerUnattached;
4276 rootLayerAttachmentChanged();
4277}
4278
4279void RenderLayerCompositor::updateRootLayerAttachment()
4280{
4281 ensureRootLayer();
4282}
4283
4284void RenderLayerCompositor::rootLayerAttachmentChanged()
4285{
4286 // The document-relative page overlay layer (which is pinned to the main frame's layer tree)
4287 // is moved between different RenderLayerCompositors' layer trees, and needs to be
4288 // reattached whenever we swap in a new RenderLayerCompositor.
4289 if (m_rootLayerAttachment == RootLayerUnattached)
4290 return;
4291
4292 auto& frame = m_renderView.frameView().frame();
4293
4294 // The attachment can affect whether the RenderView layer's paintsIntoWindow() behavior,
4295 // so call updateDrawsContent() to update that.
4296 auto* layer = m_renderView.layer();
4297 if (auto* backing = layer ? layer->backing() : nullptr)
4298 backing->updateDrawsContent();
4299
4300 if (!frame.isMainFrame())
4301 return;
4302
4303 Ref<GraphicsLayer> overlayHost = page().pageOverlayController().layerWithDocumentOverlays();
4304 m_rootContentsLayer->addChild(WTFMove(overlayHost));
4305}
4306
4307void RenderLayerCompositor::notifyIFramesOfCompositingChange()
4308{
4309 // Compositing affects the answer to RenderIFrame::requiresAcceleratedCompositing(), so
4310 // we need to schedule a style recalc in our parent document.
4311 if (auto* ownerElement = m_renderView.document().ownerElement())
4312 ownerElement->scheduleInvalidateStyleAndLayerComposition();
4313}
4314
4315bool RenderLayerCompositor::layerHas3DContent(const RenderLayer& layer) const
4316{
4317 const RenderStyle& style = layer.renderer().style();
4318
4319 if (style.transformStyle3D() == TransformStyle3D::Preserve3D || style.hasPerspective() || styleHas3DTransformOperation(style))
4320 return true;
4321
4322 const_cast<RenderLayer&>(layer).updateLayerListsIfNeeded();
4323
4324#if ASSERT_ENABLED
4325 LayerListMutationDetector mutationChecker(const_cast<RenderLayer&>(layer));
4326#endif
4327
4328 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.negativeZOrderLayers()) {
4329 if (layerHas3DContent(*renderLayer))
4330 return true;
4331 }
4332
4333 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.positiveZOrderLayers()) {
4334 if (layerHas3DContent(*renderLayer))
4335 return true;
4336 }
4337
4338 for (auto* renderLayer : layer.normalFlowLayers()) {
4339 if (layerHas3DContent(*renderLayer))
4340 return true;
4341 }
4342
4343 return false;
4344}
4345
4346void RenderLayerCompositor::deviceOrPageScaleFactorChanged()
4347{
4348 // Page scale will only be applied at to the RenderView and sublayers, but the device scale factor
4349 // needs to be applied at the level of rootGraphicsLayer().
4350 if (auto* rootLayer = rootGraphicsLayer())
4351 rootLayer->noteDeviceOrPageScaleFactorChangedIncludingDescendants();
4352}
4353
4354void RenderLayerCompositor::removeFromScrollCoordinatedLayers(RenderLayer& layer)
4355{
4356#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
4357 if (m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator)
4358 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->removeLayer(layer);
4359#endif
4360
4361 detachScrollCoordinatedLayer(layer, allScrollCoordinationRoles());
4362}
4363
4364FixedPositionViewportConstraints RenderLayerCompositor::computeFixedViewportConstraints(RenderLayer& layer) const
4365{
4366 ASSERT(layer.isComposited());
4367
4368 auto* graphicsLayer = layer.backing()->graphicsLayer();
4369
4370 FixedPositionViewportConstraints constraints;
4371 constraints.setLayerPositionAtLastLayout(graphicsLayer->position());
4372 constraints.setViewportRectAtLastLayout(m_renderView.frameView().rectForFixedPositionLayout());
4373 constraints.setAlignmentOffset(graphicsLayer->pixelAlignmentOffset());
4374
4375 const RenderStyle& style = layer.renderer().style();
4376 if (!style.left().isAuto())
4377 constraints.addAnchorEdge(ViewportConstraints::AnchorEdgeLeft);
4378
4379 if (!style.right().isAuto())
4380 constraints.addAnchorEdge(ViewportConstraints::AnchorEdgeRight);
4381
4382 if (!style.top().isAuto())
4383 constraints.addAnchorEdge(ViewportConstraints::AnchorEdgeTop);
4384
4385 if (!style.bottom().isAuto())
4386 constraints.addAnchorEdge(ViewportConstraints::AnchorEdgeBottom);
4387
4388 // If left and right are auto, use left.
4389 if (style.left().isAuto() && style.right().isAuto())
4390 constraints.addAnchorEdge(ViewportConstraints::AnchorEdgeLeft);
4391
4392 // If top and bottom are auto, use top.
4393 if (style.top().isAuto() && style.bottom().isAuto())
4394 constraints.addAnchorEdge(ViewportConstraints::AnchorEdgeTop);
4395
4396 return constraints;
4397}
4398
4399StickyPositionViewportConstraints RenderLayerCompositor::computeStickyViewportConstraints(RenderLayer& layer) const
4400{
4401 ASSERT(layer.isComposited());
4402
4403 auto& renderer = downcast<RenderBoxModelObject>(layer.renderer());
4404
4405 StickyPositionViewportConstraints constraints;
4406 renderer.computeStickyPositionConstraints(constraints, renderer.constrainingRectForStickyPosition());
4407
4408 auto* graphicsLayer = layer.backing()->graphicsLayer();
4409 constraints.setLayerPositionAtLastLayout(graphicsLayer->position());
4410 constraints.setStickyOffsetAtLastLayout(renderer.stickyPositionOffset());
4411 constraints.setAlignmentOffset(graphicsLayer->pixelAlignmentOffset());
4412
4413 return constraints;
4414}
4415
4416static inline ScrollCoordinationRole scrollCoordinationRoleForNodeType(ScrollingNodeType nodeType)
4417{
4418 switch (nodeType) {
4419 case ScrollingNodeType::MainFrame:
4420 case ScrollingNodeType::Subframe:
4421 case ScrollingNodeType::Overflow:
4422 return ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling;
4423 case ScrollingNodeType::OverflowProxy:
4424 return ScrollCoordinationRole::ScrollingProxy;
4425 case ScrollingNodeType::FrameHosting:
4426 return ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting;
4427 case ScrollingNodeType::Fixed:
4428 case ScrollingNodeType::Sticky:
4429 return ScrollCoordinationRole::ViewportConstrained;
4430 case ScrollingNodeType::Positioned:
4431 return ScrollCoordinationRole::Positioning;
4432 }
4433 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4434 return ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling;
4435}
4436
4437ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::attachScrollingNode(RenderLayer& layer, ScrollingNodeType nodeType, ScrollingTreeState& treeState)
4438{
4439 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
4440 auto* backing = layer.backing();
4441 // Crash logs suggest that backing can be null here, but we don't know how: rdar://problem/18545452.
4442 ASSERT(backing);
4443 if (!backing)
4444 return 0;
4445
4446 ASSERT(treeState.parentNodeID || nodeType == ScrollingNodeType::Subframe);
4447 ASSERT_IMPLIES(nodeType == ScrollingNodeType::MainFrame, !treeState.parentNodeID.value());
4448
4449 ScrollCoordinationRole role = scrollCoordinationRoleForNodeType(nodeType);
4450 ScrollingNodeID nodeID = backing->scrollingNodeIDForRole(role);
4451
4452 nodeID = registerScrollingNodeID(*scrollingCoordinator, nodeID, nodeType, treeState);
4453
4454 LOG_WITH_STREAM(ScrollingTree, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor " << this << " attachScrollingNode " << nodeID << " (layer " << backing->graphicsLayer()->primaryLayerID() << ") type " << nodeType << " parent " << treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0));
4455
4456 if (!nodeID)
4457 return 0;
4458
4459 backing->setScrollingNodeIDForRole(nodeID, role);
4460
4461#if ENABLE(SCROLLING_THREAD)
4462 if (nodeType == ScrollingNodeType::Subframe)
4463 m_clipLayer->setScrollingNodeID(nodeID);
4464#endif
4465
4466 m_scrollingNodeToLayerMap.add(nodeID, makeWeakPtr(layer));
4467
4468 return nodeID;
4469}
4470
4471ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::registerScrollingNodeID(ScrollingCoordinator& scrollingCoordinator, ScrollingNodeID nodeID, ScrollingNodeType nodeType, struct ScrollingTreeState& treeState)
4472{
4473 if (!nodeID)
4474 nodeID = scrollingCoordinator.uniqueScrollingNodeID();
4475
4476 if (nodeType == ScrollingNodeType::Subframe && !treeState.parentNodeID)
4477 nodeID = scrollingCoordinator.createNode(nodeType, nodeID);
4478 else {
4479 auto newNodeID = scrollingCoordinator.insertNode(nodeType, nodeID, treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0), treeState.nextChildIndex);
4480 if (newNodeID != nodeID) {
4481 // We'll get a new nodeID if the type changed (and not if the node is new).
4482 scrollingCoordinator.unparentChildrenAndDestroyNode(nodeID);
4483 m_scrollingNodeToLayerMap.remove(nodeID);
4484 }
4485 nodeID = newNodeID;
4486 }
4487
4488 ASSERT(nodeID);
4489 if (!nodeID)
4490 return 0;
4491
4492 ++treeState.nextChildIndex;
4493 return nodeID;
4494}
4495
4496void RenderLayerCompositor::detachScrollCoordinatedLayerWithRole(RenderLayer& layer, ScrollingCoordinator& scrollingCoordinator, ScrollCoordinationRole role)
4497{
4498 auto unregisterNode = [&](ScrollingNodeID nodeID) {
4499 auto childNodes = scrollingCoordinator.childrenOfNode(nodeID);
4500 for (auto childNodeID : childNodes) {
4501 if (auto weakLayer = m_scrollingNodeToLayerMap.get(childNodeID))
4502 weakLayer->setNeedsScrollingTreeUpdate();
4503 }
4504
4505 m_scrollingNodeToLayerMap.remove(nodeID);
4506 };
4507
4508 if (role == ScrollCoordinationRole::ScrollingProxy) {
4509 ASSERT(layer.isComposited());
4510 auto* clippingStack = layer.backing()->ancestorClippingStack();
4511 if (!clippingStack)
4512 return;
4513
4514 auto& stack = clippingStack->stack();
4515 for (auto& entry : stack) {
4516 if (entry.overflowScrollProxyNodeID)
4517 unregisterNode(entry.overflowScrollProxyNodeID);
4518 }
4519 return;
4520 }
4521
4522 auto nodeID = layer.backing()->scrollingNodeIDForRole(role);
4523 if (!nodeID)
4524 return;
4525
4526 unregisterNode(nodeID);
4527}
4528
4529void RenderLayerCompositor::detachScrollCoordinatedLayer(RenderLayer& layer, OptionSet<ScrollCoordinationRole> roles)
4530{
4531 auto* backing = layer.backing();
4532 if (!backing)
4533 return;
4534
4535 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
4536
4537 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling))
4538 detachScrollCoordinatedLayerWithRole(layer, *scrollingCoordinator, ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling);
4539
4540 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::ScrollingProxy))
4541 detachScrollCoordinatedLayerWithRole(layer, *scrollingCoordinator, ScrollCoordinationRole::ScrollingProxy);
4542
4543 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting))
4544 detachScrollCoordinatedLayerWithRole(layer, *scrollingCoordinator, ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting);
4545
4546 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::ViewportConstrained))
4547 detachScrollCoordinatedLayerWithRole(layer, *scrollingCoordinator, ScrollCoordinationRole::ViewportConstrained);
4548
4549 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::Positioning))
4550 detachScrollCoordinatedLayerWithRole(layer, *scrollingCoordinator, ScrollCoordinationRole::Positioning);
4551
4552 backing->detachFromScrollingCoordinator(roles);
4553}
4554
4555OptionSet<ScrollCoordinationRole> RenderLayerCompositor::coordinatedScrollingRolesForLayer(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositingAncestor) const
4556{
4557 OptionSet<ScrollCoordinationRole> coordinationRoles;
4558 if (isViewportConstrainedFixedOrStickyLayer(layer))
4559 coordinationRoles.add(ScrollCoordinationRole::ViewportConstrained);
4560
4561 if (useCoordinatedScrollingForLayer(layer))
4562 coordinationRoles.add(ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling);
4563
4564 auto coordinatedPositioning = computeCoordinatedPositioningForLayer(layer, compositingAncestor);
4565 switch (coordinatedPositioning) {
4566 case ScrollPositioningBehavior::Moves:
4567 coordinationRoles.add(ScrollCoordinationRole::ScrollingProxy);
4568 break;
4569 case ScrollPositioningBehavior::Stationary:
4570 coordinationRoles.add(ScrollCoordinationRole::Positioning);
4571 break;
4572 case ScrollPositioningBehavior::None:
4573 break;
4574 }
4575
4576 if (isLayerForIFrameWithScrollCoordinatedContents(layer))
4577 coordinationRoles.add(ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting);
4578
4579 return coordinationRoles;
4580}
4581
4582ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollCoordinationForLayer(RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositingAncestor, ScrollingTreeState& treeState, OptionSet<ScrollingNodeChangeFlags> changes)
4583{
4584 auto roles = coordinatedScrollingRolesForLayer(layer, compositingAncestor);
4585
4586#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
4587 if (m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator) {
4588 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::ViewportConstrained))
4589 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->addViewportConstrainedLayer(layer);
4590 else
4591 m_legacyScrollingLayerCoordinator->removeViewportConstrainedLayer(layer);
4592 }
4593#endif
4594
4595 if (!hasCoordinatedScrolling()) {
4596 // If this frame isn't coordinated, it cannot contain any scrolling tree nodes.
4597 return 0;
4598 }
4599
4600 auto newNodeID = treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4601
4602 ScrollingTreeState childTreeState;
4603 ScrollingTreeState* currentTreeState = &treeState;
4604
4605 // If there's a positioning node, it's the parent scrolling node for fixed/sticky/scrolling/frame hosting.
4606 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::Positioning)) {
4607 newNodeID = updateScrollingNodeForPositioningRole(layer, compositingAncestor, *currentTreeState, changes);
4608 childTreeState.parentNodeID = newNodeID;
4609 currentTreeState = &childTreeState;
4610 } else
4611 detachScrollCoordinatedLayer(layer, ScrollCoordinationRole::Positioning);
4612
4613 // If there's a scrolling proxy node, it's the parent scrolling node for fixed/sticky/scrolling/frame hosting.
4614 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::ScrollingProxy)) {
4615 newNodeID = updateScrollingNodeForScrollingProxyRole(layer, *currentTreeState, changes);
4616 childTreeState.parentNodeID = newNodeID;
4617 currentTreeState = &childTreeState;
4618 } else
4619 detachScrollCoordinatedLayer(layer, ScrollCoordinationRole::ScrollingProxy);
4620
4621 // If is fixed or sticky, it's the parent scrolling node for scrolling/frame hosting.
4622 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::ViewportConstrained)) {
4623 newNodeID = updateScrollingNodeForViewportConstrainedRole(layer, *currentTreeState, changes);
4624 // ViewportConstrained nodes are the parent of same-layer scrolling nodes, so adjust the ScrollingTreeState.
4625 childTreeState.parentNodeID = newNodeID;
4626 currentTreeState = &childTreeState;
4627 } else
4628 detachScrollCoordinatedLayer(layer, ScrollCoordinationRole::ViewportConstrained);
4629
4630 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling))
4631 newNodeID = updateScrollingNodeForScrollingRole(layer, *currentTreeState, changes);
4632 else
4633 detachScrollCoordinatedLayer(layer, ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling);
4634
4635 if (roles.contains(ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting))
4636 newNodeID = updateScrollingNodeForFrameHostingRole(layer, *currentTreeState, changes);
4637 else
4638 detachScrollCoordinatedLayer(layer, ScrollCoordinationRole::FrameHosting);
4639
4640 return newNodeID;
4641}
4642
4643ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollingNodeForViewportConstrainedRole(RenderLayer& layer, ScrollingTreeState& treeState, OptionSet<ScrollingNodeChangeFlags> changes)
4644{
4645 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
4646
4647 auto nodeType = ScrollingNodeType::Fixed;
4648 if (layer.renderer().style().position() == PositionType::Sticky)
4649 nodeType = ScrollingNodeType::Sticky;
4650 else
4651 ASSERT(layer.renderer().isFixedPositioned());
4652
4653 auto newNodeID = attachScrollingNode(layer, nodeType, treeState);
4654 if (!newNodeID) {
4655 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4656 return treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4657 }
4658
4659 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Compositing, stream << "Registering ViewportConstrained " << nodeType << " node " << newNodeID << " (layer " << layer.backing()->graphicsLayer()->primaryLayerID() << ") as child of " << treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0));
4660
4661 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::Layer)
4662 scrollingCoordinator->setNodeLayers(newNodeID, { layer.backing()->graphicsLayer() });
4663
4664 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::LayerGeometry) {
4665 switch (nodeType) {
4666 case ScrollingNodeType::Fixed:
4667 scrollingCoordinator->setViewportConstraintedNodeConstraints(newNodeID, computeFixedViewportConstraints(layer));
4668 break;
4669 case ScrollingNodeType::Sticky:
4670 scrollingCoordinator->setViewportConstraintedNodeConstraints(newNodeID, computeStickyViewportConstraints(layer));
4671 break;
4672 default:
4673 break;
4674 }
4675 }
4676
4677 return newNodeID;
4678}
4679
4680LayoutRect RenderLayerCompositor::parentRelativeScrollableRect(const RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* ancestorLayer) const
4681{
4682 // FIXME: ancestorLayer needs to be always non-null, so should become a reference.
4683 if (!ancestorLayer) {
4684 if (!layer.scrollableArea())
4685 return LayoutRect();
4686 return LayoutRect({ }, LayoutSize(layer.scrollableArea()->visibleSize()));
4687 }
4688
4689 LayoutRect scrollableRect;
4690 if (is<RenderBox>(layer.renderer()))
4691 scrollableRect = downcast<RenderBox>(layer.renderer()).paddingBoxRect();
4692
4693 auto offset = layer.convertToLayerCoords(ancestorLayer, scrollableRect.location()); // FIXME: broken for columns.
4694 scrollableRect.setLocation(offset);
4695 return scrollableRect;
4696}
4697
4698void RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollingNodeLayers(ScrollingNodeID nodeID, RenderLayer& layer, ScrollingCoordinator& scrollingCoordinator)
4699{
4700 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer()) {
4701 FrameView& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
4702 scrollingCoordinator.setNodeLayers(nodeID, { nullptr,
4703 scrollContainerLayer(), scrolledContentsLayer(),
4704 fixedRootBackgroundLayer(), clipLayer(), rootContentsLayer(),
4705 frameView.layerForHorizontalScrollbar(), frameView.layerForVerticalScrollbar() });
4706 } else {
4707 auto* scrollableArea = layer.scrollableArea();
4708 ASSERT(scrollableArea);
4709
4710 auto& backing = *layer.backing();
4711 scrollingCoordinator.setNodeLayers(nodeID, { backing.graphicsLayer(),
4712 backing.scrollContainerLayer(), backing.scrolledContentsLayer(),
4713 nullptr, nullptr, nullptr,
4714 scrollableArea->layerForHorizontalScrollbar(), scrollableArea->layerForVerticalScrollbar() });
4715 }
4716}
4717
4718ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollingNodeForScrollingRole(RenderLayer& layer, ScrollingTreeState& treeState, OptionSet<ScrollingNodeChangeFlags> changes)
4719{
4720 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
4721
4722 ScrollingNodeID newNodeID = 0;
4723
4724 if (layer.isRenderViewLayer()) {
4725 FrameView& frameView = m_renderView.frameView();
4726 ASSERT_UNUSED(frameView, scrollingCoordinator->coordinatesScrollingForFrameView(frameView));
4727
4728 newNodeID = attachScrollingNode(*m_renderView.layer(), m_renderView.frame().isMainFrame() ? ScrollingNodeType::MainFrame : ScrollingNodeType::Subframe, treeState);
4729
4730 if (!newNodeID) {
4731 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4732 return treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4733 }
4734
4735 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::Layer)
4736 updateScrollingNodeLayers(newNodeID, layer, *scrollingCoordinator);
4737
4738 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::LayerGeometry) {
4739 scrollingCoordinator->setScrollingNodeScrollableAreaGeometry(newNodeID, frameView);
4740 scrollingCoordinator->setFrameScrollingNodeState(newNodeID, frameView);
4741 }
4742 } else {
4743 newNodeID = attachScrollingNode(layer, ScrollingNodeType::Overflow, treeState);
4744 if (!newNodeID) {
4745 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4746 return treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4747 }
4748
4749 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::Layer)
4750 updateScrollingNodeLayers(newNodeID, layer, *scrollingCoordinator);
4751
4752 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::LayerGeometry && treeState.parentNodeID) {
4753 if (auto* scrollableArea = layer.scrollableArea())
4754 scrollingCoordinator->setScrollingNodeScrollableAreaGeometry(newNodeID, *scrollableArea);
4755 }
4756 }
4757
4758 return newNodeID;
4759}
4760
4761ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollingNodeForScrollingProxyRole(RenderLayer& layer, ScrollingTreeState& treeState, OptionSet<ScrollingNodeChangeFlags> changes)
4762{
4763 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
4764 auto* clippingStack = layer.backing()->ancestorClippingStack();
4765 if (!clippingStack) {
4766 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4767 return treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4768 }
4769
4770 ScrollingNodeID nodeID = 0;
4771 for (auto& entry : clippingStack->stack()) {
4772 if (!entry.clipData.isOverflowScroll)
4773 continue;
4774
4775 nodeID = registerScrollingNodeID(*scrollingCoordinator, entry.overflowScrollProxyNodeID, ScrollingNodeType::OverflowProxy, treeState);
4776 if (!nodeID) {
4777 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4778 return treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4779 }
4780 entry.overflowScrollProxyNodeID = nodeID;
4781#if ENABLE(SCROLLING_THREAD)
4782 if (entry.clippingLayer)
4783 entry.clippingLayer->setScrollingNodeID(nodeID);
4784#endif
4785
4786 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::Layer)
4787 scrollingCoordinator->setNodeLayers(entry.overflowScrollProxyNodeID, { entry.clippingLayer.get() });
4788
4789 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::LayerGeometry) {
4790 ASSERT(entry.clipData.clippingLayer);
4791 ASSERT(entry.clipData.clippingLayer->isComposited());
4792
4793 ScrollingNodeID overflowScrollNodeID = 0;
4794 if (auto* backing = entry.clipData.clippingLayer->backing())
4795 overflowScrollNodeID = backing->scrollingNodeIDForRole(ScrollCoordinationRole::Scrolling);
4796
4797 Vector<ScrollingNodeID> scrollingNodeIDs;
4798 if (overflowScrollNodeID)
4799 scrollingNodeIDs.append(overflowScrollNodeID);
4800 scrollingCoordinator->setRelatedOverflowScrollingNodes(entry.overflowScrollProxyNodeID, WTFMove(scrollingNodeIDs));
4801 }
4802 }
4803
4804 // FIXME: also m_overflowControlsHostLayerAncestorClippingStack
4805
4806 if (!nodeID)
4807 return treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4808
4809 return nodeID;
4810}
4811
4812ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollingNodeForFrameHostingRole(RenderLayer& layer, ScrollingTreeState& treeState, OptionSet<ScrollingNodeChangeFlags> changes)
4813{
4814 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
4815
4816 auto newNodeID = attachScrollingNode(layer, ScrollingNodeType::FrameHosting, treeState);
4817 if (!newNodeID) {
4818 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4819 return treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4820 }
4821
4822 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::Layer)
4823 scrollingCoordinator->setNodeLayers(newNodeID, { layer.backing()->graphicsLayer() });
4824
4825 return newNodeID;
4826}
4827
4828ScrollingNodeID RenderLayerCompositor::updateScrollingNodeForPositioningRole(RenderLayer& layer, const RenderLayer* compositingAncestor, ScrollingTreeState& treeState, OptionSet<ScrollingNodeChangeFlags> changes)
4829{
4830 auto* scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
4831
4832 auto newNodeID = attachScrollingNode(layer, ScrollingNodeType::Positioned, treeState);
4833 if (!newNodeID) {
4834 ASSERT_NOT_REACHED();
4835 return treeState.parentNodeID.value_or(0);
4836 }
4837
4838 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::Layer) {
4839 auto& backing = *layer.backing();
4840 scrollingCoordinator->setNodeLayers(newNodeID, { backing.graphicsLayer() });
4841 }
4842
4843 if (changes & ScrollingNodeChangeFlags::LayerGeometry && treeState.parentNodeID) {
4844 // Would be nice to avoid calling computeCoordinatedPositioningForLayer() again.
4845 auto positioningBehavior = computeCoordinatedPositioningForLayer(layer, compositingAncestor);
4846 auto relatedNodeIDs = collectRelatedCoordinatedScrollingNodes(layer, positioningBehavior);
4847 scrollingCoordinator->setRelatedOverflowScrollingNodes(newNodeID, WTFMove(relatedNodeIDs));
4848
4849 auto* graphicsLayer = layer.backing()->graphicsLayer();
4850 AbsolutePositionConstraints constraints;
4851 constraints.setAlignmentOffset(graphicsLayer->pixelAlignmentOffset());
4852 constraints.setLayerPositionAtLastLayout(graphicsLayer->position());
4853 scrollingCoordinator->setPositionedNodeConstraints(newNodeID, constraints);
4854 }
4855
4856 return newNodeID;
4857}
4858
4859void RenderLayerCompositor::updateSynchronousScrollingNodes()
4860{
4861 if (!hasCoordinatedScrolling())
4862 return;
4863
4864 if (m_renderView.settings().fixedBackgroundsPaintRelativeToDocument())
4865 return;
4866
4867 auto scrollingCoordinator = this->scrollingCoordinator();
4868 ASSERT(scrollingCoordinator);
4869
4870 auto rootScrollingNodeID = m_renderView.frameView().scrollingNodeID();
4871 HashSet<ScrollingNodeID> nodesToClear;
4872 nodesToClear.reserveInitialCapacity(m_scrollingNodeToLayerMap.size());
4873 for (auto key : m_scrollingNodeToLayerMap.keys())
4874 nodesToClear.add(key);
4875
4876 auto clearSynchronousReasonsOnNonRootNodes = [&] {
4877 for (auto nodeID : nodesToClear) {
4878 if (nodeID == rootScrollingNodeID)
4879 continue;
4880
4881 // Harmless to call setSynchronousScrollingReasons on a non-scrolling node.
4882 scrollingCoordinator->setSynchronousScrollingReasons(nodeID, { });
4883 }
4884 };
4885
4886 auto setHasSlowRepaintObjectsSynchronousScrollingReasonOnRootNode = [&](bool hasSlowRepaintObjects) {
4887 // ScrollingCoordinator manages all bits other than HasSlowRepaintObjects, so maintain their current value.
4888 auto reasons = scrollingCoordinator->synchronousScrollingReasons(rootScrollingNodeID);
4889 reasons.set({ SynchronousScrollingReason::HasSlowRepaintObjects }, hasSlowRepaintObjects);
4890 scrollingCoordinator->setSynchronousScrollingReasons(rootScrollingNodeID, reasons);
4891 };
4892
4893 auto slowRepaintObjects = m_renderView.frameView().slowRepaintObjects();
4894 if (!slowRepaintObjects) {
4895 setHasSlowRepaintObjectsSynchronousScrollingReasonOnRootNode(false);
4896 clearSynchronousReasonsOnNonRootNodes();
4897 return;
4898 }
4899
4900 auto relevantScrollingScope = [](const RenderObject& renderer, const RenderLayer& layer) {
4901 if (&layer.renderer() == &renderer)
4902 return layer.boxScrollingScope();
4903 return layer.contentsScrollingScope();
4904 };
4905
4906 bool rootHasSlowRepaintObjects = false;
4907 for (auto& renderer : *slowRepaintObjects) {
4908 auto layer = renderer.enclosingLayer();
4909 if (!layer)
4910 continue;
4911
4912 auto scrollingScope = relevantScrollingScope(renderer, *layer);
4913 if (!scrollingScope)
4914 continue;
4915
4916 if (auto enclosingScrollingNodeID = asyncScrollableContainerNodeID(renderer)) {
4917 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Scrolling, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor::updateSynchronousScrollingNodes - node " << enclosingScrollingNodeID << " slow-scrolling because of fixed backgrounds");
4918 ASSERT(enclosingScrollingNodeID != rootScrollingNodeID);
4919
4920 scrollingCoordinator->setSynchronousScrollingReasons(enclosingScrollingNodeID, { SynchronousScrollingReason::HasSlowRepaintObjects });
4921 nodesToClear.remove(enclosingScrollingNodeID);
4922
4923 // Although the root scrolling layer does not have a slow repaint object in it directly,
4924 // we need to set some synchronous scrolling reason on it so that
4925 // ScrollingCoordinator::shouldUpdateScrollLayerPositionSynchronously returns an
4926 // appropriate value. (Scrolling itself would be correct without this, since the
4927 // scrolling tree propagates DescendantScrollersHaveSynchronousScrolling bits up the
4928 // tree, but shouldUpdateScrollLayerPositionSynchronously looks at the scrolling state
4929 // tree instead.)
4930 rootHasSlowRepaintObjects = true;
4931 } else if (!layer->behavesAsFixed()) {
4932 LOG_WITH_STREAM(Scrolling, stream << "RenderLayerCompositor::updateSynchronousScrollingNodes - root node slow-scrolling because of fixed backgrounds");
4933 rootHasSlowRepaintObjects = true;
4934 }
4935 }
4936
4937 setHasSlowRepaintObjectsSynchronousScrollingReasonOnRootNode(rootHasSlowRepaintObjects);
4938 clearSynchronousReasonsOnNonRootNodes();
4939}
4940
4941ScrollableArea* RenderLayerCompositor::scrollableAreaForScrollingNodeID(ScrollingNodeID nodeID) const
4942{
4943 if (!nodeID)
4944 return nullptr;
4945
4946 if (nodeID == m_renderView.frameView().scrollingNodeID())
4947 return &m_renderView.frameView();
4948
4949 return m_scrollingNodeToLayerMap.get(nodeID)->scrollableArea();
4950}

5034#if PLATFORM(IOS_FAMILY)
5035typedef HashMap<PlatformLayer*, std::unique_ptr<ViewportConstraints>> LayerMap;
5036typedef HashMap<PlatformLayer*, PlatformLayer*> StickyContainerMap;
5037
5038void LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator::registerAllViewportConstrainedLayers(RenderLayerCompositor& compositor)
5039{
5040 if (!m_coordinateViewportConstrainedLayers)
5041 return;
5042
5043 LayerMap layerMap;
5044 StickyContainerMap stickyContainerMap;
5045
5046 for (auto* layer : m_viewportConstrainedLayers) {
5047 ASSERT(layer->isComposited());
5048
5049 std::unique_ptr<ViewportConstraints> constraints;
5050 if (layer->renderer().isStickilyPositioned()) {
5051 constraints = makeUnique<StickyPositionViewportConstraints>(compositor.computeStickyViewportConstraints(*layer));
5052 const RenderLayer* enclosingTouchScrollableLayer = nullptr;
5053 if (compositor.isAsyncScrollableStickyLayer(*layer, &enclosingTouchScrollableLayer) && enclosingTouchScrollableLayer) {
5054 ASSERT(enclosingTouchScrollableLayer->isComposited());
5055 // what
5056 stickyContainerMap.add(layer->backing()->graphicsLayer()->platformLayer(), enclosingTouchScrollableLayer->backing()->scrollContainerLayer()->platformLayer());
5057 }
5058 } else if (layer->renderer().isFixedPositioned())
5059 constraints = makeUnique<FixedPositionViewportConstraints>(compositor.computeFixedViewportConstraints(*layer));
5060 else
5061 continue;
5062
5063 layerMap.add(layer->backing()->graphicsLayer()->platformLayer(), WTFMove(constraints));
5064 }
5065
5066 m_chromeClient.updateViewportConstrainedLayers(layerMap, stickyContainerMap);
5067}
5068
5069void LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator::unregisterAllViewportConstrainedLayers()
5070{
5071 if (!m_coordinateViewportConstrainedLayers)
5072 return;
5073
5074 LayerMap layerMap;
5075 m_chromeClient.updateViewportConstrainedLayers(layerMap, { });
5076}

5078void LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator::updateScrollingLayer(RenderLayer& layer)
5079{
5080 auto* backing = layer.backing();
5081 ASSERT(backing);
5082
5083 auto* scrollableArea = layer.scrollableArea();
5084 ASSERT(scrollableArea);
5085
5086 bool allowHorizontalScrollbar = !scrollableArea->horizontalScrollbarHiddenByStyle();
5087 bool allowVerticalScrollbar = !scrollableArea->verticalScrollbarHiddenByStyle();
5088
5089 m_chromeClient.addOrUpdateScrollingLayer(layer.renderer().element(), backing->scrollContainerLayer()->platformLayer(), backing->scrolledContentsLayer()->platformLayer(),
5090 scrollableArea->reachableTotalContentsSize(), allowHorizontalScrollbar, allowVerticalScrollbar);
5091}
5092
5093void LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator::registerAllScrollingLayers()
5094{
5095 for (auto* layer : m_scrollingLayers)
5096 updateScrollingLayer(*layer);
5097}
5098
5099void LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator::unregisterAllScrollingLayers()
5100{
5101 for (auto* layer : m_scrollingLayers) {
5102 auto* backing = layer->backing();
5103 ASSERT(backing);
5104 m_chromeClient.removeScrollingLayer(layer->renderer().element(), backing->scrollContainerLayer()->platformLayer(), backing->scrolledContentsLayer()->platformLayer());
5105 }
5106}

5108void LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator::addScrollingLayer(RenderLayer& layer)
5109{
5110 m_scrollingLayers.add(&layer);
5111}
5112
5113void LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator::removeScrollingLayer(RenderLayer& layer, RenderLayerBacking& backing)
5114{
5115 if (m_scrollingLayers.remove(&layer)) {
5116 auto* scrollContainerLayer = backing.scrollContainerLayer()->platformLayer();
5117 auto* scrolledContentsLayer = backing.scrolledContentsLayer()->platformLayer();
5118 m_chromeClient.removeScrollingLayer(layer.renderer().element(), scrollContainerLayer, scrolledContentsLayer);
5119 }
5120}
5121
5122void LegacyWebKitScrollingLayerCoordinator::removeLayer(RenderLayer& layer)
5123{
5124 removeScrollingLayer(layer, *layer.backing());
5125
5126 // We'll put the new set of layers to the client via registerAllViewportConstrainedLayers() at flush time.
5127 m_viewportConstrainedLayers.remove(&layer);
5128}
